title: 1 - Omba Lipenga
content:
1 - Omba Lipenga

WATCHMAN, BLOW THE GOSPEL TRUMPET

1 Mlonda lalika uthenga, Chenjeza anthu onse,
Iye wakumva adzetu, Nakhale nawo moyo.

CHORUS:
Omba Lipenga mlonda’we, Anthu onse amvetu,
Lalika atero Mlungu! Onse amasulidwe.

2 Lalika m’mapiri monse, M’nkhalango ndi m’madambo;
Lalikiranso mzinyanja, Ndi nyimbo yokondwera.

3 Lalikira ponse ponse, kumene kuli mdima;
Amve kuti zonse zapsa, Atate alindira.

4 Lalikira kwa othodwa, Akufuna mpumulo;
Yesu ali kuitana, Idzani kwa inetu.

title: 2 - Indetu Pakhomo
content:
2 - Indetu Pakhomo

The Coming King

1 Mfumu yathu ili kudza, Yomwe inafera ife;
Koma olungama okha, Adzapita nawo.

CHORUS:
Indetu pakhomo Ali pafupitu pakhomo,
Ali kudza (inde) ali kudza (Mbuye) Inde ali pakhomo.

2 Zizindikiro zakezo, Zili kukwanitsidwatu,
Posachedwa tidzamona, Akudza m’mitambo.

3 Musayang’ane pa dziko, Kupeza mtendere wathu,
Mpaka Yesu adzabwera Kudzachotsa imfa.

4 Pompo m’dziko latsopano Tidzakhalamo kosatha,
Imfa sidzakhala uko, Ku nthawi zosatha.

title: 3 - Maso Ndi Maso
content:
3 - Maso Ndi Maso

FACE TO FACE

1 Maso ndi maso ndi Khristu, Kodi ndidzachitanji?
Mmene ndidzaona Yesu, Yemwe anandifera.

CHORUS:
N’dzamona maso ndi maso, Kuseri kwa mitambo;
Posachedwa ndidzamona, Mulemerero wace!

2 Tsopano ndimona Iye, Mwa chizimezimetu,
Tsiku lija ndidzaona, Ulemerero wache.

3 Pamene zowawa zonse, Nthenda ndi imfa zitha,
Dziko likadzakonzedwa, Ndidzakondwa koposa!

4 Lodala tsikulo m’mene! Ndidzamuona Yesu,
Mpulumutsi wanga yemwe, Anandikonda ine.

title: 4 - Ali Kudza
content:
4 - Ali Kudza

HE IS COMING

1 Timamva uthenga wabwinotu, M’mene tiri kunka kwathu;
Msanga Mpulumutsi adzabwera, Kukhala Mfumu yathu.

CHORUS:
Ali kudza posacedwa, Inde ali kudza pa dzikoli;
Ndipo tidzapita tonse kumwamba, Pakubwera Yesuyo.

2 Manda a anthu oyera mtima, Adzatsegulidwa ndithu;
Ndipo onse ogonera m’mandamo, Adzakhalanso moyo.

3 Sitidzalekananso kwathu ko, Tidzayimba za chombolo;
Anthu a mitundu yonse adzadza, Kupembedza Mfumuyo.

4 Tidzayimba aleluya, Amen! Msanga tikasamalira;
Dikirani ndi kupemphera nonse, Tidzabvala korona.

title: 5 - Kuli Bwanji Kwathu?
content:
5 - Kuli Bwanji Kwathu?

HOW FAR FROM HOME?

1 Kuli bwanji kwathu? Ndinafunsa, mlonda iye nati:
Usiku wapita ndithu, kwayandika kucha;
Usalire, yendabe ndi chiyembekezo chodala
Mpaka udzafika m’mwamba pa tsiku losatha.

2 Ndafunsa msrikali wa Khristu, iye nayimba nati:
Ndidzamenyanatu nkhondo patsala pang’ono.
Usalire, pirira kufikira nkhondo idzatha,
Pakuti olakika adzalandira mphotho.

3 Ndinafunsa dziko, nyanja ndi dzuwa izo zinati:
Nthawi ili kutha Yesu ali pafupitu,
Usalire, zizindikiro zili kuonekatu,
Chilengedwe chonse chilindira kudza kwake.

4 Kwathu mpafupitu! mau osangalatsa mtimanga,
Omwe adapukuta misozi ya olira,
Usalire, tidzakomanatu osalekananso
Zobvuta zitatha m’nyumba ya Atate wathu.

title: 6 - Yesu Akudza
content:
6 - Yesu Akudza

WATCH YE SAINTS

1 Yang’anirani Akristu, Zammwamba zigwedezeka
Yatsani nyali zanuzo, Kukomana naye Mbuye.

CHORUS:
Onani Yesu adza; Akudza mulemerero,
Adzakhala mfumu yathu, Onani! Ali kudza.

2 Ona lonjezano lace, Wakhululukira tchimo,
Mwazi nutsuka minjiro, Nena nthano ya chombolo.

3 Mafumu anjenjemera, Imva! ali kudza ndithu
Nena za cisomo chake, M’mene lipenga lilira.

4 Mitundu yonse idzatha, Khristu wafulumiratu;
Dziko lili kutha ndithu; Mbuye wathu ali kudza.

5 Yesu aitana nonse, Akupembedzera inu;
Kangaza nthawi ikutha, Ungadzatsaletu kunja.

title: 7 - Yesu Adza Kuwerenga
content:
7 - Yesu Adza Kuwerenga

WHEN HE COMETH

1 Yesu adza kuwerenga Ana ’Ke abwino,
Ngale zake zowalitsa, Okondedwawo.

CHORUS:
Ana omwe angonga Nyenyezi za mmwamba,
Nadza naye mokondwa, Onyezima nye.

 2 Yesu adzasonkhanitsa Oyera mu mtima,
Ana ake onyezima, Okondedwawo.

3 Ana, inde, ana ake Ndi nyenyezi zake;
Adzakhala owalitsa, Okondedwawo.

title: 8 - Pakwitana Mbuye Wanga
content:
8 - Pakwitana Mbuye Wanga

WHEN THE TRUMPET

1. Pakwitana Mbuye wanga potsiriza dzikoli,
Pakufika tsiku la kuwalalo,
Posonkhana akumvera, pakuona Yesuyo,
Ndidzakondwerera naye komweko

CHORUS:
Pakwitana Mbuye wanga (Mbuyanga),
Pakwitana Mbuye wanga (Mbuyanga),
Pakwitana Mbuye wanga,
Ndidzakondwerera naye komweko.

2. Potuluka mmanda mwao, anthu ake onsewo,
Tidzasanganatu nao nthawiyo.
Pakuuka osankhidwa, kunka naye Yesuyo,
Ndidzakondwerera naye komweko.

3. Tisaleke kugwirabe ntchito ya Mulunguyo,
Tibukitse mbiri yake mdzikoli,
Ndi podzatha moyo wathu ndi zintchito zathuzo,
Tidzakondwerera naye komweko.

CHORUS (lotsiriza):
Pakwitana Mbuye wathu (Mbuyathu),
Pakwitana Mbuye wathu (Mbuyathu),
Pakwitana Mbuye wathu,
Tidzakondwerera naye komweko.

title: 9 - Omba Lipenga
content:
9 - Omba Lipenga

LIFT UP THE TRUMPET

1. Omba lipenga, limveke ponse;
Yesu adzabweranso!
Kondweranitu, yimbani nyimbo;
Yesu adzabweranso.

CHORUS:
Abweranso, abweranso, Yesu adzabweranso!

2. Lalikirani m’phiri ndi m’dambo;
Yesu adzabweranso!
Adzadza m’ulemerero wake;
Yesu adzabweranso.

3. Lalikirani m’zinyanja monse;
Yesu adzabweranso!
Lalikirani ponseponsepo;
Yesu adzabweranso.

4. Zivomezi zimanena kuti;
Yesu adzabweranso!
Namondwe ndi mafunde zinena;
Yesu adzabweranso.

5. Mitundu yakwiya tidziwatu;
Yesu adzabweranso!
Zizindikiro zakwanitsidwa;
Yesu adzabweranso.

title: 10 - Kodi Tidzasonkhanadi?
content:
10 - Kodi Tidzasonkhanadi?

SHALL WE GATHER

1. Kodi tidzasonkhanadi, Pali mtsinjewo wa moyo,
Wakuyenda nthawi zonse, Kwa Mulungu m’mwambamo.

CHORUS:
Inde, tikomane komwe, Ku mtsinje wakukoma wa Mulungu;
Tisangane ndi olungama. Pa mtsinje m’mwambambo.

2. Pa magombe a pa mtsinje, Tidzayendayenda komwe;
Tidzalemekeza Mlungu, Nthawi zonse zonsezo.

3. Tisanadze pa magombe, Tidzatula akatundu.
Yesu adzatilandira, ’Dzativeka tonsefe.

4. Msanga tikomane komwe, Potsiriza pa ulendo,
Msanga tidzakondwerabe, Timyimbira Mlunguyo.

title: 11 - Ndidzakutsatani
content:
11 - Ndidzakutsatani

I WILL FOLLOW THEE

1. Ndidzakutsatani Mbuye, Kuli konse mupita;
Ndidzakutsatani Mbuye, Inde n’dzakutsatani.

CHORUS:
Ndidzakutsatani Mbuye, Yemwe munandifera;
Ngakhale akukaneni, Ndidzakutsatani ’Nu.

2. Nkana njira ndi ya minga Yopanda matakadzo,
Mukandikonzera Ine, Mokondwa n’dzatsata ’nu.

3. Nkana chisautso chidza, Kapena ndiyesedwa;
Mbuyenso anayesedwa, Ndidzamtsata mokondwa.

4. Nkana ndipeze mavuto, Sindidzakukanani;
Mnazunzidwanso koopsa Ndidzatsatabe Inu.

5. M’mafunde ndi mozamamo, Mudzanditsogolera;
M’nayenda m’mafunde kale, Ndidzakutsatani ’Nu.

title: 12 - Kasupe Ali Wodzaza
content:
12 - Kasupe Ali Wodzaza

THERE IS A FOUNTAIN

1. Kasupe ali wodzaza,
Ndi mwazi wa Yesu;
Omwe asamba mwa uyu
Ataya zoipa.

2. Woba wakufa napenya,
Kasupe nakondwa;
Ndi ine enso mwa uyu,
Ndisamba ndiyera.

3. Mwazi wa Yesu wokondwa,
Ukhala wamphamvu;
Kwa ana onse a Mlungu
Uchita kuombola.

4. Mmene ndapenya mwazi
wa Mabala Anuwo,
Kukonda kwanu nditama
Kwa kutha kwa moyo.

5. Ndikhulupirira kuti
Mwakakonza malo
Ndipo ndidzalowa ine
Ku moyo wosatha.

6. Kumwamba ndikayimbanso
Zamphamvu za Mlungu,
Zopulumutsa onsewa
Omvana ndi Yesu.

title: 13 - Ndiyeretu Mbu
content:
13 - Ndiyeretu Mbu

LORD JESUS, I LONG TO BE PERFECTLY WHOLE

1. Ambuye ndifuna nditsukenitu,
Mukhalitse ndine mu mtima’ngamu;
Muthyole zonsezo zodetsa’netu,
Musambitse ine, ndiyeretu mbu!

CHORUS:
Ndiyere mbu, E, ndiyere mbu,
Musambitse ine, ndiyeretu mbu.

2. Ambuye taonani pansi pano,
Kuti m’ndithandize kudzipereka;
Ndileke zangazo zoipsa’netu,
Musambitse ine, ndiyeretu mbu.

3. Chifukwa cha ichi ndipempheratu,
Ndidikira Inu Ambuyanga ’Nu;
Ndikhulupilira pa mwaziwo pyu,
Musambitse ine ndiyeretu mbu.

4. Ambuye muona ndidikira’Nu,
Idzani kukonzetsa mtima wanga;
omwe akufuna simuwakana,
Musambitse ine, ndiyeretu mbu.

title: 14 - Imva Makobidi
content:
14 - Imva Makobidi

HEAR THE PENNIES DROPPING

1. Imva makobidi, tili kuponya!
Tili kupereka, onse kwa Yesu.

CHORUS:
Ngwingwi! ngwingwi! Ngwingwi! ngwingwi!
Tili kuponya! Tili kupereka, Onse kwa Yesu.

2. Tonse tipereka, kobidi lathu;
Kuti anthu ena amve za Yesu.

3. Pakuperekatu tili kusunga;
Tikakula, Mbuye adzatipatsa.

4. Makamaka Yesu afuna ife;
Kuti tipereke mitima yathu.

title: 15 - Yesu Andikonda ’Ne
content:
15 - Yesu Andikonda ’Ne

JESUS LOVES ME!

1. Yesu andikonda ’ne, Amatero m’bukhumo.
Akafoka mwana ’ke, Amlimbitsa Yesuyo.

CHORUS:
Yesu akonda, akonda ine,
Akonda ine, Atero m’bukhumo.

2. Nandifera Yesuyo, Nagonjetsa tchimolo,
Natsegula khomolo, Kuti ndinke kwawoko.

3. Yesu andikonda ’ne, Nkana ndikudwalatu,
Mmene ndifookanso, Andisamalira ’ne.

4. Yesu andikonda ’ne, Ndikamkonda Iyeyo,
’Dzanditenga inetu, Ndikakhale nayedi.

title: 16 - Timapazi Inu, Samalirani
content:
16 - Timapazi Inu, Samalirani

I WASHED MY HANDS

1. Ndasamba m’manja mwanga, Mwayeretsedwatu,
Ndi kwapereka iwo, Ku ntchito ya Yesu.

CHORUS:
Timapazi inu Samalirani,
Musanditengere, Kuli zoipa.

2. Makutu amvetsere Pa tsiku lonseli,
Ntchito yonse yabwino, Manjawa achite.

3. Maso anga aone, Ntchito zawo zonse,
Kutitu asachimwe, Chifukwa cha Yesu.

title: 17 - Chikondi Chitikondwetsa
content:
17 - Chikondi Chitikondwetsa

’TIS LOVE THAT MAKES US HAPPY

1. Chikondi chikondwetsa, Nichikonza njira;
Chimatithangata ife, Kukonda anzathu.

CHORUS:
Mulungu ndiye chikonditu, Ndifetu ana akewo.
Chikondi chikondwetsa, Nichikonza njira;
Chimatithangata ife, Kukonda anzathu.

2. Dzikoli n’la chisoni, La imfa ndi nthenda,
Tidzachita mbali yathu, Kuthangata ena.

3. Moyo uno ukatha, Tikadzanka m’mwamba,
Tidzayimba kosaleka, Za kukonda kwake.

title: 18 - Usamalire Moyo Wanga ’We
content:
18 - Usamalire Moyo Wanga ’We

MY SOUL, BE ON THY GUARD

1. Usamalire ’we, Adani akowo,
Ngambiritu mu dzikoli, Angakugwetse ’we.

2. Limbika nkhondoyo, Masiku onsewo,
Nupempha Mlungu wakoyo, Kukuthangata ’we.

3. Usaganize ’we, Kusiya nkhondoyi;
Sudzapumula mpakatu, Ambuye abwera.

title: 19 - Akristu Tiyeni
content:
19 - Akhristu Tiyeni

ONWARD, CHRISTIAN SOLDIERS!

1. Akhristu tiyeni! Nkhondo tigwire,
Yesu Mbuye wathu, Atitsogoza,
Ona mbuye yekha, Atithandiza;
Ndi mbendera yake, Tiyitsatira.

CHORUS:
Akristu tiyeni! Nkhondo tigwire,
Yesu Mbuye wathu, Atitsogoza.

2. Nkhondo ya Satana, Msanga ithawa,
Akristu tiyeni, Tidzapambana;
Mphamvu zake zitha, Yesu titama;
Yimbani anzathu Nyimbo tikweza.

3. Gulu lalikulu, Adza Akhristu;
Titsatana nawo, Ana a Mlungu;
Sitipatukana, Tonse tikhala,
Ndi mtima umodzi, Timakondana.

4. Zonse za pa dziko, Zidzatheratu;
Koma mpingo wake, Ukhalitsabe;
Mphamvu ya Satana, Idzalefuka;
Yesu nalonjeza Ndidzalimbitsa.

5. Idzani Akhristu, Kutithandiza,
Nyimbo za Mulungu, Tidzayimbitsa;
Khristu ayenera, Ndiye Mfumuyo,
Tidzamlemekeza, Nthawi zonsezo.

title: 20 - Moyo Wanga Dzuka
content:
20 - Moyo Wanga Dzuka

AWAKE, MY SOUL!

1. Moyo wanga dzuka, limba Thamanga ndi mphamvu;
Korona wosatha ali, Kulindira iwe.

2. Mau a Mulungu wako, Akuitana’we;
Dzanja lake likufupa, Ngati ufunitsa.

3. Mtambo wa mboni wozinga, Uyang’anira’we;
Iwala zonse za m’mbuyo, Pitabe m’tsogolo.

4. Mpulumutsi tikokeni, Tiyambe liwiro;
Tidze pa mapazi anu, Kutula katundu.

title: 21 - Ndiri Kudza Kwa Yesu
content:
21 - Ndiri Kudza Kwa Yesu

I AM COMING TO THE CROSS

1. Ndiri kudza kwa Yesu, Ndasauka ndachimwa;
Zonse zanga ndisiya, Kukapeza moyotu.

CHORUS:
Yesu ndikhulupira, Munafera inedi,
Mwa umphawi ndipempha, Mundipulumutsetu.

2. Inde Inu ndifuna, Ndinachimwa kwambiri;
Yesu ati, Ndichotsa Zakuipa zakozo.

3. Yesu zonse ndipatsa, Zili zanu tsopano,
Mtima wanga wonsewu, Muli mwini waketu.

4. Ndikukhulupirani, Mwazi wanu ndidziwa,
Wayeretsa inenso, Ndapachikwa ndi Khristu.

5. Yesu adzandidzaza Mtima wanga wonsewu,
Ine ndiri woyera, Yesu wanga nditama.

title: 22 - Inenso
content:
22 - Inenso

LORD, I HEAR

1. Mbuye ndamva muchitira, Anthu ena zabwino;
Muli kuwadalitsira, Mudalitse inenso.

CHORUS:
Inenso, inenso, Mudalitse inenso.

2. Tate m’sandipitirire, Ndimaipa mtimamo;
Ndiyenera imfa, koma Chitireni chifundo.

3. Ndinagona mwa zoipa, Ndinakunyozanitu,
Dziko lino ndinakonda, Mundikhululukire.

4. Mzimu m’sandipitirire, Mupenyetsa akhungu;
Munapatsa ena mphamvu, Mpatse mphamvu inenso.

title: 23 - Mundifungatire Ine
content:
23 - Mundifungatire Ine

HOVER O’ER ME HOLY SPIRIT

1. Mundifungatire ine, Mzimu wakuyera ’Nu,
Munditsuke mtima wanga, Inde, Mudze leroli.

CHORUS:
Mudzetu, mudzetu, Mzimu wakuyera mbu.
Munditsuke mtima wanga, Inde, mudze leroli.

2. Mzimu, mundidzaze ine, Ndisowatu nzeruzo.
Ndisowanso inu, Mbuye, Mundidzaze mtimanga.

3. Ine ndine wolefuka, Ndikugwadiranitu.
Mzimu Inu mundidzaze Ndi chikondi Chanucho.

4. Dalitseni ine, Mzimu, Sambitseni mtimanga.
Inu, Msangalatsi wanga, Mudze, inde leroli.

title: 24 - Ndifuna Yesuyo
content:
24 - Ndifuna Yesuyo

I NEED THEE EVERY HOUR

1. Ndifuna Yesuyo, Ambuyanga,
M’mtendere ndinkemo, Mwa Iyeyu.

CHORUS:
Ndifuna Inu, Yesu, Nthawiyi ndifuna,
Kwa Yesuyo, Mbuyanga, Ndifunako.

2. Ndifuna Yesuyo, Movutamu,
Ndipulumukemo Mwa Iyeyu.

3. Ndifuna Yesuyo, Mokondwa ndi
Mowawa, adzemo Ndi moyodi.

4. Ndifuna yesuyo, Ndichite ’ne
Zofuna zakezo, Ndidzazebe.

5. Ndifuna Yesuyo Woyeratu,
Ndikhale wakeyo, Wa Iyeyu.

title: 25 - Ndipereka Zonse
content:
25 - Ndipereka Zonse

ALL TO JESUS I SURRENDER

1. Ndipereka zonse kwa Yesu, Zonse mwa ufulu;
Ndidzamkonda Iye koposa, Tsiku lili lonse.

CHORUS:
Ndiperekatu, zonse kwa Yesu;
Zonse kwanu ndipereka dalitsenitu.

2. Ndipereka zonse kwa Yesu, Pa mapazi ake;
Zadziko ndazikana zonse, Nditengeni Yesu.

3. Ndipereka zonse kwa Yesu, Ndikhale wanutu,
Ndimve Mzimu wanu ndidziwe, Kuti ndinu wanga.

4. Ndipereka zonse kwa Yesu, Wandipatsa mphamvu.
Ndikondwera chipulumutso! Nditama dzinalo!

title: 26 - Ndisauka Ndinachimwa
content:
26 - Ndisauka Ndinachimwa

JUST AS I AM

1. Ndisauka ndinachimwa, Koma Inu mwandifera,
Ndipo ndamva mundi’tana, Mwana Mlungu ndingobwera.

2. Ndisauka ndimasowa, Mphamvu ya kuyera mtima,
Mwazi wanu unditsuka; Mwana Mlungu ndingobwera.

3. Ndisauka, sindikhoza Kwiletsa nkhondo mu mtima,
Ndi chisoni, mantha, nkhawa, Mwana Mlungu ndingobwera.

4. Ndisauka sindiona, Ndimadwala ndilefuka,
Zonse ndizitaya kwa ’Nu, Mwana Mlungu ndingobwera.

5. Inde, Yesu mulandira, Muchiritsa mpulumutsa,
Mau anu ndivomera, Mwana Mlungu ndingobwera.

6. Inde, Yesu, mundikonda, Zonse zina ndazitaya,
Tsono kukakhala wanu, Mwana Mlungu ndingobwera.

title: 27 - M’titsitsimutse
content:
27 - M’titsitsimutse

WE PRAISE THEE, O GOD

1. Tiyamika’Nu Mulungu wokonda,
Chifukwa cha Yesu Mwana wanuyo.

CHORUS:
Haleluya, tidzamtama, Haleluya, Amen;
Haleluya timpembedza, Mulungu wathu.

2. Tiyamikira, Mulungu wamphamvu;
Chifukwa cha Mzimu wanu Woyera.

3. Tiyamikira, Mwana wa Nkhosayo,
Yemwe anafera zoipa zathu.

4. Tiyamika’Nu, Mlungu wa chisomo,
Munatigula ndi mwazi wanuwo.

5 M’titsitsimutse, Ndi chikondi chanu,
M’tiyatse ndi moto wa Mzimu wanu.

title: 28 - Khalatu Woyera
content:
28 - Khalatu Woyera

TAKE TIME TO BE HOLY

1. Khalatu woyera, Pemphera mseri;
Werenga mau ’ke, Masiku onse;
Thangatani omwe Ali ofo’ka,
Madalitso ake Funafunani.

2. Khalatu woyera, Dziko laipa;
Pemphera kolimba, Kwa Yesu Mbuye;
Yang’anitsa Yesu, Ndi Kumtsatira
Kuti anthu ena Aone Yesu.

3. Khalatu woyera, Akutsogoze,
Usamtsogolere, M’njira zakozo;
M’nsoni ndi pokondwa, Tsata Mbuyako
Khulupira Yesu Ndi mau ake.

4. Khalatu woyera, Khala wofatsa,
Alamulire ’Ye, Ganizo lako;
Utatsogozedwa Ndi Mzimu wake,
Msanga udzagwira Ntchito ya mmwamba.

title: 29 - Mukhale Ndine
content:
29 - Mukhale Ndine

ABIDE WITH ME

1. Mukhale ndine dzuwa lalowa, Wagwa usiku bwenzi lisowa,
Ndilibe wina wondithandiza, Wa mphamvu ndinu, mkhale ndinetu.

2. Kamoyo kanga katha leroli, Zidzachokanso zinthu za dziko,
Zimasinthika zoonekazo, Simusinthika mkhale ndinetu.

3. Koma kale mnakhalitsa pano, Mukhale ndine musachokenso,
Simpempha kuti Mbuye mutsotse, Komatu mukhalitse ndinetu.

4. Ndifuna inu tsiku lonselo, Ndi mphamvu yanu ndidzasungika,
Mukatsogola sindiopai, Msana, usiku, mkhale ndinetu.

5. Adani sindiopa mulipo, Muletse tsoka ndi chisonichi,
Ikadza imfa ndzalimba mtima, M’imfa ndi moyo mkhale ndinetu.

title: 30 - Dzuwa Lili Kulowa
content:
30 - Dzuwa Lili Kulowa

DAY IS DYING IN THE WEST

1. Dzuwa lili kulowa, Mlungu atipumitse;
Linda ndi kupemphera mmene nyali zili kuwala m’mwamba.

CHORUS:
Woyera Ambuye wa makamu!
Za m’mwamba ndi za dziko zitamanda Inu,
Mlungu Wamkulu.

2. Ambuye wamoyo’Nu, Ife tasonkhanatu,
Kufuna nkhope Yanu; mutifungatire’fe m’khola Lanu

3. Pamene mthunzi ugwa, Mumatifungatira;
Mwa chisomo chanutu, Mitima yathu ikwera kwa Inu.

4. Tikamwalira ife osaona za dziko,
Ambuye wachifundo, mutidzutsenso tsiku lotsiriza.

title: 31 - Mombolo Wanga, Dzuwatu.
content:
31 - Mombolo Wanga, Dzuwatu

SUN OF MY SOUL

1. Mombolo wanga, dzuwatu,
La mtima wanga ndinudi,
Palibe mdima ngatitu
Mukawalira inedi.

2. Muchotse zonse zoti bii,
Zobisa nkhope yanuyo;
Mudzadzetu mtimangawo,
Ndi kuunika kwanuko.

3. Madzulo ano mkhaletu,
Pafupi ndine Yesudi
Ndisanagone tuloto,
Ndilingalira Inudi.

4. Kapena wina leroli,
Wasocherera m’njirayi,
Ya Inu, Mbuye, mbwezetu,
Mumpulumutse iyedi.

title: 32 - Ndiye Pothawira Pathu
content:
32 - Ndiye Pothawira Pathu

THE LORD’S OUR ROCK

1. Mbuye ali thanthwe lathu, Ndiye pothawira pathu;
Atipulumutsa m’zonse, Ndiye pothawira pathu.

CHORUS:
Ndiyetu thanthwe lilomba, Ndi mthuzi nthawi yotentha;
Mtsogozi wa aulendo, Ndiye pothawira pathu.

2. Pa nthawi ya usikuwo, Ndiye pothawira pathu;
Palibe wotiopsa’fe, Ndiye pothawira pathu.

3. Nkana chigumula chidze, Ndiye pothawira pathu;
Mwa Mlungu tipeza bwino, Ndiye pothawira pathu.

4. Inu thanthwe lokondedwa, Ndinu pothawira pathu;
Khalani mthangati wathu, Ndinu pothawira pathu.

title: 33 - Mulungu Atsogoza ’Ne
content:
33 - Mulungu Atsogoza ’Ne

HE LEADETH ME

1. Mulungu atsogoza ’ne, Ndapuma m’mtima mwangamo.
Ayang’anira m’njiramo, Poyenda ine konseko.

CHORUS:
Mulungu atsogoza ’ne, Ndi dzanja-dzanja lakelo.
Ndidzamtsatira Mbuyanga, Poyenda ine konseko.

2. Masiku ena mdima bi, Ndimavutika m’mtimamo.
Pa nthawi zina nkondwadi, Popeza zokondwetsazo.

3. Ndzagwira dzanja lanulo, Osang’ung’udza konseyi,
Ndidzanka mokondweratu, Pomtsata Mbuye wangayo.

4. Podzatha ntchito yangayi, Podzagonjetsa tchimolo,
Kumene ndidzakhalatu, Sindidzaopa imfayo.

title: 34 - Pokhala Mtendere
content:
34 - Pokhala Mtendere

WHEN PEACE LIKE A RIVER

1. Pokhala mtendere mu mtimangamu, Pamene ndisaukanso,
Pamene mabvuto ndi akurudi, Moyo wangawu ngwabwinotu.

CHORUS:
Moyowu (Moyowu) uli phee (uli phee).
Moyo wangawu ngwabwinotu.

2. Ngakhale Satana atizunza ’fe, Chiripo chitonthozocho;
Chifundo cha Kristu anafera ’fe, Kundipatsa ’ne moyo wake.

3. Uchimo unapachikidwa pomwe, Pa mtanda wa Yesu Mbuye,
Machimo angawo anatherapo, Mbuye wanga ndiyamika ’Nu.

4. Ambuyathu tikhumba tsiku lija, Limene tidzaona ’Nu,
Lipenga limveke, tidzakondwatu, Pakukomana ndi Yesuyo.

title: 35 - Chidzakhala Chimwemwe
content:
35 - Chidzakhala Chimwemwe

WHAT A FELLOWSHIP

1. Chidzakhala chimwemwe choposa,
Potsamira m’mikono mwake;
Kuli dalo kwa Mlungu wangayo,
Potsamira m’mikono mwake.

CHORUS:
Potsamira, Adzandipulumutsatu;
Mwa zoopsya, Potsamira m’mikono mwake.

(Bass and Tenor):
Potsamiratu, Potsamiratu, Adzandipulumutsatu;
Mwa zoopsyazo, Mwa zoopysazo,
Potsamira m’mikono mwake.

2. Nkwambinotu kuyenda m’njirayi,
Potsamira m’mikono mwake;
Njowaladi koposa njirayi,
Potsamira m’mikono mwake.

3. Ndiopanji ndi kuda nkhawanso,
Potsamira m’mikono mwake?
Mbuyanga ali nane pafupi,
Potsamira m’mikono mwake.

title: 36 - Ndikhulupira ’Nu
content:
36 - Ndikhulupira ’Nu

MY FAITH LOOKS UP TO THEE

1. Ndikhulupira ’Nu, Mwana wa Mlunguyo,
Mbuyanga ’Nu;
Mumve popempha ’ne, Tchimo muchotsebe,
Lero ndikhale ’ne, Wa Inuyo.

2. Mzimu mndipatseko, Wondilimbitsayo
Mu mtimamo;
Munandiferadi, Ndiyambe leroli,
Inu kukonda ndi Mtimangawo.

3. Poyenda m’mdima bii, M’mtimamo nsonizi,
Mndigwiretu;
Mdima uchoke zi, Msozi ulekedi,
Ndisasochereyi, Kwa Inuko.

title: 37 - Ndidze Pafupipa
content:
37 - Ndidze Pafupipa

NEARER MY GOD TO THEE!

1. Ndidze pafupipa Mlungu wanga,
’Ngakhale ndi tsoka Mundibweza,
Koma ndiyimbabe, Mbuye m’ndikhalitse
Mbuye m’ndikhalitse, M’fupi Ndinu.

2. Ngakhale ku thengo, Ndasochera,
M’mdima ndigonapo, E pa mwala.
Koma m’kulotako, Ndiyandikizanso.
Ndiyandikizanso, M’fupi Ndinu.

3. Pajapo ndipenya Pokwerapo,
Angelo atsika Kumwambako,
Ndiwo akodola Kuti ndibwerere,
Kuti ndibwerere, M’fupi Ndinu.

4. Tsono poukanso Wokondwatu,
Ndipeza pomwepo Pali Mlungu;
Ndipo masautso Andisendezanso,
Andisendezanso, M’fupi Ndinu.

5. Podzabwera Iye N’dzanka naye,
Dzuwa ndi nyenyezi Zitsalira;
Pomwe ndiyimbanso, Ndidza pafupipo,
Ndidza pafupipo, Mlungu wanga.

title: 38 - Limbikani Mwa Mulungu
content:
38 - Limbikani Mwa Mulungu

FIRMLY STAND FOR GOD

1 Limbikani mwa Mlungu wanuyo,
Nkana m’dziko muli mavutowo;
Khristu ndiye thanthwe lolimbalo,
Ndi la mphamvu zonsezo.

CHORUS:
Tilimbike kuima pa thanthwe lija,
Thanthwe ndilo Khristuyo;
Ngati tipiriratu tidzankako,
Kuli mpando wa Mlunguyo.

2 Limbikani ndi mtima woti nji,
Inde mwa chikhulupirirocho;
Kristu ndiye thanthwe la mphamvulo,
Agonjetsa tchimolo.

3 Limbikani mwa choonadicho,
Chikuthangatani koposatu;
Kristu ndiye thanthwe lopumamo,
Mmene vuto latha phe.

title: 39 - Thanthwe Lolimba
content:
39 - Thanthwe Lolimba

MY HOPE IS BUILT

1. Chiyembekezo changatu, Chili mwa Yesu Woyera
Sindikhulupira wina Koma dzina la Yesuyo.

CHORUS:
Ndaima pa Khristu Thanthwe, Nthaka yonse ndiyo mchenga,
Nthaka yonse ndiyo mchenga.

2. Pondiphimba ine mdima, Ndipumula mwa Iyeyo,
M’namondwe ndi m’mphepo zonse, Ndithawira kwa Iyeyo.

3. Pangano lake ndi mwazi, Zinditchinjiriza ine,
Ndikalepheratu pena, Ndidzakhalatu mwa Iye.

4. Pamene Iye adzadza, Ndidzapezeke mwa Iye,
Ndiri m’chilungamo chake, Wopanda naye chifukwa.

title: 40 - Poyenda Ndi Mbuye
content:
40 - Poyenda Ndi Mbuye

TRUST AND OBEY

1. Poyenda ndi Mbuye, mkuwala kwakeko, Aunikira m’njira mwathu;
Pakugwira ntchito amakhala nafe, Ndi onse amene amvera.

CHORUS:
Khulupira, palibenso njira, Yakukondwa mwa Yesu,
Komatu kumvera.

2. Mthunzi sungagwetu, pena mtambo mmwamba, Komatu azipirikitsa;
Nkhawa ndi chisoni zidzachoka ngati, Tikhulupira ndi kumvera.

3. Chifukwa cha ntchito ndi zisoni zathu, Adzatilipira mokwana;
Kopandanso imfa, kapena kukwiya, Tidzadalitsika pomvera.

4. Sitingadziwetu zachikondi chake, Mpaka titadziperekatu;
Chifukwa chifundo ndi chimwemwe chake, Amapatsa anthu omvera.

5. Pompo m’chiyanjano tidzakhala naye, Kapena kuyenda ndi Iye;
Ndipo tidzachita chifuniro chake, Tidzakhala omvera ndithu.

title: 41 - Mulungu Akhala Ndi Inu
content:
41 - Mulungu Akhale Ndi Inu

GOD BE WITH YOU!

1. Mulungu akhale ndi inu, Mpaka tidzaonananso;
Atsogoze, asunge ’nu; Mulungu akhale ndi inu.

CHORUS:
Asunga nonsenu, Tikomana ndi Yesu,
Asunga nonsenu, Mulungu akhale ndi inu.

2. Mulungu akhale ndi inu, Ndi mapiko akubisa,
Masiku onse kudyetsa; Mulungu akhale ndi inu.

3. Mulungu akhale ndi inu, Ndi pamene muvutika,
Adzakuthangatani ’nu, Mulungu akhale ndi inu.

4. Mulungu akhale ndi inu, Ndi chikondi chake chonse,
Asunge mzoopsya zonse, Mulungu akhale ndi inu.

title: 42 - Sitidzalekananso
content:
42 - Sitidzalekananso

WITH FRIENDS ON EARTH

1. Tikakhala ndi abwenzitu, M’dziko lathu lino,
Posachedwa timalekana Nao mwa chisoni.

CHORUS:
Sitidzalekana m’mwamba, Sitidzalekana,
M’dziko lokometsetsalo, Sitidzalekana.

2. Timakhala ndi ch’yembekezo, Pakufa anzathu,
Kuti pakutha dziko lino, Tidzakhala nao.

3. Sitidzalekananso ai, M’dziko lokomalo,
Nyimbo za chimwemwe, mtendere, ’Dzayimba kosatha.

title: 43 - Wogona Mwa Ambuye
content:
43 - Wogona Mwa Ambuye

ASLEEP IN JESUS!

1. Wogona mwa Ambuyeyo,
Podzuka sadzaliranso.
Mpumulo wa mtenderetu,
Wosaletseka ndi mdani.

2. Wogona mwa Ambuyeyo,
Wopanda mantha ndi ’mfayo
Chodala ch’yembekezocho,
Cha moyo wa kumwambako

3. Wogona mwa Ambuyeyo,
Akhala mu mtenderewo;
Chisoni chonse chatha phe!
Pobwera ’Ye adzauka.

4. Wogona mwa Ambuyeyo,
Adzamvatu lipengalo;
Adzadzutsidwa mmandamo!
Kupita kwa Ambuyeyo.

title: 44 - Ndidzamdziwa Mombolo Wanga
content:
44 - Ndidzamdziwa Mombolo Wanga

WHEN MY LIFE-WORK IS ENDED

1. Pamene nditatha zintchito zanga zonsezo,
Nditaoloka pa tsidya la nyanja;
Chakufachi chikadzavalatu chosafanso;
Pompo ndidzamdziwa Mombolo wanga.

CHORUS:
Ndidzamdziwa, Ndidzamdziwa, Podzaima pa mbali pakepo,
Ndidzamdziwa, ndidzamdziwa, Ndi misomali m’manja mwake.

2. Moyo wanga udzakondwera pakumuona,
Ndi kuona nkhope yake yowala;
Ndidzamyamika Iye ndi mtima wanga wonse,
Malo adandikonzera kumwamba.

3. Ee! ndidzakondwa pakuona okondedwawo
Omwe ndalekana nawo m’dzikoli;
Koma n’dzayamba ndaonana naye Yesuyo,
Wokondedwa wanga wopambanayo.

4. Kupyolera pa zipata kunka ku mzindawo,
Iye adzanditsogolera ine,
Nyimbo ya nthawi zonse ndidzayimba mokondwa;
Nditamuona Mpulumutsi wanga.

title: 45 - Patseni Bible
content:
45 - Patseni Bible

GIVE ME THE BIBLE

1. Patseni Bible ndilo ndikufuna, Ndi chotitsogolera njirayo;
Monga mapiri oonetsa kwathu, Obweza anthu osocherawo.

CHORUS:
Patseni Bible ndilo mau ake, Mau oyera a Mulunguyo,
Ndilo pangano la chikondi chake, ndi nyali mnjira yonka m’mwambamo.

2. Patseni Bible ndilo ndikufuna, Mmene usweka mtima wangawo;
Patseni mau a Ambuye Yesu, Mau okondweretsa mmtimanga.

3. Patseni Bible ndilo ndikufuna, Nyali ya kusonyeza njirayo,
Mmene ndingagwe lindipulumutsa, Lindisonyeza tchimo langalo.

4. Patseni Bible ndilo ndikufuna, Liunikira a mu mdimawo,
Ndilo chiyembekezo kwa olira, Ndi nyali m’njira yonka m’mwambamo.

title: 46 - Yimbiranso Kwa Ine
content:
46 - Yimbiranso Kwa Ine

SING THEM OVER AGAIN

1. Yimbiranso kwa inetu, Mau a Moyowo;
Ndionenso za iwotu, Mau a moyowo.
Mau abwinowo, Andiphunzitsatu,

CHORUS:
Mau ake, ozizwitsa, Mau a moyowo,
Mau ake, abwinowo, Mau a moyowo.

2. Khristu apatsa onsewo, Mau a moyowo;
Wochimwa ’we akwitana, Mau a moyowo.
Angoperekatu kuti tinke mmwamba,

3. Uitana uthengawo, Mau a moyowo;
Adzakhululukira ’we, Mau a moyowo.
Yesu Mpulumitsi Ayeretsa iwe,

title: 47 - Ndaimirira pa Gombe
content:
47 - Ndaimirira pa Gombe

ON JORDAN’S STORMY BANKS

1. Ndaimirira pa gombe, Ndiyang’anitsitsa,
Ku Kanani wabwinoyo, Komwe ndidzalowa.

CHORUS:
Tidzapumula mdziko lokondwa (lokondwa),
Kuoloka pa gombe lija (lowala),
Tidzayimba nyimbo ya Mose,
Ndikukhala ndi Yesu nthawi zonse.

2. Pa madambo akuluwo, ’Dzawala tsikulo,
Khristu adzalamulira, Nadzachotsa mdima.

3. Ndidzafika uko liti, Ndikudalitsidwa,
N’dzamona liti Atate, Kuti ndikapume?

4. Moyo wanga ukondwera, Kusiya dzikoli;
Nkana namondwe aombe, Sindiopa konse.

title: 48 - Chimwemwe Posachedwa
content:
48 - Chimwemwe Posachedwa

O THERE’LL BE JOY

1. Chimwemwe podzatha ntchitoyi, Podzasonkhana okunkha,
Alikudza ndi zipatso, Ku Yerusalemuko.

CHORUS:
Kudzakhala chimwemwedi,
Chimwemwe cha nthawi zonse,
Chifukwa nthawi yafika,
Yosonkhana okunkha.

(Bass and Tenor):
Chimwemwe posachedwa,
Chimwemwe cha muyaya,
Chifukwa nthawi yafika,
Yosonkhana okunkha.

2. Tidzayimba nyimbo zabwino, Tidzayamika mokondwa,
Tidzatama Khristu Mfumu, Mu mzinda watsopano.

3. Chimwemwe chitidikirako, Ku malo a chikhuduwo;
Yesu ali kuwakonza, Mu Mzinda watsopano.

title: 49 - Ganizo Lokoma
content:
49 - Ganizo Lokoma

ONE SWEETLY SOLEMN THOUGHT

1. Ganizo lokoma, Limadza m’mtimamu;
Ndili pafupi ndi kwathu, Koposa kalelo.

CHORUS:
Pafupitu, Ndi kwathuko;
Ndili pafupi ndi kwathu, Koposa kalelo.

2. Kufupi ndi Tate, Komwe kuli malo;
Ku mpando wa Yesu Mbuye Ku nyanja yoyera.

3. Ndili kupitatu, Nditula katundu;
Ndisiya mtanda wangawo, Kuvala korona.

title: 50 - Bwinoli Tipita
content:
50 - Bwinoli Tipita

THERE'S A LAND

1. Kuli dziko labwino m’mwamba
Lakuwala koposa dzuwa,
Ndi Atate akonza malo,
Pokhalira ife komweko.

CHORUS:
Bwinoli tipita,
Tikomana ku dziko lija (lijalo).

2. Tidzayimba komweko nyimbo,
Za abwino omvera Yesu,
Sitidzamvatu zisoninso,
Tidzakondwa masiku onse.

3. Tidzatama Atate wathu,
Kuti iye ’napatsa Yesu,
Kuchotsera zochimwa zonse,
Ndi kutidalitsira ife.

title: 51 - Mutibatizenso
content:
51 - Mutibatizenso

BAPTIZE US NEW

1. Mutibatize ndi mphamvu yanu,
Mutitsitsimutse mwa nsoni zanu.

CHORUS:
Tikupemphani Mbuye wathu Yesu,
Mutibatizetu ndi mzimu wanu.

2. Osayenera ndi ochimwa’fe
Mutitsuke ife m’zoipa zathu.

3. Tifuna nkhunda ya m’mwamba idze
Idzatidalitse mwa nsoni zanu.

4. Imvani mau ochoka m’mwamba,
Ndiwe mwana wanga wokondedwayo.

CHORUS (wotsiriza):
Tigwadira Inu Mwana wa nkhosa,
Tikupembedzani kosatha, Amen.

title: 52 - Kasupe Wa Madalitso
content:
52 - Kasupe Wa Madalitso

COME, THOU FOUNT

1. Idzani ndi madalitso, Mtima wanga uyimbe;
Nsisi zanu zisaleke, Kuti tiyamike ’Nu,
Phunzitseni kumvera ’Nu, Kuti ndikudziweni,
Pamene chiyembekezo Chidzaza mtima wanga.

2. Ndinutu thandizo langa, Mwandifikitsa pano,
Ndipo mwa chifundo chanu Ndikafika kwathuko.
Anandifuna Yesuyo, Posochera mtalimo;
Anakhetsa mwazi wake Kundiombola ine.

3. M’ndipatse chisomo chanu, Pakuti ndichisowa!
Mundikokere kwa Inu Ndi chikondi chanucho.
Sindifuna kusochera, Kukusiyani Inu,
Tengani Mtima wangawu; Ukhale wanu konse

title: 53 - Mzimu Ndi Mtsogoziyo
content:
53 - Mzimu Ndi Mtsogoziyo

HOLY SPIRIT, FAITHFUL GUIDE

1. Mzimu ndi mtsogoziyo M’njira ya Chikhristuyo,
Mtitsogoze ndinutu, Pa ulendo wathuwu.
Miyoyo ikondweratu, Pomva mau akewo;
Pakunena Mzimuyo, “Osochera, bwerani.”

2. Bwenzi lathu ndinutu, Mkhale mfupi nafetu,
Msatisiye tokhafe, Pakuyenda m’mdimamu.
Pakuomba mphepozo, Timaopa m’mtimamo
Tsono timva mauwo, “Osochera, bwerani.”

3. Mnene nchito yathatu, Mmene tidikira ’Nu,
Pakukhumba m’mwambamo, Tsono tipempherabe.
Nthawi ya mavutowo Tikhulupirira ’Nu,
Tsono timva mauwo, “Osochera, bwerani.”

title: 54 - Ndifuna Inu, Mbuyanga
content:
54 - Ndifuna Inu, Mbuyanga

ONE THING I FOR THE LORD

1. Ndifuna Inu, Mbuyanga, Chifukwa ndagwa mthopemo,
Ndi madzi pena motowo, M’nditsuke ’ne, mnditsuke ’ne.

CHORUS:
Mnditsuke ’ne mu mtimamo, Ndi madzi pena motowo.
Mnditsuke ’ne machimowo, Achoketu mu mtimanga.

2. Mukatsegula masowa, Ndidzakuyamikani ’Nu.
Komabe Mtima woyera, Udzapambana zonsezo.

3. Ukatsukidwa mtimawo Adzatseguka masowo.
Chifukwa kuti mwa Inu, Ndionamo za mmwambamo.

4. Ndayesa kudzikonzatu, Kuchotsa tchimo langalo
Ngakhale ndayesetsatu, Zoipazo zilipobe.

title: 55 - Kodi Mwalandira Yesu?
content:
55 - Kodi Mwalandira Yesu?

HAVE YOU BEEN TO JESUS?

1. Kodi mwalandira Yesu Mbuyeyo?
Kodi mwasamba mmwazi wake?
Mwakhulupirira mwa chisomo ’ke?
Kodi mwasamba mmwazi wake?

CHORUS:
Kodi mwasambamo,
Mmwazi wabwino wa Yesuyo?
Kodi mwayeretsa mtima wanuwo?
Kodi mwasamba mmwazi wake?

2. Kodi mukuyenda ndi Ambuyeyo?
Kodi mwasamba mmwazi wake?
Mwapumula mwa Wopachikidwayo?
Kodi mwasamba mmwazi wake?

3. Kodi mwakonzeka pa kubwera ’Ye?
Kodi mwasamba mmwazi wake?
Kuti mukalowe m’malo abwino,
Kodi mwasamba mmwazi wake?

4. Tayanitu zakunyansa zanuzo,
Kodi mwasamba mmwazi wake?
Wakuchotsa tchimo lanu lonselo,
Kodi mwasamba mmwazi wake?

title: 56 - Ambuye, Ndiri Kudza
content:
56 - Ambuye, Ndiri Kudza

I’VE WANDERED FAR AWAY

1. Ndasocherera kutali, Mbuye ndibwera;
Ndayenda m’njira za mdima; Mbuye ndibwera.

CHORUS:
Ndidzako! Ndidzako! Ndili kudzako!
Ndi chifundo cha Mbuye; Ndili kudzako.

2. Ndamwaza zaka zambiri, Mbuye ndibwera.
Ndilapa ndithu machimo, Mbuye ndibwera.

3. Ndatopa nazo zoipa, Mbuye ndibwera.
Ndimvera mau anuwo, Mbuye ndibwera.

4. Mtima wanga uwawadi, Mbuye ndibwera,
Mundichiritsa Mbuy’anga; Mbuye ndibwera.

5. Ndisowa mwazi wanuwo, Mbuye ndibwera;
Munditsuke ndiyere mbu, Mbuye ndibwera

title: 57 - Yemwe Afuna
content:
57 - Yemwe Afuna

WHOSOEVER HEARETH

1. Yemwe alikumva! fuula mau:
Tumizani mthenga m’dziko monsemo;
Lalikani anthu kuli konseko;
Yemwe afuna adze.

CHORUS:
Omwe afuna, omwe afuna
Uza za chimwemwe m’dambo ndi m’phiri;
Atate wokonda aitana’ke
Omwe afuna adze.

2. Yemwe alikudza, asachedwe,
Pakhomo patseguka, lowa msanga;
Yesu ndiye njiratu yakuona
Yemwe afuna adze.

3. Yemwe afunitsa za mtendere,
Yemwe afunitsa adzakhalabe;
Yemwe afunitsa moyo wosatha:
Yemwe afuna adze.

title: 58 - Mumbveke Mbuyeyo
content:
58 - Mumbveke Mbuyeyo

ALL HAIL THE POWER

1. Tamani mphamvu ya Yesu angelo agwade;
Tulutsanitu korona mumveke Mbuyeyo
Tulutsanitu korona mumveko Mbuyeyo.

2. Inu osankhidwa ake, Owomboledwa’nu,
Tamani Mpulumutsiyo, mumveke Mbuyeyo;
Tamani Mpulumutsiyo mumveko Mbuyeyo.

3. Anthu onse ndi mitundu, Pa dziko linotu,
Am’lemekeze Mfumuyo, mumveke Mbuyeyo;
Am’lemekeze Mfumuyo, mumveke Mbuyeyo.

4. Tifuna kuti komweko, Tikamgwadire’Ye
Tidzayimba kosaleka mumveke Mbuyeyo
Tidzayimba kosaleka mumveke Mbuyeyo.

title: 59 - Yesu Bwenzi Mtimanga
content:
59 - Yesu Bwenzi Mtimanga

JESUS LOVER OF MY SOUL

1. Yesu, Bwenzi Mtimanga, Ndithawira kwanuko.
Pakuuka madziwo, Pakuomba mphepoyo.
Mundibise Mbuyanga, Likaleka vutolo,
Mnditsogoze bwinotu, Mndilandire kwanuko.

2. Pobisala penai, Ndingokangamira ’Nu.
Ndiri wosauka ’ne, Mbuye, msandisiyedi.
Wondithandiza wanga ’Nu, Ndikukhulupira ’Nu,
Mu mapiko anuwo Mundifunde inedi.

3. Khristu, Mukwaniradi, Mndikhutitse mmtimanga;
Msangalatse ifetu, Ovutika tonsefe.
Ine ndi woipadi! Inu wakuyera mbu;
Ine ndi wonyengadi, Woonadi Inutu.

4. Nsoni zanu ziinga Zakuipa zangazo.
Mundisunge woti mbe, Ee! ndi mwazi wanuwo.
Pa chitsime chanucho Mundimwetse Inudi;
Mtima wanga madziwo Adzayendayendabe.

title: 60 - Yesu Chimwemwe Chathu
content:
60 - Yesu Chimwemwe Chathu

JESUS, THOU JOY OF LOVING HEARTS

1. Yesu chimwemwe chathucho, Chitsime ndinu cha moyo.
Ku’nika kwa ’nthu onsewo, Tibwera kwanu Mbuyathu.

2. Polawa mkate wa moyo Tilakalaka kudyanso.
Pakumwa madzi a moyo Tikwanitsidwa ndi Inu.

3. Mtima ufuna Inuyo Kumene mtitumizako
Tidzakondwera ngatitu Tigwira Inu kolimba.

4. Yesu, mukhale nafetu; Musangalatse ifenso.
Muchotse mdima wa tchimo, Muwale mdziko lonseli.

title: 61 - Inde Ndifuna Kumvatu
content:
61 - Inde Ndifuna Kumvatu

MORE ABOUT JESUS

1. Inde ndifuna kumvatu, Za chikondano chakecho,
Cha Yesu Mbuye wangayo, Zomwe anamva kalelo.

CHORUS:
E! Zina za Yesu, E! zina za Yesu,
Inde, ndilira mmtimamo, Chipulumutso chakecho.

2. Zina za Yesu ndimvetu Kuti ndichite zakezo.
Mzimu Woyera mudzetu, Ndiphunzitseni zonsezo.

3. Yesu ndi mmau mwakemo, Inde ndicheza nayeyo,
Liu ndimamva mbukhumo, Ndilo la Yesu Mbuyeyo.

4. Zina za Yesu mmwambamo, Ali pa mpando pakepo,
Udze Ufumu wakewo, Ndiyetu Mfumu ponsepo.

title: 62 - Ambuyanga Yesu, Ndikonda Inu
content:
62 - Ambuyanga Yesu, Ndikonda Inu

MY JESUS, I LOVE THEE

1. Ambuyanga Yesu, Ndikonda Inu,
Ndisiya zoipa chifukwa chanu;
Ambuye wabwino ndi Mplumutsiyo;
Ndikonda tsopano koposa kale.

2. Ndikonda chifukwa munakonda ’ne;
Mnafera pa mtengo kuombola ’ne;
Mukhululukira zoipa zonse;
Ndikonda tsopano koposa kale.

3. Ndidzakukondani kosalekai,
Ndidzakutamani masiku onse.
Mpakatu ndidzafa ndidzanenabe,
Ndikonda tsopano koposa kale.

4. Ku malo owalo kumwamba komwe
Ndidzakuongani, Ambuye Yesu;
Ntavala korona ndizayimbabe,
Ndikonda tsopano koposa kale.

title: 63 - Ndingayere Bwanji ’Ne?
content:
63 - Ndingayere Bwanji ’Ne?

WHAT CAN WASH AWAY MY SIN?

1. Ndingayere bwanji ’ne? Mwazi wa Ambuye Yesu.
Nch’ani chindichizanso? Mwazi wa Ambuye Yesu.

CHORUS:
Mtsinje wa mwaziwo, Undiyeretsanso;
Sin’dziwa winanso, Mwazi wa Ambuye ndiwo.

2. Pakudetswa ndiona, Mwazi wa Ambuye yesu.
Pakuchimwa nditchula, Mwazi wa Ambuye Yesu

3. Zina sizikwanatu, Mwazi wa Ambuye ndiwo.
Ntchito zanga zichepa, Mwazi wa Ambuye ndiwo.

4. Ndimakhulupiradi, Mwazi wa Ambuye Yesu.
Zolungama zangazi, Mwazi wa Ambuye Yesu.

5. Poyamika ndiyimba Mwazi wa Ambuye Yesu.
Ndithokoza Mbuyanga, Mwazi wa Ambuye Yesu.

title: 64 - Kodi Walemedwa M’mtima Mwako?
content:
64 - Kodi Walemedwa M’mtima Mwako?

ARE YOU WEARY?

1. Kodi walemedwa m’mtima mwako?
Nena kwa Yesu, nena kwa Yesu
Kodi uli kumva za chisoni?
Nena kwa Yesu yekha.

CHORUS:
Nena kwa Yesu, nena kwa Yesu,
Ndi bwenzi labwinotu.
Ndiye bwenzi lopambana onse,
Nena kwa Yesu yekha.

2. Kodi ukulira mwa chisoni?
Nena kwa Yesu, nena kwa Yesu;
Kodi tchimo lina labisika?
Nena kwa Yesu yekha.

3. Kodi umaopa za chisoni?
Nena kwa Yesu, nena kwa Yesu;
Kodi ulikuda nkhawa m’mtima?
Nena kwa Yesu yekha.

4. Kodi ukulingalira imfa?
Nena kwa Yesu, nena kwa Yesu;
Kodi ukulira kuti adze?
Nena kwa Yesu yekha.

title: 65 - N’kwabwino Kukhulupirira
content:
65 - N’kwabwino Kukhulupirira

’TIS SO SWEET TO TRUST

1. N’kwabwino kukhulupira, M’mau ake a Yesu;
Kupuma m’malonjezo’ke, Ndimtama nthawi zonse.

CHORUS:
Ndikhulupirira Yesu, Ndimtama nthawi zonse;
Yesu ali wa chifundo, Ndimtama nthawi zonse.

2. N’kwabwino kukhulupira, Mwazi wake wa Yesu;
Kungomkhulupira Iye Adzatitsuka ife.

3. N’kwabwino kukhulupira, Kuti achotse tchimo;
Nadzatipatsa’fe moyo, Chimwemwe ndi mtendere.

4. Ndikondwa kumdziwa Iye, Mpulumutsi wangayo;
N’dziwa adzakhala nane, Mpaka chimaliziro.

title: 66 - Poyambapo Ndakondwadi
content:
66 - Poyambapo Ndakondwadi

O HAPPY DAY!

1. Poyambapo ndakondwadi, Ntapeza Inu Mbuyetu,
Ndiyimba nyimbo yomweyi, Kukondwa sindikhala du.

CHORUS:
Kalelo! Kalelo! Wandisambitsa mmtimamo;
Wandiweruza lomwelo, Kupemba ndi kukondwako.
Kalelo! Kalelo! Wandisambitsa mmtimamo.

2. Ndamuza ndimakhalatu Ku nyumba kwake komweko;
Mnyamata wake ndinetu, Ndampatsa Mtima wonsewo.

3. Omwewo mapanganowo, Sitilekana ifetu.
Ndamvera ine mauwo, Wandiloleza m’mtimamo.

4. Ndampatsa mtima wonsewo, Kupuma mwa Ambuyeyo:
Ndikhala, osamlekai, Kuthawa ndi kumsiya ’Ye.

title: 67 - Idzani Nonsenu Okonda Yesu
content:
67 - Idzani Nonsenu Okonda Yesu

COME, WE THAT LOVE THE LORD

1. Idzani nonsenu, Okonda Yesuyo,
Tiyimbe nyimbo yabwino, Tiyimbe nyimbo yabwino
Ku mpando wakewo, Ku mpando wakewo.

CHORUS:
Tiyende (tu) pamodzi, Tilikupita kumwamba;
Akhristu tilikupita (pita), ku Ziyoni wabwinoyo.

2. Ngakhale enawo Aleke kwimbako,
Akhristu ’fe tidzayimba, Akhristu ’fe tidzayimba
Kumlemekeza ’Ye, Kumlemekeza ’Ye.

3. Akhristu tonsefe, Tikondwe mdzikoli,
Koposa anthu enawo, Koposa anthu enawo,
Tisanafikeko, Tisanafikeko.

4. Tiyimbe mokondwa, Misozi iume;
Poyenda kunka kwathuko, Poyenda kunka kwathuko,
Kwa Mlungu wathuyo, Kwa Mlungu wathuyo.

title: 68 - Ndikonda Kunena Ndaomboledwa
content:
68 - Ndikonda Kunena Ndaomboledwa

REDEEMED! HOW I LOVE TO PROCLAIM IT

1. Ndikonda kunena chifukwa, Ndaomboledwa ndi mwazi!
Ndaomboledwa mwa chifundo, Ndine wake nthawi zonse.

CHORUS:
Ndi mwazitu (ndi mwazitu) wa Yesu, ndaomboledwa;
Ndine wake (ndine wake) kosatha, ndaomboledwa.

2. Ndinetu wokondwa mwa Yesu, Kukondwa kosaneneka;
Ndziwa kuti kuwala kwake Kumakhalabe ndi ine.

3. Ndisinkha za Mombolo wanga, Tsiku lonse ndisinkha ’Ye,
Ndiyimba wosakhala chete, Ndiyimba chikondi chake.

4. Ndidziwa kuti ndzamuona, Mfumu amene ndimkonda;
Yemwe amanditsogolera, Ndi kundisunga usiku.

5. Korona ali kudikira, Mmalo anga owalawo;
Msanga ndi oyera mtimawo Ndidzakhala ndi Ambuye.

title: 69 - Tidzakhalitsa Pa Kasupe
content:
69 - Tidzakhalitsa Pa Kasupe

WE’LL TARRY BY THE LIVING WATERS

1. Tidzakhalitsa pa kasupe, Wa madzi akewo.
Kumene Yesu adikira, Kupatsa moyowo.

CHORUS:
Tidzakhalitsa pa kasupe (wathu),
’Dzakhalitsa pa kasupe (wathu),
’Dzakhalitsa pa kasupe (wathu).
Pali madzi a moyo.

2. Tikatopatu ndi ulendo, Tidzapumulatu,
Pa mtsinje wopambana yonse, Wokondwakondwatu.

3. Idzani nonsenu kwa Khristu, Mudzamwe madziwo,
Adzatimwetsa kwa ulere, Kasupe wakeyo.

title: 70 - Tidzaima Bwanji Pa Chiweruzo?
content:
70 - Tidzaima Bwanji Pa Chiweruzo?

WHEN JESUS SHALL GATHER

1. Mmene Yesu adzasonkhatu, Mitundu yonse ya dziko,
Kodi tidzaima bwanji’fe Pa mpando wachiweruzo?

CHORUS:
Adzasonkhanitsa tiriguyo, Koma mankhusu adzataya;
Nanga tidzaima bwanji ko’ Pa tsiku la chiweruzo?

2. Kodi tidzamva mau ake, Wachita bwino iwetu,
Kapena tidzanjenjemera, Tidzachotsedwa ku mpando?

3. Iye adzakondwera ndithu, Kuona owomboledwa,
Adzawabvekatu zobvala, Pa kugwadira Mbuyeyo.

4. Tiyeni tidikire tsono, Ndi nyali zathu zowala,
Poitana Mkwati ku phwando Tidzakhale okonzeka.

5. Tikakhala okonzekatu, Tikakhala opirira;
Podzatha ulendo wathuwu, Tidzanka naye kumwamba.

title: 71 - Kodi Dzina Langa Lalembedwamo?
content:
71 - Kodi Dzina Langa Lalembedwamo?

IS MY NAME WRITTEN THERE?

1. Mbuye sindisamala kukhala wachuma;
Ndifuna kukalowa m’dziko la kumwamba;
M’bukhu lokometsetsa la ufumu wanu,
Kodi lalembedwamo Mbuye dzina langa.

CHORUS:
Kodi dzina langa, Lalembedwa m’mwamba?
M’bukhu la ufumuwo, Kodi lalembedwa?

2. Machimo anga alipo ambiri-mbiri,
Koma mwazi wa Mpulumutsi wandikwana;
Chifukwa lonjezano lanu lilipobe,
Ngakhale afiire, ndidzawayeretsa.

3. Ku mzinda wokoma wa malo owala’wo
Ndi anthu ovala za ulemelerozo;
Kumene choipa sichidzaonongako,
Kodi dzina langali lilipo m’bukhumo?

title: 72 - Tidzaima Bwanji Pa Chiweruzo?
content:
72 - Tidzaima Bwanji Pa Chiweruzo?

THE JUDGMENT HAS SET

1. Chiweruziro ndithu chayambidwa, Mabukhu atsegulidwa;
Ndipo ntchito iri yonseyo M’lungu adzaweruza.

CHORUS:
Kodi ife tidzatani Pa tsiku lalikululo?
Kodi tidzafika kwa Iye machimo atatsukidwa?

2. Ayamba kuweruza akufa, Msanga aweruza a moyo,
Mwa zolembedwa m’mabukhu, Adzaweruza onsewo.

3. Kodi tidzatani pa nthawiyo, Povumbulutsidwa machimo!
Podzaweruzidwa mlandu, Kodi tidzaloledwatu?

title: 73 - Pobwera Mfumu
content:
73 - Pobwera Mfumu

CALLED TO THE FEAST

1. Taitanidwatu ku phwando, Kukhala nao anthu ake;
Chidzaonekanji kwa ife, Pobwera Mfumu?

CHORUS:
Pobwera Mfumu, mbale, Pobwera Mfumu!
Chidzaonekanji kodi, Pobwera Mfumu?

2. Adzavala korona Iye, Amene anafera anthu;
Tidzamuona bwino-bwino, Pobwera Mfumu.

3. Monga kung’anima kwa mphezi, Zobisika zidzaoneka
Tidzadziwana wina mnzake, Pobwera Mfumu.

4. Adzaona anthu akewo, Atavalatu zoyerazo;
Tikapirira tidzakondwa, Pobwera Mfumu.

5. Kulekana kwa nthawi zonse, Kulira kwa anthu ochimwa,
Kudzakhala koopsa ndithu, Pobwera Khristu.

6. Ambuye tilandirenitu, Tikhale pafupi nanutu,
Kuti tisadzaope konse, Pobwera Inu.

title: 74 - M’mawa Tidzafesa
content:
74 - M’mawa Tidzafesa

SOWING IN THE MORNING

1. M’mawa tidzafesa mbeu zakukoma,
Msana ndi usiku tidzafesanso,
Nyengo ya masika tidzatema m’munda
Tidzabwera tonse ndi zipatsozo.

CHORUS:
Ndi zipatsozo, ndi zipatsozo
Tidzabwera tonse ndi zipatsozo.

2. Tidzifesa m’dzuwa tidzifesa m’thunzi,
Sitiopa ife mtambo ndi mphepo.
Athatu masika nchitozi zidzatha,
Tidzabwera tonse ndi zipatsozo.

3. Tingolira kaya koma tidzafesa
Mbeu za Ambuye ntchito ya Yesu.
Adzachotsa msozi adzatilandira,
Tidzabwera tonse ndi zipatsozo.

title: 75 - A! Mbusa Wanga Ndimvatu
content:
75 - A! Mbusa Wanga Ndimvatu

HARK! ’TIS THE SHEPHERED’S VOICE

1. A! Mbusa wanga ndimvatu, Uko ku chipululuko,
Zilira nkhosa zaketu, Zili kutali mkholamo.

CHORUS:
Bwezatu, bwezatu, Bweza zonse moopsamo;
Bwezatu, bwezatu, Bweza zakezo kwa Yesu.

2. Ndani afuna kunkako, Kukazipeza nkhosazo?
Ndani adzathandizayo, Kuti zifunde m’kholamo?

3. Etu! zilira konseko, Zili ku phiri ko’psako,
Imva, anena Mwiniyo, “Kweye, upeze Nkhosazo.”

title: 76 - Ndikonda Kuuzabe
content:
76 - Ndikonda Kuuzabe

I LOVE TO TELL THE STORY

1. Ndikonda kuuzabe, nthano ya Yesu, ndi
Zosaoneka zomwe, za m’mwamba zakezi;
Ndikonda kuuzabe, za cikondi chake,
Kubukitsa mbiriyo ya Mwana wa Mlungu.

CHORUS:
Ndikonda kuuzabe, za Yesu mwini wanga,
Za chifundo chakecho, Ndiyimbe kumwamba.

2. Ndikonda kuuzabe, nthano yozizwitsa
Chifukwa ipambana, zonse zina ndamva;
Ndikonda kuuzabe, zomwe achitira
Kwa ine ndi kwa onse, a m’mvera ndi mtima.

3. Ndikonda kuuzabe, nthano yokomayo
Nthawi zonse ndiyimva, ndisekereranso.
Ndifuna kuuzabe kumvetsa amene
Sanamve za Mulungu, Wopulumutsayo.

4. Ndikonda kuuzabe, Mpulumutsi wanga
Natsika kumwambako natifera dala
Nakweranso kwawoko nadzadzanso Iye,
Kusonkhanitsa ake, Naye kukhalabe.

title: 77 - Kufunafuna Otaikawo
content:
77 - Kufunafuna Otaikawo

SEEKING THE LOST

1. Kufunatu E! ndi mtina wonse,
Kufuna akusocherawo;
Lalika kuti Yesu anati,
Idzani nonse kwa Inetu.

CHORUS:
Pitanitu (inde) konse konseko,
Mukabwere ndi (anthu) osochera;
M’khola lake la (Yesu) Mpulumutsi.
Nafera’Ye anthu (E) ochimwa.

2. Kufunatu ndi kutsogolera,
Anthu ofoka’wo kwa Yesu;
Kutsogolera njira yabwino,
Yonka ku moyotu wosatha.

3. Tidzitero ponka kulalika,
Kutsata Yesu tsiku n’tsiku;
Ndi kuthangata ofoka onse,
Kuwatsogolera kwa Yesu.

title: 78 - Kupulumutsa Omwe Ali Kufa
content:
78 - Kupulumutsa Omwe Ali Kufa

RESCUE THE PERISHING

1. Pulumutsa omwe ali kufatu,
Uwachotse m’manda a uchimo;
Lilira ochimwa, nuwadzutsetu,
Nuwauze za Yesu Mbuyeyo.

CHORUS:
Pulumutsa omwe ali kufatu,
Yesu wachifundo alanditsa.

2. Ngakhale amkana, Iye alinda,
Afuna kulandira olapa.
Awapembedzera moona Mtima,
Adzawakhululukira iwo.

3. Mu Mtima wa munthu muli zambiri,
Koma Yesu azichotsa zonse;
Atakhudzidwa ndi chikondi chake,
Nsinga za Satana zidzaduka.

4. Pulumutsa omwe ali kufatu
Limbitsa othodwa ndi olema;
Kwabwezera m’njira yopapatiza,
Ndi kuwauza za Mpulumutsi

title: 79 - Kufuna Antchito
content:
79 - Kufuna Antchito

FAR AND NEAR THE FIELDS

1. Mindatu yayera kale
Dzinthu dzonse dzachanso;
Pafupi ndi kutaliko
M’dziko lonse lapansi.

CHORUS:
Mbuye tikupempha Inu,
Kokosani antchito;
Atumizeni msangatu,
Nthawi isanethe’i.

3. Atumizeni m’mawatu,
Ndi nthawi ya usana;
Ngakhale dzuwa lilowa,
Agwirebe ntchitoyo.

4. Ndipo inu otumidwa,
Gwirani ntchitoyo;
Ndipo potsiriza ntchito
Mudzadza ndi chimwemwe.

title: 80 - Tinke Ife Ku Ntchito Ya Mulungu
content:
80 - Tinke Ife Ku Ntchito Ya Mulungu

TO THE WORK!

1. Tinke ife ku ntchito ya Ambuye;
Tizitsata mapazi a Mbuye Yesu.
Mau ake adzapatsa mphamvu yake,
Ndipo ndi mtima wonse tigwire ntchito.

CHORUS:
Gwirani ntchitoyo, Gwirani ntchitoyo,
Mpakatu Yesuyo, Adzabweranso mdzikoli.

2. Tinke ife ku ntchito ya Mlungu wathu,
Yakudyetsa, Kumwetsa osowa onse.
Ndi mbendela ya mtanda tidzayendatu,
Pakulalika chipulumutso chake.

3. Tinke ife ku ntchito ya Mlungu wathu,
Ntchito ya kuchenjeza ilipo lero;
Ndi kwa anthu a mdima a mdziko lino,
Ndi kukweza Ambuye Ndi Mfumu yathu.

4. Tichitebe ntchito za Mlungu wathu,
Posachedwa Ambuye adzabweranso;
Ndipo ife tidzanka kumwamba naye,
Nyimbo zathu zokoma tidzayimbabe.

title: 81 - Gwira Zinchito Zake
content:
81 - Gwira Zinchito Zake

WORK, FOR THE NIGHT IS COMING

1. Gwira zintchito zake, Mdima ukudzatu,
Yamba mmamawa ndithu, Kuli kuchatu.
Gwiranso msana monse, Mpaka madzulowo.
Gwira, usiku udza, Posachedwatu.

2. Gwira zintchito zake, Mdima ukudzatu,
Gwira masana onse, Kusanadei.
Udzapumula bwino, Potha zintchitozo,
Gwira, usiku udza, posachedwatu.

3. Mkhristu gwiratu ntchito, Mdima ukudzatu,
Dzuwa lapita kale, Msanga kuda bi!
Gwira madzulodzulo, Usanagonetu,
Msanga zintchito zonse Tere zithatu.

title: 82 - M’mawa
content:
82 - M’mawa

LORD, IN THE MORNING

1. M’dzamva mau anga m’mawa
Mbuye popemphera;
Ndidzayang’ana kwa Inu
M’mene ndipemphera.

2. Mzimu anditsogolere
M’njira zolungama!
Andisonyeze njira za
Ntchito zanga zonse.

3. Anthu okonda dzinalo
Adzakwanitsidwa;
Mulungu adzawaphimba
Ndi chikopa chake.

title: 83 - Anthu Ambiri Ayimba
content:
83 - Anthu Ambiri Ayimba

O FOR A THOUSAND TONGUES

1. Anthu ambiri ayimba, Lodala dzina la Mbuye!
Ulemelero kwa Mlungu, Lodala dzina la Mbuye.

CHORUS:
Dzina lodala, dzina lodala, dzina la Ambuye Yesu.
Dzina lodala, dzina lodala, dzina la Ambuye Yesu.

2. Dzinali lichotsa mantha, Lodala dzina la Mbuye!
Lili nyimbo ya ochimwa, Lodala dzina la Mbuye.

3. Athyola mphamvu ya tchimo, Lodala dzina la Mbuye!
Mwazi wake utitsuka, Lodala dzina la Mbuye.

title: 84 - M’manja Mwake
content:
84 - M’manja Mwake

UNDER HIS WINGS

1. M’manja mwakemo ndapulumutsidwa,
Ngakhale mavuto achuluka,
Ndikhulupirira ndikudalira,
Adzandisunga Wondiombola.

CHORUS:
M’manja mwake, m’manja mwake,
Adzandichotsamo ndani,
M’manja mwake ndidzakhalitsa,
Inde ku nthawi zosatha.

2. M’manja mwake chimwemwecho ndapeza,
Ndibisale ku mayeso onse,
Mofunda ndithu ndidzakhalitsamo,
M’manja a Yesu n’dzakhalitsane

3. M’manja mwake ndi populumukira,
M’mene uvutika mtima wanga,
M’mene abwenzi sangandithangate,
Ndidzapumulatu m’manja mwake.

title: 85 - Ndiyimba Mphamvu Ya Mulungu
content:
85 - Ndiyimba Mphamvu Ya Mulungu

I SING THE MIGHTY POWER

1. Ndiyimba mphamvu ya Mlungu, wolenga mapiri,
Yemwe anapanga zinyanja ndi mlengalenga;
Ndiyimba nzeru imene inapanga dzuwa;
Mwezi uwala usiku, ndi nyenyezi zomwe.

2. Ndiyimba ubwino wake, Wakupatsa kudya;
Analenga zonse ndi mau, nayamikira.
Mbuye munazikhazika mozizwitsa ndithu!
Zinthu za m’dziko lapansi ndi zam’mbwamba zomwe.

3. Mbeu ndi maluwa omwe, zidziwitsa Inu;
Mitambo yonse ndi namondwe, zimvera Inu.
Za moyo zonse zimasamalidwa ndi Inu,
Tilibe kothawira’ko, koma kwanu kokha.

title: 86 - Gwadwani Pa Maso Pa Mfumu
content:
86 - Gwadwani Pa Maso Pa Mfumu

O WORSHIP THE KING

1. Gwadani pa maso a Mfumuyo,
Yimbani chikondi cha Mbuyeyo;
Iyeyo n’chikopa, mtetezi wathu,
Amene akhala kumwamba komwe.

2. Yimbani za mphamvu ya Mlunguyo,
Ndi za nsisi zake kwa ifetu;
Amakhala m’mphezi ndi m’bingu momwe,
Ambuye avala zoyeratu mbu.

3. Chikondi chake ndi chakuyatu,
Chimaonekera mu dzuwalo;
M’mitsinje, m’mapiri, m’madambo momwe,
Mu mvula, mu mame, ndi m’zina zonse.

4. Ndifetu opanda mphamvu konse,
Tithemba pa Inu, Mbuyathuyo;
Mwa nsisi za inu mtisunge ife;
Mtetezi ndi Mlengi ndi Bwenzi lathu.

title: 87 - Tate Tikudza Kwa Inu.
content:
87 - Tate Tikudza Kwa Inu.

FATHER, WE COME TO THEE

1. Tate tikudzatu, Kwa inu, Mbuyathu,
Ngaka yolimbayo, Tipempha ’fe;
Dziko ndi la mdima Mmene mulibe ’Nu,
Mtisangalatse ’fe, Tate wathu.

CHORUS:
Tate tibweratu kwa Inuko,
’Mvani popempha ’fe, Tate wathu.

2. Mtipulumutse ’fe Kwa mdani wathuyo,
Mutithangate ’fe Mu vutoli;
Ndife ofo’katu, Limbikitsani ’fe,
Ndi mphamvu yanuyo, Tate wathu.

3. Tipempha nsisizo Kuti tikhaletu
Mu njira yanuyo, Tate wathu.
Mtsitsogolere ’fe Mpaka mudzabwera,
Ndipo tidzapuma kwa inuko.

title: 88 - Msandipitirire Yesu
content:
88 - Msandipitirire Yesu

PASS ME NOT!

1. Msandipitirire Yesu, Ndikupemphani.
Muli kudalitsa ena, Mndidalitse ’ne.

CHORUS:
Yesu, Mbuye, Mundimveretu.
Mmene muitana ena, Msandilekatu.

2. Ndigwadira Inu, Yesu, Musandikane;
Ndikalapatu machimo, Ndidzachita mwayi.

3. Nkhope yanu ndifunitsa, Sindiyenera;
Mtima wanga muchiritsa, Nthenda zangazi.

4. Yesu ndinutu chitsime, Cha chimwemwecho;
Sindifuna wina konse, Koma Inutu.

title: 89 - Zokoma Ndithu Nthawizi
content:
89 - Zokoma Ndithu Nthawizi

SWEET HOUR OF PRAYER

1. Zokoma ndithu nthawizi, Zakupemphera kwanuko,
Ku mpando wa chifumuwo, Ndiuza zanga zonsezo;
Pakundivuta m’mtimanga, Ndimamuuza Yesuyo,
Pakundiyesa mdaniyo, Ndinena kwa Ambuyeyo.

2. Zokoma ndithu nthawizi, Zopempha kwa Mulunguyo,
Kwa Yemwe ali wo’natu, Kwa Iye wodalitsa ’fe.
Ndilakalaka Iyeyu, Amene ’nandiferatu,
Posautsika m’dzikoli, Ndipempha m’dzina la Yesu.

3. Zokoma etu nthawizi, Za kupemphera Mbuyeyo;
Zimandisangalatsa ’ne, M’mavuto anga onsewo.
Ndilakalaka mphotho ya Kumwamwamba komweko.
Ndigwira mosalekatu Pakupemphera kwanuko.

title: 91 - Linda Ndi Kupemphera
content:
91 - Linda Ndi Kupemphera

WATCH, FOR THE TIME IS SHORT

1. Dikirani lero nthawi ili kutha;
Mungagwe m’zoipa linda ndi pemphero;
Thupi ndi lofoka mdaniyo ngwa mphamvu;
Dikirani nonse Mkwati ali kudza.

CHORUS:
Linda pempha, linda pempha;
Usiku ndi usana dikirani ndi kupemphera.

(Tenor and Bass):
Linda pempha, linda pempha;
Linda pempha, linda pempha;
Usiku ndi usana dikirani ndi kupemphera.

2. Dzukani m’sagone musamakaika;
Mudzalandiratu mpumulo kumwamba;
Linda ndi pemphero, Mpulumutsi wanu,
Anasautsidwa chifukwa cha inu

3. Khulupira Yesu mdani ali pompo
Vala zida zako mpaka Mbuye adze,
Musachedwe konse lero ndi labwino,
Dikirani nonse ndi kupempheranso.

title: 90 - Ntchito Ya Pa Mlungu Yatha
content:
90 - Ntchito Ya Pa Mlungu Yatha

ANOTHER SIX DAYS’ WORK

1. Ntchito ya pa mlungu yatha,
Sabata lina layamba;
Moyo wangawe pumula,
Mlungu wadalitsa lero.

2. Idza yamika Ambuye,
Yemwe apatsa mpumulo;
Timadalitsidwa lero,
Koposa masiku ena.

3. Mayamiko athu m’mwamba,
Akweratu monga nsembe;
Kuti Khristu atipatse
Dalitso m’mitima yathu.

4. Mpumulowu uli ngati
Fanizo la wakumwamba,
Komwe mpingo udzapuma,
Zitatha zowawa zonse.

title: 92 - Msaiwale Tsiku La Mbuye
content:
92 - Msaiwale Tsiku La Mbuye

DON’T FORGET THE SABBATH

1. Msaiwale tsiku la Mbuye wathuyo.
Ndi tsiku lopambana masiku enawo;
Ndi tsiku lakupuma ndi la chimwemwecho,
Kuwala kwake kuli kochoka mmwambamo.

CHORUS:
Tikondwera kudza kwa Sabata lakelo.
Tikondwera kudza kwa Sabata lakelo.

2. Sunga tsiku lake lopatulikalo,
Pembedza mwini njira yakunka mmwambamo;
Tikamtsatira Iye pa dziko linotu,
Adzatipatsa madzi a moyo wakewo.

3. Timyimbira Yesu pa tsiku lonseli,
Ambuye ali Bwenzi la ana onsewo.
Wokoma mtima ndinu, Mukhale nafetu,
Munalonjeza kuti mudzadza m’mtimamu.

title: 93 - Sabata Nla Kupuma
content:
93 - Sabata Nla Kupuma

O DAY OF REST AND GLADNESS

1. Sabata nla kupuma, Ndi la chimwemwecho,
Ndi tsiku lotonthoza, Lokometsetsatu;
Akulu ndi ang’ono, Tigwade tonsefe,
Tiyimbe kwa Woyera Wa nthawi zonsezo.

2. Sabata lili ngati Chotchinjiriza ’fe,
Ndi monga ngati munda Wotupa mdambomo;
Litsitsimutsa m’yoyo Ya akutopawo,
Popuma pa Sabata Tiona mwambamo.

3. Ndi tsiku lakusinkha, Ndi la chikondicho,
Lakuyanjana nazo Za mwambamwambamo;
Tipeze zakukoma Zoposa zinazo,
Tifuna kupumula Kosatha mwambamo.

title: 94 - Skulu Ya Sabata
content:
94 - Skulu Ya Sabata

SWEET SABBATH SCHOOL!

1. Skulu ya Sabata ndithu, Yokondedwa ndine;
Mtima wanga uikonda, Skulu ya Sabata.

CHORUS:
Skulu ya (bwino), Sabata (bwino),
Skulu ya (bwino), Sabata (bwino),
Mtima wanga uikonda, Skulu ya Sabata.

2. Ndi mmenemo mtima wanga, Uyamba kudziwa;
Ndinayamba kuikonda, Skulu ya Sabata.

3. Yesu ndi mau okonda, Andiitanatu;
Ndipo ndisankha yekhayo, M’skulu ya Sabata.

title: 95 - Mulungu Watisunga ’Fe
content:
95 - Mulungu Watisunga ’Fe

SAFELY THROUGH ANOTHER WEEK

1. Mlungu watisunga ’fe Mpaka mlungu winawu;
T’yeni timpembedze ’Ye, Tsiku lopumulali;
Tiganize zinthu za Mau a Mulunguyo.
Tiganize zinthu za Mau a Mulunguyo.

2. Pakufuna nsisizo, Zakudzera m’dzinalo,
Mudze, Mbuye wathu ’Nu, Mukhululukire ’fe;
Pakupuma mwanumo, Tikumbuka Inuyo.
Pakupuma mwanumo, Tikumbuka inuyo.

3. Pakulemekeza ’Nu, Tikuyandikira ’Nu;
Tikuona mphamvuyo, Ndi ulemelerowo.
Mtithangate Mbuyathu Kudya phwando m’mwambamo.
Mtithangate Mbuyathu Kudya phwando m’mwambamo.

4. Mbuye mugonjetsetu Tchimo la mu mtimanga,
Kuti ndikagwiretu Ntchito zokondwetsa ’Nu.
Masabata onsewo Alingane momwemo,
Masabata onsewo Alingane momwemo.

title: 96 - Idza Tsiku Lopuma
content:
96 - Idza Tsiku Lopuma

WELCOME, WELCOME, DAY OF REST

1. Idza tsiku lopuma, Lopatsidwa ku dziko.
Idza mmtima mwangamu, Monga nyali ya mmwamba.

2. Tsiku lokondweretsa, Likupita msangatu;
Litisangalatsanso Mpaka ntchito idzatha.

3. Tsiku loyeretsetsa, Tsiku lakupemphera;
Tsiku lakulandira madalitso anuwo.

4. Idza tsiku lopuma ndi zimphamvu za mmwamba,
Ndi kuyera kwanuko Kudze m’mtima mwangamu.

title: 97 - Tamva Mau Omwewo
content:
97 - Tamva Mau Omwewo

WE HAVE HEARD

1. Tamva mau omwewo, Atitu Yesuyo;
Mpulumutsi ndiyedi, Yesuyo, Yesuyo;
Pita m’midzi monsemo, Dziko lonse limvetu,
Pita iwe konseko, Mveratu Mbuyeyo.

2. Lalikani nanunso, Yesuyo, Yesuyo;
Kwa ochima onsewo, Amve za mbuyeyo.
Lalikani m’zisimo, Ndi m’mapiri monsemo;
Kuti onse amvetu, Yesuyo, Yesuyo.

3. Yimbadi za Iyeyo, Amvetu anthuwo;
Kuti Yesu wafadi, Kalelo, kalelo.
Atikonda ifetu, Natifera indedi.
Kuchotsera tchimoli, Yesuyo, Yesuyo.

4. Bukitsani maunso, Konseko, konseko.
Aitana anthuwo, Ponsepo, ponsepo.
Kodi wina samvatu? Pitako, pitako ’we,
Angofuna onsewo, Yesuyo, Yesuyo

title: 98 - Mombolo Akhale Nane
content:
98 - Mombolo Akhale Nane

I MUST HAVE THE SAVIOUR WITH ME

1. Mombolo akhale nane, Kwenda ndekha sinditha
Akhale pafupi nane, An’gwire m’dzanja lake.

CHORUS:
Sindidzaopa nthenda (E! nthenda),
Akanditsogolera (tsogoza)
N’dzapita wosang’ung’udza,
Kutsata mapazi’ke.

2. Chikhulupiro changachi, Chili chofoka ndithu;
Andilimbikitsa Iye, Ndi mau ake okha.

3. Mombolo akhale nane, Nd’yende m’njira ya moyo;
Kupyola mayeso onse, Ndikumenyana nkhondo.

4. Mombolo akhale nane, Kuti anditsogoze;
Kufikira nditafika, Ku tsidya lina lija.

title: 99 - Pokumbukira Mtandawo
content:
99 - Pokumbukira Mtandawo

WHEN I SURVEY THE WONDROUS CROSS

1. Pokumbukira mtandawo Umene Mbuye nafapo,
Zokoma za pa dzikoli Sizinga kanthu konse bi.

2. Onani mutu, manjanso, Mapazi ndi mu nthitimo.
E! panalibe winayo Wondivalira mingayo.

3. Chinkana ndinachimwatu, Anakhulukira ’ne.
Ndisadzitame ndekhai, Nditame mtanda wakewo.

4. Chinkana ndipereketu, Ee! chuma chonse m’dzikomo,
Sizingakwane konsei, Ndingopereka mtimanga.

title: 100 - Bwenzi Lathu Ndiye Yesu
content:
100 - Bwenzi Lathu Ndiye Yesu

WHAT A FRIEND WE HAVE IN JESUS!

1. Bwenzi lathu ndiye Yesu, Atikonda ifetu,
Zifunsiro zathu zonse, Tipemphere Mbuyathu;
Mtima phe tisowa tonse, Zitivuta chabeko,
Kaamba sitimanka konse Kumpemphera Mlunguyo.

2. Tili nazo zotiyesa, Zitidetsa nkhawamu,
Tisadandaule chabe, Timpemphere Mbuyathu;
Kodi tikaona wina, Timkhulupiriramo?
Yesu atidziwa bwino, Timpemphere yekhayo.

3. Kodi tikulema nazo, Zotiwawa m’mtimamo,
Atipulumutsa Yesu, Timpemphere Iyeyu.
Kodi akuthawa m’bale, Pempheratu bwenzilo,
Akusunga mkono mwake, Udzapumuliramo.

title: 101 - Yesu Alikuitana
content:
101 - Yesu Alikuitana

JESUS IS CALLING

1. Yesu alikuitana iwe, Lero lomwe, lero lomwe;
Bwanji unasocherera iwe, Kutali kutaliko?

CHORUS:
Aitana lero lomwe; Yesu alikuitana iwe tsopano.

(Tenor and Bass):
Aitana lero lomwe; Aitana lero lomwe;
Yesu alikuitana lero, ’itana iwe tsopano.

2. Yesu aitana wotopa ’we, Lero lomwe, lero lomwe
Tula katundu wako pa Iye; Ndipo sadzakukana.

3. Yesu alikulindira iwe, Lero lomwe, lero lomwe;
Idza ndi machimo ako onse; Idzatu usachedwe.

4. Yesu ali kudandaulira, Lero lomwe, lero lomwe;
Okhulupira adzakondwera; Podzakomana naye.

title: 102 - Mlendo Ali Pa Khomo
content:
102 - Mlendo Ali Pa Khomo

LET HIM IN

1. Mlendo ali pa khomo, Mlowetse ( Mlowetsenitu, Mlowetsenitu),
Wadza kale kalelo, Mlowetse ( Mlowetsenitu, Mlowetsenitu).
Mtsegulire msangatu, Wakuyerayerayo, 
Mwana wa Mulunguyo, Mlowetse ( Mlowetsenitu, Mlowetsenitu).

2. Utsegule mtimawo, Mlowetse (Mlowetsenitu, Mlowetsenitu).
Ukachedwa ‘chokatu, Mlowetse (Mlowetsenitu, Mlowetsenitu).
Ndiye bwenzi lakolo, ‘Dzakupulumutsa we;
‘Dzakusamaliranso, Mlowetse (Mlowetsenitu, Mlowetsenitu).

3. Imva mau Akewo, Mlowetse (Mlowetsenitu, Mlowetsenitu),
Sankha Iye leroli, Mlowetse (Mlowetsenitu, Mlowetsenitu).
Wangoima khomopo, ‘Dzakusangalatsa ‘we,
Udzamlemekezatu, Mlowetse (Mlowetsenitu, Mlowetsenitu).

4. Mlendo wa kumwambayo, Mlowetse (Mlowetsenitu, Mlowetsenitu).
‘Dzakupatsa zonsezo, Mlowetse (Mlowetsenitu, Mlowetsenitu).
‘Dzakhululukira ‘we, Ndipo potsirizapo
‘Dzakutenga mmwambamo, Mlowetse (Mlowetsenitu,Mlowetsenitu).

title: 103 - Anadza Kwa Yesu Mkuru Wina
content:
103 - Anadza Kwa Yesu Mkuru Wina

YE MUST BE BORN AGAIN

1. Anadza kwa Yesu mkuru wina, Kufunsa za njira ya chipulumutso;
Nayankha momveka Ambuyathuyo, Mukabadwensotu.

CHORUS:
Mukabadwensotu, mukabadwensotu;
Indetu ndinenadi kwa inuyo, Mukabadwensotu.

2. Nonsenu mverani mau ake Amene Ambuye nanena Kwa ‘ye,
Msanyozetu mau a uthengawu, Mukabadwensotu.

3. Mufuna kulowa mmwamba kodi? Kuyimba pamodzi ndi odalawo?
Mukafuna moyo wa nthawi zonse, Mukabadwensotu.

title: 104 - Mundimve, Yesu
content:
104 - Mundimve, Yesu

COME, GREAT DELIVERER, COME

1. Mundimve, Yesu, ndikuliratu, ’Dzani kwa inetu.
Mu mtimanga ndilakalaka ’Nu, Yesu, idzanitu.

CHORUS:
Ndinasocheratu kutaliko, Kutali ndi Atateyo.
Tsopano, koma mndilandirenso, Yesu, idzanitu.

2. Ndilibe malo mokhaliramo, ’Dzani kwa inetu.
Khalani nane m’mtima mwangamo, Yesu, Idzanitu

3. Njobvuta njira ndimayendamo, ’Dzani kwa inetu.
Ndione nkhope yanu, Mbuyanga, Yesu idzanitu.

4. Wolapa mtima simunyozadi, ’Dzani kwa inetu.
Pemphero langa mumve lonseli, Yesu, idzanitu.

title: 105 - Yesu Ap’lumutsa
content:
105 - Yesu Ap’lumutsa

ABLE TO DELIVER

1. Yesu awombola! Nena konseko;
Yesu awombola yemwe amvatu;
Yesu awombola m’ng’anjo ya moto;
Yesu awombola yemwe adzatu.

CHORUS:
Yesu awombola konsekonseko,
Mukakhulupira mau akewo.

2. Yesu awombola! Ndi zoona ko?
Kodi kuli mphamvu yop’lumutsa ’ne?
Tandiuzanitu, Kodi Khristuyo
Nkutha kumasula nsinga zangazo?

3. Yesu awombola! Limba mtima ’we,
Gwira ntchito yake, awombola ’we;
Usaope mdani, gwira Yesuyo,
Usakaiketu, ima ndithu nji.

title: 106 - Tidzamangatu Pa Thanthwe
content:
106 - Tidzamangatu Pa Thanthwe

BUILD ON THE ROCK

1. Tidzamangatu pa thanthwelo, Pa thanthwe losatha Yesu,
Tidzaima nji wosagwanso, Pa nthawi ya namondwe.

CHORUS:
Tidzamangatu (tidzamangatu),
Mwa Mbuyathuyo (mwa Mbuyathuyo);
Timanga pa thanthwe lolimbalo, Pa Yesu Khristuyo.

2. Alipo amanga pa mchenga, Pa chuma cha dziko lino;
Ndi ena amanga m’tchimolo, Zokoma za pa dziko.

3. Mangani pa thanthwe Khristuyo, Maziko olimbalimba;
Ndichotu chiyembekezero Cha chip’ulumutso chathu.

title: 107 - Nthano Ya Yesu Uzeni
content:
107 - Nthano Ya Yesu Uzeni

TELL ME THE STORY OF JESUS

1. Nthano ya Yesu uzeni, Lemba mu mtimangamu;
Nthano yodala uzeni, Nthano yoposa zonse.
Nyimbo ya ’ngelo uzeni, Nthawi yobadwa Yesu,
Ulemelero kwa Mlungu, Ndipo mtendere pano.

CHORUS:
Nthano ya Yesu uzeni, Lemba mu mtimangamu,
Nthano yodala uzeni, Nthano yoposa zonse.

2. Nena masiku ajawo, Mbuye nasala kudya,
Anayesedwa koopsa, Koma analakika.
Za ntchito yake uzeni, Ndi za zisoni zake,
Anazunzidwa kolimba, Mphawi wopanda kwao.

3. Za mtanda wake uzeni, Ndi za zowawa zake,
Za manda ake uzeni, Ndi za kuuka kwake.
M’nthano ndiona chikondi, Cha Yesu, Mbuye wanga,
Mmene ndiimva ndilira, Anawombola ine.

title: 108 - Mbusa Wabwino, Yesu
content:
108 - Mbusa Wabwino, Yesu

LOVINGLY, TENDERLY CALLING

1. Mbusa wabwino, Yesu, Ati idzanitu,
M’khola mulowe nonse, Malo alipodi.
’Dzani akulu inu, Ndi anyamatanso,
’Dzani, mulowe m’khola, M’njira ya choonadi.

CHORUS:
Akuitana mwa nsisi zake,
Wakusochera ’we, idza kwa ’Ne;
Mbusa wabwino aima mwa phee!
Kukulindiratu ’we.

2. Mbusa wabwino, Yesu, Anakufera ’we;
Aitanabe lero, Akusochera ’nu.
Kuli zoopsya kunja, Idza, atero ’Ye;
’Dzani, mulowe m’khola, Malo opuma du.

3. Inu msachedwe konse, Kuli mimbuluyo,
Ili kufuna nkhosa Kuti iziphetu.
Mbusa wabwino, Yesu, Akuitanabe,
’Dzani, mulowe m’khola, Malo alipomu.

title: 109 - Mmene Mbuye Adzayeza
content:
109 - Mmene Mbuye Adzayeza

WEIGHED AND WANTING

1. Mmene Mbuye adzayeza, Zinthu za mu mtimamo;
Koditu tidzapambana, Pena ’dzalepheranso?

CHORUS:
Mbuye wayeza iwetu, Nuperewera;
Ndi malamulo akewo, Nuperewera.

2. Kodi ’dzamva mau ake Wachitadi bwino ’we?
Pena kumva akunena, Choka iwe wochimwa?

3. Kodi ’dzamva Mzimu wake Nthawi isanathei?
Pena tizengerezabe, Ndi kuonongekadi?

title: 110 - Odala Ali Akuchita
content:
110 - Odala Ali Akuchita

BLESSED ARE THEY THAT DO

1. Imva mau a Mpulumutsi,
Mau owona a moyo;
Wosasamalawe kumbukiratu,
Odala ali akuchita.

CHORUS:
Odala ochita malamulo,
Odalatu odalatu;
Odala ochita malamulo,
Odala ndi akuchita.

2. Ngakhale timve malamulo,
Ndi malonjezano ake;
Kumvako sikungatipulumutse,
Odala ali akuchita.

3. Adzalowa mu mzinda uja,
Opanda tchimo ndi imfa;
Atayeretsedwa kwa nthawi zonse,
Adzadya za mtengo wa moyo.

title: 111. - Bwenzi Palibe Lofana Naye
content:
111. - Bwenzi Palibe Lofana Naye

NO, NOT ONE

1. Bwenzi palibe loposa Yesu, palibe, palibe
Wina palibe wochiza nthenda, palibe, palibe.

CHORUS:
Yesu adziwa zovuta zo, Atitsogoza konseko;
Bwenzi palibe lofana naye; Palibe, palibe.

2. Bwenzi palibe lofana naye, palibe, palibe
Iye ngofatsa koposa onse, palibe, palibe.

3. Nthawi palibe amatisiya, palibe, palibe
Akondweretsa mu mdima monse, palibe, palibe.

4. Iye samasiya munthu wake, palibe, palibe
Pena kukana wolapa konse, palibe, palibe.

5. Mphatso palibe yofana Yesu, palibe, palibe
Iye satimana malo m’mwamba? Palibe, palibe.

title: 112 - Yang’ana Pa Mtanda Kwa Yesuyo
content:
112 - Yang’ana Pa Mtanda Kwa Yesuyo

LIFE IN A LOOK

1. Yang’ana pa mtanda kwa Yesuyo, Kuti upeze moyowo;
Chuma cha m’dziko nchakuthatu, Chosatha tipeza pa mtandapo.

CHORUS:
Poyang’ana Yesuyo, Pakuona mtandawo,
Tingapeze moyowo, Poyang’ana Yesuyo (E, Yesuyo).

2. Ambuye anandikondweratu, Mmene ndinayan’gana ’Ye;
Pondifikira mayesowo, Pa mtandapo ndipeza mphamvuzo.

3. Ndidzayang’anabe pa mtandapo, Pokhulupira Yesuyo;
Yemwe amakhulupira ’Ye Sadzagwa m’mayeso a m’dzikoli.

title: 113 - Yesu Mofatsa Aitana Tonse
content:
113 - Yesu Mofatsa Aitana Tonse

CALLING

1. Yesu, mofatsa, aitana tonse. ’Mvanitu mau ake.
Akugogoda pa khomo pa mtima, Alikulindira ’fe.

CHORUS:
Idzani kwanu! Inu, otopa, idzani.
Yesu mokonda aitana nonse. Iwe, wochimwa, idza.

2. Yesu apempha kwa ’Tate kumwamba, Ka’mba ka iwe ndine
Bwanji tikana zifundo zakezo, Kodi tichedweranji?

3. Nthawi ya nsisi ipitatu msanga, Kwa iwe ndi inenso;
Mdima wa imfa ukudza msanganso, Kwa iwe ndi inenso.

4. Yesu napatsa chikondi chakecho Kwa iwe ndi inenso.
Nkana tachimwa akhululukira, Tchimo la iwe ndine.

title: 114 - Chipata Chochinjikacho
content:
114 - Chipata Chochinjikacho

THE GATE AJAR FOR ME

1. Chipata chochinjikacho, Chionetsera cheza;
Kuchokatu ku mtandawo, Chikondi chioneka.

CHORUS:
Mwachinjikira ine ko, Chipata cha kumwambako?
Ine, Ine, Mwachinjikira ’ne?

2. Chipata n’chauleretu Kwa onse akufuna;
Achuma, osaukanso, A mtundu uli wonse.

3. Pitanitu mtsogolomo, Chipata n’chosatseka;
Landira mtanda wakewo, Mbonitu ya chikondi.

4. Patsidya tidzatulapo, Mtandawo wa manyazi;
’Dzavalatu koronayo, ’Dzamkonda ’Ye koposa.

title: 115 - Sing’anga Mkulu Ndiye Yesu
content:
115 - Sing’anga Mkulu Ndiye Yesu

THE GREAT PHYSICIAN

1. Sing’anga mkulu ndiye Yesu, Mwana wa Mulungu.
Asangalatsa a chisoni, Ali wa chifundo.

CHORUS:
Dzina la Yesu ndi lokoma, Dzina la Yesu lipambana,
Dzina lake la kukonda, Yesu, inde, Yesu.

2. Zoipa zakhululukidwa, Yesu amatero;
Tiyende bwino m’njira yake, Tilowemo lero.

3. Nditama nsembe ya Mulungu, Ndilandira Yesu;
Ndikonda dzinalo labwino, Dzina lanu, Yesu.

4. Akulu inu mbwere nonse, Ana inu nomwe;
Ambuye akuitanani, Vomerani nonse.

title: 116 - Mtima Walemedwa Ko?
content:
116 - Mtima Walemedwa Ko?

NOTHING FOR JESUS

1. Mtima walemedwa ko, Yesu alibe malo?
Muli tchimo lokha ko, Yesu alibe malo?
Iye wangoimatu, Agogoda mtimamo,
Adandaulira ’we, Kodi alibe malo?

2. Nthawiyo wataya ko, Sugwira nchito yake?
Mphamvuzo watayanso, Sugwira ntchito yake?
Sunaleke tchimolo, Sunakope munthuyo?
Sunabweze mlendoyo, Sugwira nchito yake?

3. Wangofuna dzikoli, Nthawi ya Yesu ’libe?
Ntchito yake waleka, Nthawi ya Yesu ’libe?
Ungotsata dzikoli, Chuma ndi zoipazi,
Kudzikondweretsa ’we, Nthawi za Yesu ’libe?

4. Ee, masamba okhawo, Wamana Yesu mphatso?
Mmanja mwako muli mbe, Wamana Yesu mphatso?
Sunasunge kanthui, Sunagwire ntchitoyo?
Sudzakondwa tsikulo, Pakuonatu Yesu.

title: 117 - Ndinamva Mauwo
content:
117 - Ndinamva Mauwo

I AM COMING, LORD

1. Ndinamva mauwo, Andiitana ’ne;
Ndisambe m’mwazi wanuwo, Wodzera mtandamo.

CHORUS:
Ndili kudzatu; Ndidza kwanuko!
Munditsuke mtimamo, Ndi mwazi wanuwo.

2. Ndilibe mphamvuzo, Mundilimbitsa ’ne;
Mundiyeretsa konseko, Ndiyerayera mbu.

3. Atero ndaniyo? Ndi Yesu wabwino,
Apatsa mvanu mtendere; Ndi mphamvu mtimamo.

4. Nditama mwaziwo! Nditama nsisizo,
Nditama Yesu Mbuyeyo, Chiyero chathucho.

title: 118 - Ati Yesu Mbuyeyo
content:
118 - Ati Yesu Mbuyeyo

JESUS PAID IT ALL

1. Ati Yesu Mbuyeyo, Ofo’ka ndinutu,
Mudikire, mpemphedi, Ndidzapatsa mphamvutu,

CHORUS:
Yesu wathadi Za mangawatu,
Inde, ndinaipa bii, Watsuka ine mbu.

2. Mbuye ndimva leroli Za mphamvu zanuzi,
Zokha zisandutsadi Mtima wanga woti bii.

3. Ine kanthu ndilibe, Kogula moyowu,
Ndingotsuka mtimano M’mwazi wa Ambuye ’Nu.

4. Mmene ndidzaimatu Pa chiweruzopo,
Podzapulumukatu, Ndidzamtama Yesuyo.

title: 119 - Ndiona Mwazi Wakewo
content:
119 - Ndiona Mwazi Wakewo

THE CLEANSING WAVE

1. Ndiona mwazi wakewo, Kasupe wodzaza;
Ambuye Yesu, Mp’lumutsi, Aloza balalo.

CHORUS:
Ndiona mwazi wakewo, Unditsuka ’ne mtimamo!
Nditama Mbuye Yesuyo, Ndiyere mtima mwangamo.

2. Ndibadwa mwa tsopanotu, Za kale zafanso;
Ndikhala moyo mwa Yesu, Ndasamba m’mwazi ’ke.

3. Ndiyenda m’nyali ya mmwamba, Kupewa tchimolo;
Ambuye Yesu alowa, Mu mtima mwangamo.

4. Chisomo chozizwitsatu Kusamba mwaziwo;
Ambuye wopachikwayo, Ndimdziwa yekhayo.

title: 120 - Atate, Ndziperekatu
content:
120 - Atate, Ndziperekatu

I DO BELIEVE

1. Atate, ndziperekatu, Palibe winanso,
Popanda Inu, Mbuyanga, Ndidzanka kutiko?

CHORUS:
Eh! Ndikhulupirira ’Ye, Wondifera ine.
Anapereka mwazi ’ke, Kupulumutsa ’ne.

2. Ndikhulupira Mwanayo, Ndifuna mphamvu ’ke;
Zoipa zanga zonsezo, Mzichotse Inutu.

3. Kwa Inu, Mbuye, mwini wa Chikhulupirocho,
Mndipatse mphatso yanuyo, Ndingafe m’mtimanga.

title: 121 - Ndiyimbatu Za Yesu
content:
121 - Ndiyimbatu Za Yesu

I WLL SING OF JESUS’ LOVE

1. Ndi’mbatu za Yesuyo, Yemwe anakonda ’ne;
Anachoka m’mwambamo, Anafa mtandapo.

CHORUS:
Ndi’mbatu za Yesuyo, Kuyamika kosatha;
Nadza kundifera ’ne, Ndi’mbabe chikondicho.

2. Yesu analira ’ne Mu Getsemane kale;
Napemphera inedi, Ndisanamdziwetu.

3. Anthu ndi angelowo Sangazindikiretu,
M’mene tchimo langali Liyeretsedwadi.

4. Sinachite kanthu bi Kulipira chikondi;
Ndingopatsa mtimanga, Ndimkonda konseko.

title: 122 - Ndidze Pafupi Ndi Inu
content:
122 - Ndidze Pafupi Ndi Inu

NEARER, STILL NEARER

1. Ndidze pafupi ndi Inutu, Yesu, Mombolo wopambana ’Nu;
Inu mndisunge mmanja mwanu, Inu mndibise pa ngaka yanu,
Inu mndibise pa ngaka yanu.

2. Ndidza pafupi ndekha ndekha, Kanthu ndilibe kopatsa Yesu;
Mtima woipa ndipatsa ’Nu, Munditsuketu ndi mwazi wanu,
Munditsuketu ndi mwazi wanu.

3. Ndidza pafupi, ndine wanu, Ine ndisiya zoipa zonse;
Zonse zonyada za dzikoli, Koma mndipatse Ambuye Yesu,
Koma mndipatse Ambuye Yesu.

4. Ndidza pafupi ndinu, Mbuye, Mpaka kumwamba ndidzalowatu,
Nthawi zosatha n’dzakhalabe, Pafupifupi ndi Mp’lumutsiyo,
Pafupifupi ndi Mp’lumutsiyo.

title: 123 - Dzina Lopambana Mmwamba
content:
123 - Dzina Lopambana Mmwamba

HOLIEST NAME

1. Dzina lopambana m’mwamba, Ndi pa dziko lonselo,
Lomwe ’Tate anamutcha Mwana wake mmodziyo.

CHORUS:
Dzina loyeratu (loyera), Dzina lofatsanso (lofatsa),
Lomwe nalinena angelowo.
Pa usiku uja (dzinalo), Dzina lokomatu (dzinalo),
Ndilo la Ambuye Yesu.

2. Dzinalo lipatsa dalo, Ndi chimwemwe mtimanga,
Ndidzauza anthu ena Za chokoma chakecho.

3. Moyo wanga udzayimba Za chikondi chakecho;
Ndidzatamandabe dzina, Lopambana onsewo.

title: 124 - Ndikweze Yesu Yekha
content:
124 - Ndikweze Yesu Yekha

NOT I, BUT CHRIST

1. Ndikweze Yesu yekha m’zinthu zonse;
Amveke, aoneke yekhayo;
Mu ntchito, m’maganizo ndipo m’mau,
Ambuye aoneke yekhayo.

2. Ndi Yesu atonthoza akulira,
Yekhayo angachotse msoziwo;
Yekhayo angatule akatundu,
Yekhayo angachotse manthawo.

3. Ndileke mau onse ena chabe,
Ndileke zakupusa zangazo;
Ndikweze Yesu, ndisanyade konse,
Ndisadzitame, koma Iyeyo.

4. Ndi Khristu amapatsa ’ne zosowa.
Ndi yekha amapatsa mphamvunso.
Yekhayo m’thupi , m’moyo, ndi mu mzimu;
Ndi Khristu yekha nthawi zonsezo.

title: 125 - Muli Dzuwa M’phiri Muja
content:
125 - Muli Dzuwa M’phiri Muja

SUNLIGHT IN THE HEART

1. Muli dzuwa m’phiri muja, Muli dzuwa m’nyanjamo;
K’wala kwake kumagwera Pa maudzu ponsepo;
Koma dzuwa lopambana Lili m’mtima mwangamu;
Ka’mba komwe mukhalitsa, Kuli dzuwa lowala.

CHORUS:
Muli dzuwa lakuwalitsa! Muli dzuwa m’mtimanga.
Yesu adzachotsa mdima, Muli dzuwa m’mtimanga.

2. Ndisiya ’ne nsoni zanga Ndi zovala za nsanza;
Mundivekatu zoyera, Ndiyamika m’mtimamo;
Kuli malo a ulemu Munandikonzera ’ne;
Mtima wanga ufunako, Ndidzatsata Inutu.

3. Inu, Yesu, mwandigula, Ndine wanu konseko,
Munayatsa nyali yanga, Iwalire Inuyo;
Kuli malo a ulemu Munandikonzera ’ne,
Mtima wanga ufunako, Ndidzatsata Inuyo.

title: 126 - Ilipo Nyimbo Ndikonda
content:
126 - Ilipo Nyimbo Ndikonda

SINCE I HAVE BEEN REDEEMED

1. Ilipo nyimbo ndikonda Kuyimba ineyo,
Ya Yesu Mbuye wangayo, Ch’omboledwere ’ne.

CHORUS:
Ntaomboledwa ’ne, Ndzalemekezatu dzina la Ambuyeyo.
Ntaomboledwa ’ne, Ndidzalemekeza dzinalo.

2. Wakukwanitsa mtimanga Ndi Yesu Khristuyo;
Ndichita chifuniro ’ke, Ch’omboledwere ’ne.

3. Ilipo mboni yangayo, Ch’omboledwere ’ne.
Yochotsa nkhawa, manthanso, Ch’omboledwere ’ne.

4. Alipo malo angawo, Wandikonzera ’Ye.
Kumene ndidzakhalako, Ntaomboledwa ’ne.

title: 127 - Mulungu Asamalabe
content:
127 - Mulungu Asamalabe

HE LOVES ME, TOO

1. Mulungu asamalabe Mbalame zonsezo;
Ngatitu azikondadi, Akonda inenso.

CHORUS:
Andikonda, andikonda, Akonda inenso;
Akonda zinthu zonsezo, Akonda inenso.

2. Maluwa mthengo monsemo Apanga Mbuyeyo;
Ngatitu awakondadi, Akonda inenso.

3. Mulungu, mlengi wathuyo Apanga zonsezo;
Samaiwala ana ’ke, Akonda onsewo.

title: 128 - Nthawi Ya Pemphero
content:
128 - Nthawi Ya Pemphero

BLESSED HOUR OF PRAYER

1. Nthawi ya pempheroyo, powerama ife,
Tisonkhana kwa Yesu, Ambuyathuyo;
Tikakhulupiratu adzatibisanso,
Tidzapeza mpumulo tikapempheratu.

CHORUS:
Ndi yokomadi, nthawi ya pempho,
Tidzapeza mpumulo tikapempheratu

2. Nthawi ya pempheroyo, Yesu ali mfupi
Ndi chifundo chakecho atimvera ’fe.
Atiuza nkhawazo, tizataye kwa ’Ye,
Tidzapeza mpumulo, tikapempheratu.

3. Nthawi ya pempheroyo, akuyesedwawo
Amatula kwa Yesu zisoni zawo;
Yesu wachifundoyo amazichotsatu,
Tidzapeza mpumulo tikapempheratu.

4. Nthawi ya pempheroyo tikhulupiranso
Kuti zomwe tisowa tilandiradi;
Tikakhulupiradi nkhawa zichokanso;
Tidzapeza mpumulo tikapempheratu.

title: 129 - Yesu Mnalonjeza
content:
129 - Yesu Mnalonjeza

JESUS, COME AND BLESS US

1. Yesu mnalonjeza, Kuti komwetu
Asonkhana ’tatu, Muli komweko;
Tikukhulupira, Tigwadira ’Nu;
Yesu, mtidalitse, Mkhale nafetu.

CHORUS:
Yesu, mtidalitse Popemphera ’fe;
Yesu, mtidalitse, Mkhale mfupimo.

2. Mnasonkhana nafe Nthawi zonsezo,
Tikusowaninso Mpaka mapeto;
’Dzani, Mpulumutsi, Mtidalitsenso;
Mutimvere ife, Tikupempha ’Nu.

3. Yesu, mtithangate Poyimbira ’Nu,
Pempho lili lonse Mlilandiretu;
Chikh’lupiro chathu Mchikulitsenso;
Mdzaze ’fe chikondi, Ndi ku’nikanso.

title: 130 - Ndine Wanuyo
content:
130 - Ndine Wanuyo

I AM THINE, O LORD

1. Ndine wanuyo, ndamva mauwo,
A chikondi chanucho;
Mundikoketu mfupi ndinuyo,
Mwa chikhulupirocho.

CHORUS:
Mndisendeze (mfupi), mfupi mbuyanga,
Ndi pa mtanda wanuwo;
Mndisendeze mfupi, Mbuye wanga ’Nu,
Ndi pa mwazi wanuwo.

2. M’ntchito yanu mndipatulire ’ne,
Mwa chisomo chanucho;
Moyo wangawo uyang’ane ’Nu,
Ndichitetu zanuzo.

3. Ndikondwera ’ne pakupitatu,
Kugwadira Mbuyeyo;
Pakunenatu naye mserimo,
Monga bwenzi langalo.

4. Sindidziwatu za chikondicho,
Mpaka n’dzanke tsidyalo;
Sindifikira za chimwemwecho,
Mpaka n’dzanke kwanuko.

title: 131 - Inetu Ndifunadi
content:
131 - Inetu Ndifunadi

MORE LIKE JESUS

1. Inetu ndifunadi Kufanana ndi Yesu,
Andidzaze mtimamo Ndi kufatsa kwakeko;
Ndidziyenda monga ’Ye Mdziko la zoipali;
Ndine wosaukadi, Yesu mkhale mtimanga.

2. Ngati amva khwangwala, Nayang’ana mphetazo,
Nasamala zonsezo, Ndithu andimveranso.
Adzandiphunzitsa ’ne, Nakhulukira ’ne;
Ndikhaletu wangwiro, Yesu mkhale mtimanga.

3. Popemphera ndikhale Monga Yesu Mbuyeyo;
Ndipumule mwa Iye, Andimwetse madziwo.
Mwa chisomo ndabadwa, Ndafa mwa zoipazo,
Ndikhulupiliretu, Yesu mkhale m’mtimanga.

title: 132 - Yesu, Mundisungetu
content:
132 - Yesu, Mundisungetu

NEAR THE CROSS

1. Yesu, mundisungetu, Mfupi mtanda wanu;
Ndipezemo kasupe Wondichiza mtima.

CHORUS:
Mtandawo, mtandawo, Nditamanda mtanda,
Mpaka moyo wangawo Udzapume mmwamba.

2. Nsisi zandipezanso, Pomwe pali mtanda.
Ee! Pa mtanda nthandayo Indiunikira.

3. Pa mtandapo ndiona Mwana wa Mulungu.
Mndithandize, Mbuyanga, Kuyendabe nanu.

4. Pa mtandapo ndzalinda, Ndikuyembekeza,
Mpaka ndidzafika ku Dziko la kumwamba.

title: 133 - Ndiyende Nanu Mulungu
content:
133 - Ndiyende Nanu Mulungu

WALKING WITH GOD

1. Ndiyende nanu Mlungu ’Nu,
Mongatu Enoke kalelo;
Mndigwire dzanja langalo,
Mulankhule ndi inenso;
Ngakhale sindionatu,
Ndiyende ndinu, Mbuyanga.

2. Sin’funa kwenda ndekhatu,
Namondwe amaombabe;
Misampha inditchera ’ne,
Adani andizinganso;
Mutontholetse nyanjayo,
Ndiyende ndinu, Mbuyanga.

3. Mukandigwira dzanjali,
Nditayatu za dzikoli;
Ndzayenda molimbikatu,
Ndzasenza mtanda wangawo;
Mpakatu ndzanke m’mwambamo,
Ndiyende ndinu, Mbuyanga.

title: 134 - Ndi Mtima Wanga Wonse
content:
134 - Ndi Mtima Wanga Wonse

WONDERFUL LOVE OF JESUS

1. Ndi mtima wanga wonsewo,
Ndikweza mau kwanuko,
Ndiyimbe bwanji chikondi
Chozizwitsa cha Yesu Mbuye?

CHORUS:
Chikonditu chozizwacho,
Chikondi cha Yesuyo;
Chikonditu chozizwacho,
Chikondi cha Yesuyo.

2. Chipatsa ’ne mtenderewo,
Chiunikira m’njirayo,
Chichotsa vuto chikondi
Chozizwitsa cha Yesu Mbuye.

3. Chiyembekezo changacho
Chonditulutsa m’machimo;
Pakufa ndi’imba chikondi
Chozizwitsa cha Yesu Mbuye.

title: 135 - Ndikonda Inu, Mbuyanga
content:
135 - Ndikonda Inu, Mbuyanga

I LOVE THEE BETTER, LORD

1. Ndikonda Inu, Mbuyanga,
Koposa zonsezo;
Chifukwa mwandipatsatu
Mtendere wanuwo.

CHORUS:
Sanazinene zonsezo (zonsezo),
Za nsisi zakezo;
Sanazinene zonsezo (zonsezo)
Watsuka inenso.

2. Mukhala mfupi ndineyo,
Koposa onsewo;
Ndikonda kuganiza ’Nu
Koposa zinazo.

3. Mwandikondwetsa, Mbuyanga,
Ndisangalaladi;
Popanda nsisi zanuzo
Sindingakondwei.

4. Ambuye wanga, Yesuyo,
Mkayenda nanedi,
Masiku onse pansipo
Ndidzakondweradi.

title: 136 - Akan’tsogoza Ndinkako
content:
136 - Akan’tsogoza Ndinkako

I REMEMBER CALVARY

1. Akan’tsogoza ndinkako,
Ndikhulupira Mbuyeyo;
Ndikumbukira kutitu
Anandifera pa mtanda.

CHORUS:
Yesu anditsogozatu
Ulendo wanga wonsewo.
Bwenzi loona ndiyeyo,
Ndikumbukira Mtandawo.

2. Ndikonda mau akewo,
Anditsogoze Mbuyeyo;
Kufuna kwake ndichite,
Anandifera pa mtanda.

3. Ndzapita osaopai,
Akhale nane Yesuyo.
Pa tsiku lina n’dzaona
Yesu tsamwali wa mtanda.

title: 137 - Dziko Ai, Koma Yesu
content:
137 - Dziko Ai, Koma Yesu

GIVE ME JESUS

1. Dziko ai, koma Yesu,
Dziko ndi lachabetu;
Nsisi zake zikhalitsa
Nthawi zonse yemweyo.

CHORUS:
Nsisi zake n’zazikulu,
Ndi chikondi chakenso;
Chiombolo chozizwitsa,
Moyotu wosathawo!

2. Dziko ai, koma Yesu,
Wondisangalatsa ’ne;
Iye andiyang’anira,
Nkana m’vuto ndi’mbabe.

3. Dziko ai, koma Yesu,
Ndiyang’ane Iyeyo;
Pa ulendo wanga wonse,
Andiunikira ’ne.

4. Dziko ai, koma Yesu,
Mtandawo ndigwiradi;
Mpakatu maso ndi maso,
Ndidzamone Mbuyeyo.

title: 138 - Ndipereka Moyowu
content:
138 - Ndipereka Moyowu

ENTIRE CONSECRATION

1. Ndipereka moyowu
Kwa Ambuye wanga ’Nu;
Manjawa achitetu
Chifuniro chanucho.

CHORUS:
Munditsuke ine mtima mbu (E, ine mbu),
M’mwazi wa Ambuye Yesuyo (E, Yesuyo),
Kwanu Mbuyanga ndidziperekadi,
Kwanu nthawi zonsezo.

2. Ndipereka miyendoyi,
Ikhaletu yanuyo;
Mau ayimbirenso
Inu Mfumu yangayo.

3. Ndipereka milomo,
Inenetu mauwo;
Ndipereka chumacho,
Sindimana kanthui.

4. Ndipereka nsikuzo,
Kuti ndiyamike ’Nu;
Ndipereka nzeruzo
Kuchitatu ntchitoyo.

5. Chifuniro changacho
Chikhaletu chanunso;
Ndipereka mtimanga,
Ukhaletu wanunso.

6. Ndipereka chikondi
Pa mapazi anuwo;
Munditenge ndensene,
Ndikhaletu wanuyo.

title: 139 - Tsamwali Ndamkumanayo
content:
139 - Tsamwali Ndamkumanayo

I’VE FOUND A FRIEND

1. Tsamwali ndamkumanayo, Anandikonda kale;
Kukonda kwandigwirako, M’kukondamo nditsale.
Ku mtima kundimangako, Kosamasuka konse,
Ambuye ndine wanuyo, Ku nthawi nthawi zonse.

2. Tsamwali ndamkumanayo, Anandifera yekha;
Anandipatsa moyowo, Ndatenga ine ndekha;
Zimene ndili nazozi, Za Yesu, mwini zonse,
Ndi moyo wanga wonse ndi Wakenso nthawi zonse.

3. Tsamwali ndamkumanayo, Ndapeza mphamvu zanga,
Pakundisunga inemo, Ndiyende m’njira mwanga;
Zolemera zoti mbe Zindilimbitsa monse,
Ndalema kuno komweko, Nkupuma nthawi zonse.

4. Tsamwali ndamkumanayo, Wokoma mtima wake,
Wotsogolera nzeruzo, Zisunga m’njira mwake;
Kwa Iye wondikondako, Sandichotsamo konse,
Pa moyo, imfa, nayeyo, Ndilipo nthawi zonse.

title: 140 - Mau A Yesu
content:
140 - Mau A Yesu

THE VOICE OF JESUS

1. Ndinamva Yesu akuti, Idza udzapume;
Wolema’we ndi zoipa, Tsamira pa Ine.
Ndinadza kwa Yesu momwe Ndinali wolema;
Mwa Iye ndinapumula, Nandikondweretsa.

2. Ndinamva Yesu akuti, Ndipatsa kolere
Madzi a moyo wosatha, Idza udzamwetu
Ndinadza kwa Yesu ndi ’mwa Mu mtsinje wamoyo;
Ndipo ndinatsitsimuka, Ndikhala mwa Iye.

3. Ndinamva Yesu akuti, Ndine kuunika;
Yang’anitsitsa kwa ine, Ndipo udzakondwa.
Ndinayang’ana kwa Yesu, Mwa Iye ndiwala;
Ndidzayendabe m’ku’nika, Mpaka kumwambako.

title: 141 - Ndikhaletu Wanu
content:
141 - Ndikhaletu Wanu

WHOLLY THINE
