1. Ndikhaletu wanu, Mbuyanga; Konseko, konseko,
E, kufuna kwanu ndichite, Mndithandizetu.

CHORUS:
Wanutu (Mbuye), wanutu (Mbuye), Ndine wanu, Mbuyanga;
Wanutu (Mbuye), wanutu (Mbuye), Ndine wanu leroli.

2. Chuma ninji ko popandatu Inuyo, Mbuyanga,
Ndidzasiya zinthu zonsezo, Ndidzatsata ’Nu.

3. Pofulatira ’ne dzikoli, Mkhaletu nanenso;
Inu ndinu Chuma changacho; Mnditonthozetu.

title: 142 - Tsiku Lokoma Leroli
content:
142 - Tsiku Lokoma Leroli

HOW SWEET!

1. Tsiku lokoma leroli, Loposa enawo;
La kuganiza zinthu za Mulungu wathuyo.

2. Inde, kukoma kumvatu Za mau akewo,
Otembenuza mtimawo Kuloza mmwambamo.

3. Ngati sititha tchimolo, Kusiya tokha ’fe,
Ambuye wathu, Yesuyo, Adzalichotsatu.

title: 143 - Mbuye Mtipititse
content:
143 - Mbuye Mtipititse

LORD DISMISS US

1. Mbuye, mtipititse tonse, Ndi dalitso lanulo;
Mwa chikondi chanu, Mbuye, Mutipatse nsisizo.
Mutitsitsimutse ife Pakuyenda m’dzikoli.

2. Tiyamika Inu, Mbuye, Kamba ka uthengawu;
Mphatso za chipulumutso Zidzazetu mtimamu,
Kuti ife tikhalebe Okhulupirikawo.

3. Nsiku zathu zonse, Mbuye, Tipereka kwanuko;
Mutilimbikitse, Mbuye, Kuti tisatopei,
Mpaka tidzaone tonse, Ulemerero wanu.

title: 144 - Ndipitabe Mtsogolomo
content:
144 - Ndipitabe Mtsogolomo

HIGHER GROUND

1. Ndipitabe mtsogolomo,
Ndikwera nthawi zonsezo;
Ndipempha Inu, Mbuyanga,
Mndikweze ’ne Pamwambapo.

CHORUS:
Mndikwezetu ndiime ’ne,
Pamwamba nsiku zonsezo;
Pamene sin’nafikepo,
Mndikweze ’ne pamwambapo.

2. Sin’funatu kukhalabe
Kumene kuli nkhawazo;
Ngakhale ena ’khaleko,
Mndikweze ’ne pamwambapo.

3. Ndikhalebe pamwambapo,
Ngakhale ndiyesedwa ’ne;
Ndikhulupira kutitu,
Mndikweza ’ne pamwambapo.

title: 145 - M’sakane Ntchito Ya Mulungu
content:
145 - M’sakane Ntchito Ya Mulungu

ASK NOT TO BE EXCUSED

1. Msakane ntchito ya Mulungu wanuyo,
Mupite komweko Afuna iyeyo.
Anaitana ’nu, Amaitanabe,
Mudzakondweradi Pogwira ntchitoyo.

CHORUS:
Bwerani, Msakane ntchitoyo,
Bwerani, Kwa Mlungu wanuyo.
Msakane ntchito ya Mulungu wanuyo,
Mupite komweko Afuna Iyeyo.

2. Msakane ntchitoyo, Imvani leroli;
Mwakana kalelo, Musakanenso bi!
Zotuta nzambiri, Achepa ’ntchitowo,
Mukondekondetu Kukopa anthuwo

3. Msakane ntchitoyo, Msachedwechedwenso;
Pakukanidwabe Chikondi chichoka
Pamene Mzimuyo Aloza njirayo,
Popempha Yesuyo, Idzani leroli.

title: 146 - Mukhale M’mtima Mwanga
content:
146 - Mukhale M’mtima Mwanga

THY LIFE WITHIN ME

1. Mukhale m’mtima mwanga Ee, Yesu, Mfumuyo.
Mundiyankhire ine Mafunso angawo.
Mukhale m’mtima mwanga, Mnditsogoleretu,
Kuti ndionetsere Ukulu wanuwo.

2. Kachisi wa mtimanga Wayeretsedwatu,
Ulemelero wanu Uwale mkatimo;
Ndi thupi langa lonse Likhale lanulo,
Lichite nthawi zonse Kufuna kwanuko.

3. Ziwalo zanga zonse, Mzilamuliretu,
Muchite nazo zonse Kufuna kwanuko;
Ndidzipereke ndense, Osang’ung’udzanso,
Polamulidwa nanu Mu ntchito zangazo.

4. Ndidzapumula ndithu Mu mtima mwangamo,
Ndidzalindira Inu, Mukandifunatu;
Mukhale m’mtima mwanga, Ee, Yesu, Mfumuyo,
Mundiyankhire ine, Mafunso angawo.

title: 147 - Tate Mundisendeze Mfupi
content:
147 - Tate Mundisendeze Mfupi

DRAW ME CLOSER TO THEE

1. Tate mundisendeze mfupi,
Ndifuna Inuyo;
Mundiyangate mmanja mwanu,
Ndipume mwanumo.

CHORUS:
Zingwe za chikondicho,
Mfupi, zikokere ’ne;
Mfupi, mfupi,
Ndinu m’mwambamo.

2. Yesu Mundisendeze mfupi,
Ndisasiye inu;
Dzanja lanu linditsogoze,
Ndisasochereyi.

3. Mzimu mundisendeze mfupi,
Ndifane ndinuyo;
Mtima mwangamo munditsuke,
Ndiyere ine mbu!

title: 148 - Ponse Ponse Naye Yesu
content:
148 - Ponse Ponse Naye Yesu

ANYWHERE WITH JESUS

1. Ponse ponse naye Yesu ndzapita,
Ponse ponse anditsogolera ’ne.
Pakapanda Iye sindikondwai,
Ponse ponse naye sindiopatu.

CHORUS:
Ponsepo, ponsepo, sindiopai,
Ponse ponse naye ndidzapitapo.

2. Ponse ponse Yesu ali ndi ine,
Nkana ena andisiye m’dzikoli.
Nkana njira yanga ili yoopsa,
Ponse ponse ndimyamika Yesuyo.

3. Ponsepo ndi Yesu ndidzagonatu,
Mmene mdima undiphimba ineyo.
Ndziwa kuti ndidzauka tsikulo.
Ponsepo ndi Yesu ndiko kwathuko.

title: 149 - Yenda Mkuunika
content:
149 - Yenda Mkuunika

WALK IN THE LIGHT

1. Yenda mk’unika kwakeko, Atsogolere ’we;
Ndi Mzimu wa kumwambayo ’Dzainga mdimawo.

CHORUS:
Yendanibe, Mkuunikatu;
Yendanibe, Mkun’ikatu kwa Mlunguyo.

(Bass and Tenor):
Yendanibe mku’nikatu kwa Mlunguyo,
Yendanibe mku’nikatu kwa Mlunguyo,
Yendanibe mku’nikatu kwa Mlunguyo;
Mku’nikatu kwa Mlunguyo.

2. Yenda mku’nika Yesuyo, Wowala m’mauyo,
Atsogolera onsewo, Okhulupirawo

3. Nkana mithunzi igwetu, Kudetsa njirayo.
Mdimawo udzathawatu, Ku’nika kwakeko.

4. Yenda mku’nika kwakeko, Udziwe nsisizo,
Chikondi chidzaposadi, Pofika mmwambamo.

title: 150 - Okunkhawo Ali Kuti?
content:
150 - Okunkhawo Ali Kuti?

WHERE ARE THE REAPERS?

1. Okunkhawo alitu kutiko?
Amene akunkhatu zabwino?
Kuchoka mu dziko loipali,
Pochita ndi mau a Mlunguyo?

CHORUS:
Ndanitu adze kudzakunkha,
Kusonkhanitsira anthu m’mwambamo?
Ndi yani atithandizeko,
Pofunafuna zobalazo?

2. Pitani mu mphambano monsemo,
Funani mupezemo abwino;
Pitani kwa anthu ponse ponse,
Musonkhanitsire kumwambako.

3. Zobala zakhwima ponse ponse,
Za m’dzikomu zilindira ife.
Okunkha achepa ku ntchitoyi,
Zambiri zidzaonongekatu.

4. Anthuni idzani ndi zidazo,
Kudzasonkhanitsa za m’mundamo;
Gwiranibe mpaka Ambuyeyo,
Adzabwera ali kukondwatu.

title: 151 - Ndiganiza Za Dziko Lokometsa
content:
151 - Ndiganiza Za Dziko Lokometsa

WILL THERE BE ANY STARS?

1. Ndiganiza za dziko lokometsalo,
Komwe ndzafikako tsikulo;
Podzaima pa mbali pa Mp’lumutsiyo,
Ndidzavala nyenyezizoko?

CHORUS:
Ndidzavala nyenyezizo ko, Mbuyanga,
Mmene dzuwa lidzalowadi (lowadi)?
Mmene ndzauka mmalo a mpumulowo,
Ndidzavala nyenyezizo ko (tsikulo)?

2. M’mphamvu yakeyo ndigwiretu ntchitoyo,
Kuti ndikopetu anthuwo;
Kuti ndzapate nyenyezi pa tsikulo,
Mmene Mbuye ’dzayamike ’fe.

3. Ndidzakondwera poona Mbuyangayo,
Ndikupereka mituloyo;
Ndidzakondwera m’mzinda wa golidiwo,
Ndikadzavala nyenyezizo.

title: 152 - Yesu Mundilankhule
content:
152 - Yesu Mundilankhule

SPEAK TO MY SOUL

1. Yesu, mundilankhule, Mau ofatsawo;
Mndinong’oneze kuti, Sulitu wekha ’we.
Mtima munditsegule, Kuti ndimvere ’Nu;
Mdzaze mu mtima mwanga, Kuti ndikondwedi.

CHORUS:
Mundinong’onezetu, Mwa nsisi zanuzo,
Udzagonjetsa ndithu, Udzamasukadi.
Mundilankhule, Mbuye, Tsiku ndi tsikunso,
Ndimvetu mau anu, Sulitu wekha ’we.

2. Yesu, munene mau Ndi ana anuwo,
Kuyang’anira Inu, Muwaphunzitsetu;
Kuti apereketu Moyo kwa Inuyo,
Udze ufumu wanu, Kuti ’dzaone ’Nu.

3. Kale munaonetsa Kufuna kwanuko,
Yanga ndidziwe ntchito, Ndichite zanuzo;
Ndilemekeze Inu, Kwa anthu onsewo,
Nchite kufuna kwanu, Masiku onsewo.

title: 153 - Sindipemphera Mbuyanga
content:
153 - Sindipemphera Mbuyanga

JUST FOR TODAY

1. Sindipemphera, Mbuyanga, Za mawazo;
Mndipulumutse m’tchimolo Lero lokha;
Mau ndisalankhulenso Oipawo;
Msungetu mlomo wangawu, Lero lino.

2. Dzagwira ntchito yanuyo, Ndzapemphanso;
Ndikhala wachifundoyo, Lero lokha;
Mundithandize, Mbuyanga, Kumvera ’Nu;
Kuti ndidzipereketu Pa leroli.

3. Ngatitu moyo wangawo Utha ndithu;
M’malonjezano anuwo Ndikhalebe;
Sindipemphera, Mbuyanga, Za mawazo;
M’ndisunge m’manja mwanumo Pa leroli.

title: 154 - Mlonda, Tandiuza Ine
content:
154 - Mlonda, Tandiuza Ine

WATCHMAN, TELL ME

1. Mlonda, tandiuza ine, Kunja kuli kuchako?
Zosonyeza kudza kwake, Kodi zionekadi?
Inde, mlendo, taonani, Kucha kwayandikiratu,
Vala za kukoma zako, Kuli kucha, dzuka ’we.

2. Mlonda, nyali iwunika Mommo m’njira mwakomo;
Zozizwitsa m’dziko monse, Zisonyeza tsikulo.
Podzaomba pa lipenga, Pakudzuka a ku manda,
Omwalira mwa Ambuye, Adzavala chosafa.

3. Mlonda, fu’la lili kudza Tsiku lalikululo.
Onse alalike kuti, Mfumu yayandikatu.
Inde, mlendo ’we, ndiona, Dziko lopambana lija.
Mzinda wopambana yonse, Uwoneka tsidyalo.

4. Mlonda, undiuze ine, Za mu mzinda momwemo,
Mmene Mfumu ikukhala, Pa chimpando chakecho.
Dziko lija likuwala Ndi ulemerero wake;
Kuli duwa ndi mitengo, Ndi mitsinje yoposa.

5. Dzuwa lituluka ndithu, La usana womwewo.
Onse alalike kuti, Tsiku layandikatu.
A ulendo aonenso, Kuli phiri la Mulungu;
Tidzafika konko msanga, Tidzakondwererako.

title: 155 - Kapenatu Si Ku Phiriko
content:
155 - Kapena Si Ku Phiriko

I WILL GO WHERE YOU WANT ME TO GO

1. Kapenatu si ku phiriko, Kapena ku nyanjako,
Kapena ku nkhondo komwetu, Mufuna ndipite ’ne;
Komatu akandituma ’ne Ku dziko la ’lendowo,
Ndilola mwa mphamvu ya Mbuyeyo, Ndzapita mufunako.

CHORUS:
Ndzapita kumene mufunako,
M’phiri, m’dambo, ndi m’nyanjamo;
Ndzanena zimene mufunazo,
Ndzatsata Mpulumutsiyo.

2. Alipo mau Ambuyeyo, Afuna ndinenedi;
Kapena kuli wochimwayo Wosowa thandizoli;
Ambuye, mkanditsogoza’ne, Ingavute njirayo,
Ndzauza uthenga wabwinowo, Ndzanena mufunazo.

3. Alipo malo a inenso Ku munda wa Mbuyeyo,
Ndzagwira ntchito yotutayo Ya Yesu wopachikwa.
Pokhulupilira mwanumo, Podziwa mndikonda ’ne,
Ndzachita kufunatu kwanuko, Ndzakhala mufunazo.

title: 156 - Mau Akukwiya Leka
content:
156 - Mau Akukwiya Leka

ANGRY WORDS! OH, LET THEM NEVER

1. Mau akukwiya leka,
Musanene konsetu;
Muwameze mau onse
Asanadetse m’lomowo.

CHORUS:
Kondananitu, Ati Ambuye,
Ana mverani malamulowo;
Kondananitu, Ati Ambuye,
Ana mverani lamulo.

2. Chikonditu ndi choyera,
Ndi chibwenzi chomwenso,
Musachiononge konse
Ndi mau akukwiyawo.

3. Maubwenzi amasweka,
Ndi mabanja omwenso;
Ka’mba mau a kukwiya
Olankhulidwa mwa nsontho.

title: 157 - Wakufetsa Ndi Kulira
content:
157 - Wakufesa Ndi Kulira

HARVEST TIME

1. Wakufesa ndi kulira,
Mbeu za chikondicho,
Wosatopa, wosagona,
Yesu amdalitsa ’ye.

CHORUS:
Ona! mmera wakukondwa,
Dzinthu dzonse dzachanso
Ona! m’minda mwayeratu,
Layandika khunkhalo.

2. Mvula idzatsirirapo,
Dzuwa ’dzawaliranso,
Ndi zipatso zidzabala,
M’mphamvu ya Mulunguyo.

3. Fesa mbeu, usatope,
Usaope konsetu,
Nkana utapeza vuto,
Udzatuta mokondwa.

title: 158 - Masika A Dziko Ayandika
content:
158 - Masika A Dziko Ayandika

HASTEN ON, GLAD DAY

1. Masika a dziko ayandikatu,
Aitana Mbuye okololawo;
Ndi minda yayera pa dziko lonse,
Ndi mwini zotuta wayandikanso.

CHORUS:
’Dzanitu msanga, Tengatu zotuta;
Mdzatitenge ’fe, Kwathuko.

(Alto, Tenor, and Bass):
Idzanitu angelo, msangatu;
Tengerani zotuta mmwambamo.
Mudzatengetu ife, kunkatu,
Kwathu mmwambamo.

2. E, tsiku lopanda misozi konse,
Layandika kudza mothamangatu;
Akubalalika ndi uchimowo,
Mwasonkhetu nthawi isanathei.

3. Ikomatu ntchito ya chikondicho,
Kasupe wosaphwa wa kumwambako;
Chikonditu ndicho chiitana ’fe,
Chigwiritsa ntchito, chibalitsatu.

title: 159 - Mbuyanga Ndisowa Inu
content:
159 - Mbuyanga Ndisowa Inu

HOW MUCH I NEED THEE

1. Mbuyanga, ndisowa Inu!
Ndine wosaukadi;
Mundigwire dzanja,
Mbuye, Mundilimbikitsetu.

CHORUS:
Nthawitu zonsezo,
Ndimasowa Inu, Mbuye!
Nthawitu zonsezo,
Yesu mundisunge ’ne.

2. Mundiveke zakuyera,
Zanga zili nsanzatu;
Mndiphunzitse kupemphera,
Mundipatse mphamvuzo.

3. Munditsogolere, Mbuye,
Ndekha ndilepheradi;
Myende nane pa miyalapo,
Ndinu nyali yangayo.

4. Ndingapezetu mavuto,
Oliritsa mtimanga;
Ndidzaumirira Inu
Mdzandisangalatsadi.

title: 160 - Yesu Andisungetu!
content:
160 - Yesu Andisungetu!

KEPT FOR JESUS!

1. Yesu andisungetu!
Ndi mphamvu yakeyo;
Dziko lisandidetse;
Kuti nditsate ’Ye.

CHORUS:
Yesu andisungetu!
Mbuye ndipempha ’Nu;
Inetu ndine chabe, chabe,
Inu ndi zonsezo.

2. Yesu andisungetu!
Nditumikire ’Ye;
Ndichitetu kufuna,
Kwa Yesu, Mbuyeyo.

3. Yesu andisungetu!
Dziko ndilisiya;
Ndikhaletu wofatsa,
Woyera mtimamo.

4. Yesu andisungetu!
N’khaletu wakeyo;
N’khaletu wake yekha,
Ku nthawi zonsezo.

title: 161 - Tsamwali Ndiri Naye
content:
161 - Tsamwali Ndiri Naye

MY LORD AND I

1. Tsamwali ndili naye Wokondakondadi;
Akonda ’ne koposatu, Akonda konseko;
Ndikhala ndi tsamwaliyo, Ndimkonda bwinotu;
Pamodzi ndi Ambuye Ndikhalabe.

2. Ndifo’ka ndithu mwina, Adziwa Mbuyeyo;
Auza ’ne ndimtsamire, Andithangatatu;
Anditsogoza inetu, Mwa kuunikako,
Limodzi ndi Ambuye Ndiyendabe.

3. Zokondwa, za chisoni, Ndiuza Mbuyeyo;
Ndiuza Mbuye zonsetu Za mtima mwangamo;
Auza ’ne chochitatu, Anena, Yesanso;
Pamodzi ndi Ambuye Ndinenabe.

4. Adziwa ndikufuna, Kukopa winayo,
Auza ’ne kupitatu Kunena nayenso;
Chikondi cha Mulunguyo, Ndi imfa ya Yesu;
Pamodzi ndi Ambuye Ndichitabe.

title: 162 - Yesu Anditsogozatu
content:
162 - Yesu Anditsogozatu

ALL THE WAY

1. Yesu anditsogozatu; Nanganso ndifunanji?
Kodi ndimkaika Iye, Wonditsogolerayo?
Mtenderewo andipatsa, Mwa chikhulupirocho!
Nkana lindigwere vuto, Yesu athangata ’ne’
Nkana lindigwere vuto, Yesu athangata ’ne.

2. Yesu anditsogolera, Andisangalatsanso;
Athandiza ’ne m’mayeso, Andidyetsa mkatewo;
Nkana ndili wakutopa, Ludzu landigwiranso,
Mu Thanthwelo Yesu Khristu, Ndionamo madziwo;
Mu Thanthwelo Yesu Khristu, Ndionamo madziwo.

3. Yesu anditsogolera, Mwa chikondi chakecho!
Alonjeza ’ne mpumulo, Mnyumba ya Atateyo;
Nkadzauka tsiku lija, Ndidzapita mmwambamo,
Ndidzayimba kosaleka, Yesu natsogoza ’ne;
Ndidzayimba kosaleka, Yesu natsogoza ’ne.

title: 163 - ’Mvani Yesu Aitana
content:
163 - ’Mvani Yesu Aitana

HERE AM I, SEND ME

1. ’Mvani Yesu aitana, Ndani angagwiretu?
Mindayo yayera kale, Ndani akakunkhemo?
Momvekadi aitana, Mphotho ’dzalandira ’we.
Ndani angayankhe msanga, Ndine Mbuye, tumeni.

2. Nkana sungapite mtali Ku maiko enawo,
Ungapeze anthu ena Apafupi ndi iwe.
Ngati sungalalikire Monga ngati Paulo,
Unganene za chikondi Cha Ambuye wakoyo.

3. Ngati sungakhale mlonda Wochenjeza anthuwo;
Kuwauza anthu njira Yonka nayo mmwambamo;
Pakupempherera ena, Ungagwire ntchitoyo.
Ungachite ngati Huri Pothangata Moseyo.

4. Mmene anthu alikufa, Mbuye aitanabe;
Wina asamamve nuti, Singachite kanthui.
Gwira ntchito wakupatsa, Nuigwire msangatu;
Ndi kuyankha poitana, Ndine Mbuye, tumeni.

title: 164 - Pa Mapazi Ake Yesu
content:
164 - Pa Mapazi Ake Yesu

AT THE FEET OF JESUS

1. Pa mapazi ake Yesu, Ndimva mau akewo!
Ee, pafupi ndi Ambuye, N’khale nthawi zonsezo;
Pa mapazi ake Yesu, Ndiyang’ana m’mbuyomo,
Ee, chikondi chake chonse, Chakopadi mtimanga.

2. Pa mapazi ake Yesu, Malo opambanawo;
Ndisiyepo tchimo langa, Ndi kupeza mpumulo;
Pa mapazi ake Yesu, Ndimalira mtimanga,
Pomwe ndimapeza nsisi, Tsiku lili lonselo.

3. Inu Yesu mndidalitse, Ndigwadira Inuyo;
Muyang’anetu pa ine, Nane ndikuoneni;
Ndikhaletu nawo mtima, Monga Yesu Mbuyeyo,
Ndionetseretu Yesu, Chilungamo changacho.

title: 165 - Ndikonda, Ndikonda Ambuyanga
content:
165 - Ndikonda, Ndikonda Ambuyanga

I LOVE THEE

1. Ndikonda, ndikonda Ambuyanga ’Nu;
Ndikonda Yesuyo, Mpulumutsitu.
Ndikonda Inuyo muzidziwadi;
Zintchito zinena kukonda kwanga.

2. Ndikondwa, ndikondwa kopambanadi!
Ndaima pa phiri ndiyang’anitsa
Ku mzinda woyera ndikakhaleko,
Ndi Yesu, angelo, ndi anzangawo.

3. Yesu ’Nu, Mp’lumutsi, mndidalitsetu,
Ndinutu chimwemwe mpumulo wanga.
Ndiyimba chikondi cha Mbuyangayo;
Chisomo chanucho chindidzaza ’ne.

4. Ndaniyo aposa Mpulumutsiyo?
Akonda inenso nan’thangata ’ne.
Ndiyamika Mbuye, ndiyimbira ’Ye,
Ndikondwa koposa mu mtimangamo.

title: 166 - Thanthwe Long’ambika
content:
166 - Thanthwe Long’ambika

ROCK OF AGES

1. Thanthwe long’ambikatu,
Ndibisale momwemu!
Madzi ndipo mwaziwo
Zotuluka m’nthitimo,
Zinditsuke m’mtima mbu!
Zindilimbikitsetu.

2. Ntchito zanga zonsezo,
Sizikondweretsa ’Nu;
Ndikazigwiritsadi,
Ndikalira nsonizi,
Zonse sizikwanazi,
Koma Yesu yekhayo.

3. M’manja mwanga chabe bi,
Mtanda ndingogwiradi;
Maliseche mveke ’ne,
Ndili ndekha, msunge ’ne,
Ndithawire mtsinjewo,
Munditsuke m’mtimamo.

4. M’moyo uno kunsiku,
Pena ndimwaliratu,
Mmene ndidzaukanso
Tionane masowo;
Thanthwe long’ambikatu,
Ndibisale momwemu.

title: 167 - Maziko Olimba
content:
167 - Maziko Olimba

FIRM FOUNDATION

1. Maziko olimba Ambuyathuyo,
Waikira inutu m’mau mwake,
Anene chiyani koposa icho?
Wathawira ndani kwa Mp’lumutsiyo;
Wathawira ndani kwa Mp’lumutsiyo.

2. Ndikati uyende pa mtsinjepo,
Madziwo sadzakukokolola ’we;
Pakuti ndzakhala pamodzi nawe,
Ndzadalitsa iwe, ndzapatula ’we;
Ndzadalitsa iwe, ndzapatula ’we.

3. Poyenda ’we m’moto wa mayesowo,
Chisomo changacho chikwaniradi;
Sudzapsa konsei ndangofunatu,
Kuchotsa zoipa kuyeretsa ’we,
Kuchotsa zoipa kuyeretsa ’we.

4. Wakudza kwa Yesu kubisalako,
Sindimtaya kunjatu kwa mdaniyo;
Ngakhale adani amgwedezetu,
Sindimsiya konse, sindimsiyatu;
Sindimsiya konse, sindimsiyatu.

title: 168 - Yehova Ndi M’busa Wanga
content:
168 - Yehova Ndi M’busa Wanga

THE LORD IS MY SHEPHERED

1. Yehova ndi Mbusa, Sin’dzasowai,
Ndigona ku busa La msipu Wake
Anditsogolera Ku madzi ake,
Anditsitsimutsa Ndi mphamvu Yake.

2. Anditsogolera M’mabande mwake,
Chifukwa cha dzina Lokondedwalo.
Ngakhale ndiyenda Pafupi imfa,
Ha! sindidzaopa Zoipa zonse.

3. Chibonga ndi ndodo Za Mbusa wanga
Zindisangalatsa Masiku onse.
Mundiyalikira Pa maso panga,
Mkuona kwa mdani Chakudya changa.

4. Mudzoza mafuta Pa mutu panga,
Mwadzaza chifundo Mu chikho changa,
Udzanditsatira Ukoma wanu,
Ndidzakhala nanu Masiku onse.

title: 169 - Ugoneranjitu Mwana Wa Mfumu?
content:
169 - Ugoneranjitu Mwana Wa Mfumu?

HEIR OF THE KINGDOM

1. Ugoneranjitu mwana wa mfumu,
Kwinanso wayandikira m’mwamba?
Dzuka, nyamuka, uvale za nkhondo;
Bweratu nthawi isanathei.

2. Anthu a m’dziko adzanjenjemera,
Adzaopsedwa ndi kudza Kwake;
Mvetsa migugu abwera Ambuye,
Mwana wa mfumu usachedwatu.

3. Usachedwenso ndi zinthu za m’dziko,
Ulemerero udzathadi phe!
Dula zinsinga zolimba za m’dani,
Mwana wa mfumu kondwera ndithu.

4. Usayang’anetu kwina iyai,
Yembekezera ufumu wake;
Ona kuwala m’mapiri monsemo,
Mwana wa mfumu zileke zonse.

title: 170 - Mulungu, Mfumu
content:
170 - Mulungu, Mfumu

MY MAKER AND MY KING

1. Mulungu, Mfumu ’Nu, Ndilibe mphamvutu,
Munandilenga, mundisunga Nthawi zonsezi.
Munandilenga, Mundisunga Nthawi zonsezi.

2. Ndilibe winanso, Ndimatsamira ’Nu;
Zabwino zanu zipambana, Ndichitenji ko?
Zabwino zanu zipambana, Ndichitenji ko?

3. Ndipatse chiyani ko? Poona zonsezi
Zakhala zanu kale ndithu. Ndidzatani ko?
Zakhala zanu kale ndithu. Ndidzatani ko?

4. Mufuna mtimanga, Ndipatsa msangatu.
Ndikhale wanu nthawi zonse, Mndilandire ’ne.
Ndikhale wanu nthawi zonse, Mndilandire ’ne.

title: 171 - Kunja Kuli Kucha Kodi?
content:
171 - Kunja Kuli Kucha Kodi?

WHAT OF THE NIGHT?

1. Kunja kuli kucha kodi? Mlonda, tandiuza ’ne.
Kodi nthanda yatuluka? Kodi kunja kwachatu?
Ukuona kodi kuti kwachadi?
Ukuona kodi kuti kwachadi?

2. Tifunsitse za ulendo, Kodi ulikuthadi?
Tayandikatu ku doko, Kodi tingaoneko?

Sindiopa konse bi,
Yesu ap’lumutsadi,
Bwenzi labwino ndilo Yesu.

4. Podzafika kumwamba konko,
Tonse okhulupirika ’fe,
Inde, tidzayimbadi
Kumtamanda Iyeyo,
Bwenzi labwino ndilo Yesu.

title: 199 - Ulemu Kwa Mulungu
content:
199 - Ulemu Kwa Mulungu

TO GOD BE THE GLORY

1. Ulemu kwa Mlungu, Ambuye wathu,
Akonda, napatsa ’fe Mwana Wake;
Napatsatu moyo kuombola ’fe,
Pa khomo la moyo natsegulatu.

CHORUS:
Tamani Mbuyeyo, Dziko limvere ’Ye;
Tamani Mbuyeyo, Anthu akondwetu;
Idzani kwa ’Tate mwa Mwana Wake,
Mpatseni ulemu anakonda ’fe.

2. Anapulumutsa ndi mwazi Wake
Amene akhulupirira mwa ’Ye.
Ngakhale wochimwa koposa ndithu,
Adzakhululukidwa mwa Yesuyo.

3. Anatiphunzitsa zopambanazo,
Tikondwa mwa Yesu, Ambuye wathu;
Komabe ’dzazizwa kopambanadi,
Pamene atenga ’fe, kumwambako.

title: 200 - Ndinu Wakuyera!
content:
200 - Ndinu Wakuyera!

HOLY, HOLY, HOLY!

1. Ndinu wakuyera! Wa mphamvu zonse,
Nthawi ya m’mamawa tiyimba nyimboyi;
Mlengi wachifundo tikuyamikani,
Ee, Mlungu m’modzi mwa Atatuwo.

2. Ndinu wakuyera! Onse pa dziko
Akuyimbirani nakupempherani;
Akumwamba omwe nagwadira Inu,
Wa chikhalire ndi wosafai.

3. Ndinu wakuyera! Ife ochimwa,
Ulemero wanu sitimaona bi!
Mwayeradi nokha, wina saoneka;
Wangwiro m’mphamvu ndi m’kuyeramo.

title: 201 - Anandibvuula
content:
201 - Anandibvuula

HE BROUGHT ME OUT

1. Mtima wanga unaopa Yehova
Ntakanikizidwa pansi ndi cimo;
Ndamulirira Ambye m’thopemo,
Anandibvuulamo mwa cifundo.

CHORUS:
Anandibuula m’matope,
Nandikhazikitsa pa thanthwe;
Moyo wanga lero uyimba,
Matamando Haleluya

 2. Wandikhazika pa thanthwe lolimba,
Ndakhazikitsidwa sindicokapo;
Pano palibe coopsya ndakhala,
Cisomo cidzandibveka korona.

3. Wandipatsa nyimbo ya mayamiko,
Msana ndi usiku ndidzayimba;
Mtimawu useka ndi ufulu,
Ndikutamandani Mombolo wanga.

4. Ndidzayimba nsisi mwandicitira,
Ndzalimbika mpaka onse amdziwe;
Cipulumutso ndzayimba konseko.
Kuti ambiri amvere Mulungu

title: 202 - Yesu Tsogolereni
content:
202 - Yesu Tsogolereni

PILOT ME

1. Yesu tsogolereni, Pa ulendo woopsya;
Zobvuta zosatheka; ziri m’tsogolo mwanga,
Inu zonse mudziwa, Yesu tsogolereni.

2. Monga mai acita Naye mwana polira
Muletse zobvutazo; Nditonthozedwe ine,
Ndinu Mfumu ya luntha; Yesu tsogolereni.

3. Pakutha pa dzikoli, Zoopsa zidzakula;
Pokhapokha pa Inu, Ndidzapeza Mpumulo,
Ndidzamva mau aja ’Msaope nditsogoza.’

title: 203 - Nkhoswe Yadza
content:
203 - Nkhoswe Yadza

THE COMFORTER HAS COME

1. Lalikira mau konse kuli anthu
A mtima wosowa A m’dziko latsoka,
Mkhristu ali yense Anene mokondwa
Nkhoswe yafikadid!

CHORUS:
Nkhoswe yafikadi, Nkhoswe yafikadi!
Mzimu wa Mulungu pangano la Mbuye;
Lalikira mau Konse kuli anthu,
Nkhoswe yafikadi!

2. Usiku wapiti, Kunja nako kwaca;
Kulira kwaleka, Ndi mkwiyo naonse,
Pamapiri napo Dzuwa lioneka;
Nkhoswe yafikadi!

3. Mfumu ya mafumu ibwera ndi mwayi,
Kwa ocimwa onse Kudzapulumutsa;
M’malomo mwa cete Mumveka nyimbo
Nkhoswe yafikadi!

4. Cikondi cakuya Ndicimene bwanji,
Kwa anthu ocimwa Apeze cisomo, Wocimwa ngati’ne Ndingawale bwanji;
Nkhoswe yafikadi!

5. Kuyimba kumveke Mlengalenga monse;
Oyera a m’mwamba Ndi a pansi pano
Abvomerezane Nyimbo yacikondi,
Nkhoswe yafikadi!

title: 204 - Bwera Wosocera! Bwera!
content:
204 - Bwera Wosocera! Bwera!

WELCOME! WELCOME! WELCOME!

1. M’dziko la alendo, Komwe ukhala,
Imva kuitana, "Mwana wanga!’

CHORUS:
"Bwera wosocera! Bwerera Kwanu!
Wasocera Kutali; Bwera kwanu!’

2. Ku dziko la njala, Wokomokawe
Idza ukondwe, "Mwana wanga!"

3. Siya zanduzo Coka m’matsoka,
Watopa mumtima, "Mwana wanga!"

4. Komo Ndotseguka! Ndiwe wangabe;
Ndikuyang’anabe, "Mwana wanga!"

5. Wasocereratu; Subwera kodi?
Wakhulukidwa, "Mwana wanga!"

6. Gome lilindira, Suiwalika!
Udzadye upume, "Mwana wanga!"

7. Wopanda kwanu’we, Wopereweza,
Ndikukonda iwe, "Mwana wanga!"

title: 205 - Yesu Ponong’oneza
content:
205 - Yesu Ponong’oneza

WHILE JESUS WHISPERS TO YOU

1. Yesu ponong’oneza, Idzanitu, Mupempherera ife, idzanitu;
Njabwino nthawi ino, idzanitu, Yomdziwa Mpulumutsi, Idzanitu.

2. Tulani zoipazo, Idzanitu; Yesu adzatha zonse, Idzanitu;
Olema ndi ocimwa, Idzanitu, Sakumbukira izo, Idzanitu

3. Imvani mau ace, Idzanitu, Mudzalandira dalo, Idzanitu;
Naco cisomo cace, idzanitu, Yesu alindu inu, idzanitu.

4. Mverani Iye ati, Idzanitu; Tiyeni mudzamona, idzanitu.
Ee! Akutanabe, Idzanitu, Ife tibvomereza, tibweratu.

title: 206 - Ndinakuferatu, Wacitanji ’
content:
206 - Ndinakuferatu, Wacitanji ’

I GAVE MY LIFE FOR THEE

1. Ndinakufera ’we, ndakhetsa mwaziwo
Kupulumutsa ’we kucoka mwimfayo
Ndapatsa moyo wangawo, wapatsa inenji?
Wapatsa moyo wangawo, wapatsa inenji?

2. Ndasiya mwambamo, ulemererowo,
Ndinadza m’dzikomu mwa mdima wokhawo.
Ndasiya zonse zabwino, wasiya c’ani ’we?
Ndasiya zonse zabwino, was iya c’ani ’we?

3. Ndinazunzidwa ’ne, kosanenekatu,
Ndasautsine ’ne, populumutsa ’we.
Ndinapirira zonsezi, wapiliranji ’we?
Ndinapilira zonsezi, wapiliranji ’we?

title: 207 - Cikhululukiro Coona
content:
207 - Cikhululukiro Coona

SEALS MY PARDON

1. Ndinaona pa Mtandapo
Wothatha ndi mwazi
Ali kundiyang’anitsa,
Pafupi ndi mtanda

2. Sindihta Kuiwala,
Zomwe ndinaona
Ngati ndine ndinamupha,
Zidziwika zokha

3. Anandiyang’anitsanso,
Ngati kundiuza
Imfa yino, mwazi uno,
zikupulumutsa

4. Chimo langa linamupha,
Loda ngati mdima,
Cinsisi ca cisomoco,
Cakhululukira

title: 208 - Usamanong’ona
content:
208 - Usamanong’ona

BE SILENT! BE SILENT!

1. Usamanong’ona M’kacisi muno!
Udzikhala cete, Kumvetseratu.

CHORUS:
Nyang’ma (tu), Nyang’ama (tu),
Poyenda muno
Popeza (tu), m’nyumba (tu)
Ya Mlungu wathu.

2. Udzikhala cete malo ano
Cifukwa Ambuye aona iwe.

3. Udzidzicepetsa popempherapo;
Cifukwa Ambuye amvera iwe.

4. Ganiza zabwino za Mlungu wathu,
Dikira, numvere uthenga wace.

title: 209 - Ntayenda Nanu
content:
209 - Ntayenda Nanu

1. Ntayenda nanu Mulungu!
Ngati a Kumwamba,
Ntaunikidwa panjira,
Yofitsa kwa Yesu

2. Mzimu Woyera bwerani,
Mtehnga wa mpumulo;
Ndidana nazo zoipa,
Zotilekanitsa

3. Ndinakondwa nthawi ija!
Sindingaiwaile,
Ndatsala m’zobvuta zokha,
Dziko ndi lacabe.

4. Fano ndinalikondalo,
Kaya ndi lotani,
Thangateni kulicotsa,
nditsale ndi Inu

title: 210 - Mombolo Wozizwitsa
content:
210 - Mombolo Wozizwitsa

WHAT A WONDERFUL SAVOUR

1. Khristu nsembe ya ocimwa, Mombolo wozizwitsa!
Taomboledwa ndi mwazi, Mombolo wozizwitsa!

CHORUS:
Mombolo wozizwitsa ndiye Yesu wanga!
Mombolo wozizwitsa Ndi Yesu Mbuye.

2. Nditama mwazi wacewo, Mombolo wozizitswa!
Wandifitsa kwa Mulungu, Mombolo wozizwitsa!

3. Wanditsuka chimo lonse, Mombolo wozizwitsa!
Mfumu ndiye m’kati mwanga, Mombolo wozizwitsa!

4. Ndiri naye m’njira monse, Mombolo wozizwitsa!
An’sunga tsiku ndi tsiku, Mombolo wozizwitsa!

5. Andipatsa cigonjetso, Mombolo wozizwitsa!
Ndi m’mayeso cipambano, Mombolo wozizwitsa!

6. Ndampatsa Mtima wonsewu, Mombolo wozizweitsa!
Dziko silingathandize; Mombolo wozizwitsa!

title: 211 - Madalitso Ngati Mvula
content:
211 - Madalitso Ngati Mvula

THERE SHALL BE SHOWERS OF BLESSING

1. "Madalitso ngati mbvumbi;’ Pangano la cikondi;
Nyengo yakupata mphamvu, Yocokera Kumwamba.

CHORUS:
Tipempha Inu Mvula ya madalitso;
Nsisi zitigwre ife, Tipempha madalitso.

(Alto, Tenor and Bass):
Mvula tipempha Inu, Mvula ya madalitso,
Nsisi zitigwre ife, Tipempha madalitso.

2. "Madalitso ngati mbumbi; "Titsitsimutseniso"
M’mapiri ndi m’madambonso, Mvula ya citsitsimutso.

3. "Madalitso ngati Mbvumbi;" Tipotsenitu Mbuye;
Mtitsitsimutse tsopano, Tiope Mau anu.

4. "Madalitso ngati mbvumbi;" Mbumbiwo ugwe lero,
Tilandireninso Mbuye, Yesu musatitaye.

title: 212 - Ndiyimba Mu Mtima Mokondwa
content:
212 - Ndiyimba Mu Mtima Mokondwa

THERE COMES TO MY HEART

1. Ndiyimba mu Mtima mokondwa! Ndi nyimbo yokoma, yoyera;
Ndiyimba za Yesu Mbuyanga, Anditonthozane phe!

CHORUS:
Cete! Cete! M’mtima mtenderemu phe;
Udzera kwa Yesu wokonda, Mtendere mu mtimamu.

2. Pa mtanda Mbuyanga nafera, Adandicotsera zocimwa;
Anandigulira mtendere, Anditonthozane phe!

3. Pomsankha Yesuyo Mbuyanga, Mtendere walowa mu Mtima;
Ndapeza dalitso loposa, Anditonthozane phe!

4. Pokonda Yesuyo, mtendere, Ku nthawi zosatha mtendere;
Potsata Mbuyanga apatsa, Mtendere mu mtimamu.

title: 213 - Nyimbo Yanga
content:
213 - Nyimbo Yanga

MY SONG

1. Yesu mombolo wanga, Ndinu nyimbo yanga
Mpulumutsi wabwino, Ndikamabvutika

CHORUS:
Yesu Mombolo wanga, Ndiyimbira Inu;
Palibe bwenzi lina, Ndikondana nalo.

2. Ndiyembekezera’nu, Mwa zaka zonsezi,
Ndikapanikizidwa, Polira misozi.

3. Inu nokha Mbuyanga, Bwenzi ndi mtsogozi,
Ndikondetsa Inutu, Kuposa za dziko

4. Msangalatsi ndi Inu, M’dziko la ucimo,
Ndikuganizani’nu M’zipata za m’Mwamba.

title: 214 - Kodi Yesu Asamala
content:
214 - Kodi Yesu Asamala

DOES JESUS CARE?

1. Kodi Yesu asamalira
Nkasowa cimwemwe;
Ndikapsinjika ndi kuda nkhawa
M’njira yonse yaitari?

CHORUS:
Ndidziwa amasamala, Inde ndikabvutika;
Ndithu masana ndi usiku amandisamalirane.

2. Kodi yesu asamalitsa
Mu’siku woopsa,
Pamene kwada zoopsa zadza,
Andisamalabe kodi?

3. Kodi Yesu asamalitsa
Ndikagwa m’mayeso?
Mwa za cisoni zosapumitsa,
Misozi usiku wonse?

4. Kodi Yesu asamalitsa
Poleka za dziko,
Ndiri kuthatha pafupi kufa
Kodi akundionadi?

title: 215 - Linda Usadandaule
content:
215 - Linda Usadandaule

WAIT AND MURMUR NOT

1. Kwathu kosasinthikako, Ndi masautso kulibe;
Inde kwathu kowalako, Kodi sudzapumulako?

CHORUS:
Linda, usadandauletu, Linda usadandauletu;
Linda, Linda, Usadandauletu.

2. Walemedwa ndi katundu, Wa zinthu za dziko lino,
Tsiku lopuma lidzadza( fatsa usadandaule.

3. M’njira muli minga kodi, Iye anabvala minga;
Wapeza cisoni kodi, Iye cinamgwera kale.

4. Gwira ntchito upirire, Ngakhale umanyozeka;
Tsiku lopuma lifika, Linda usadandaule.

title: 216 - Sindiri Ndekha
content:
216 - Sindiri Ndekha

NEVER ALONE

1. Ndekha? Bi, sindiri ndekha Yesu ngwanga;
Amandisangalatsa; ali pafupipa,
Ulibe bwenzi ko, Ndiri naye Yesu;
Ndimasinthasinthadi, Iye sasinthatu.

CHORUS:
Sindiri ndekha, sindiri ndekha;
Anapangana nane kuti sadzandisiya ndekha.

2. Kutopa? Nditoperenji, Yesu ngwanga;
Ndatsamira pa Iye, Ndiri kupumula,
Wosowawe; Inde ndatsamira zedi,
Pa dzanja lace Yesu phe Andisamalira.

3. Kulindira? Inde, kulindira;
Kaya acedweranji Ambuye kubwera,
Ndiye ukukondwa? Inde, kukondwadi;
Ndikondwa ndi maziko ndiye Ambuyanga.

title: 217 - Cinthu Cina Kwa Yesu
content:
217 - Cinthu Cina Kwa Yesu

SOMETHING FOR JESUS

1. Mbuye! Cikondico ’natifera,
Cosandiyenera, ndidza kwanu;
Ndidziperekatu mphatso zanga zonse,
Sindidzamanatu cirri conse.

2. Wondipembedzera ndinu nokha
Ndiyembekezera pa Inutu;
Senzeni mtandawo ndiuze cikondi
Kuti ndingacite cinthu cina.

3. Zonse ndiri nazo nzolandira
Monga masikuwa’ kupita,
Ntchito yacikondi yayambidwa kale,
Otaika ena tikabweze.

4. Zonse ndiri nazo mwandipatsa,
Ndipatsa kwa Inu Ambuyanga
Nditafika m’mwamba moyo wanga ngwanu,
Cinthu cina nchanu nthawi zonse

title: 218 - Maziko Amodzi
content:
218 - Maziko Amodzi

ONE FOUNDATION

1. Maziko a mpingo amodzi ndi Kristu;
Colenga catsopano, mwa madzi ndi mau;
Anatsika kumwamba nalenga mpingowo;
Naugula ndi mwazi naufera mpingo.

2. Wokwanira mitundu yonse ya pa dziko;
Koma cipulumutso mwa njira imodzi,
Dzinali loyeretsa lapanga mpingowu,
Cogaawira cimodzi cisomo coyera.

3. Ponyoza mpingo wace anthu adzaona,
Adani apasula Thanthwe sadzalitha;
Oyerawo osunga cikhulupiriro;
Cisoni cikadzatha, tidzakondwerera.

4. M’kati mwa masauko a mpingo woyera;
Mpingo ulindirira cipulumutsoco;
Maso otopa nako kulira kukwera;
Mpingo waukuruwo udzagonjetsadi.

title: 219 - Mudnitsogolere Yehova
content:
219 - Mudnitsogolere Yehova

GUIDE ME O T HOU GREAT JEHOVAH

1. MBuye nditsogolereni
Ndine mlendo m’dzikoli;
Ndalefuka nditengeni
Mundisunge m’manjamo.
Mundidyetse, mundidyetse,
Mundidyetse, kufikira ndikhute

2. Mudnimwetse madzi anu Andicize nthandazi,
Utsogole mtambo wanu, Ndikafike komweko,
Wamphamvu’nu wamphamvunu,
Wamphamvun’u, Khalani mphamvu yanga.

3. Ntaponda gombe la Yordan, Mantha mundicotsere;
Ndioloke tsidya ilo, Komwe kuli cimwemwe
Nkayimbira, Nkayimira,
Nkayimbira, Nkatamabnde kosatha

title: 220 - Kwathu
content:
220 - Kwathu

THE HOMELAND

1. Ndilakalaka kwathu! Dziko laufulu!
Kwathu kopanda mdima, Kulibe usiku;
Ndiri kulira kwathu, Mtima suli bwino;
Kulibe z owawa kwathu, Ndayandikirako;
Kulibe zowawa kwathu, Ndayandikirako.

2. Mbuyanga ali kwathu, Angelo abwino;
Kulibe chimo kwathu, Mayeso kulibe;
Nyimbozo za kwathuko Ndiri kuzimvatu
Ndikaganiza za kwathu Ndilira misozi
Ndikaganiza za kwathu Ndilira misozi

3. Anthu okhala kwathu Andikodolane,
Kopanda zacisoni Kwa okhala mommo;
Komomadi kwathuko! Kwa mtendere uko!
Kristu atifitsa kwathu Mwini wotikonda;
Kristu atifitsa kwathu Mwini wotikonda.

title: 221 - Zokumbutsa Galileya
content:
221 - Zokumbutsa Galileya

MOMORIES OF GALILEE

1.Ndamva nkhunda..Ndi nthambinso,
Zimamveka ..Pa madzulo .,
Zindiuza Umulungu,
Zinkumbutsa Galileya

CHORUS:
Galileya Wokoma’we
Komwe Yesu ’nakhalitsa,
Galileya Wakuyawe,
Idza udzandiyimbire.

2. Mwa madambo .Muli ndere
Mbalamenso Ziyimbira
M’mawamawa Ziyamika
Mokwanira M’galileya

3. Nkawerenga .Zozizwazo
Za woyenda Pa nyanjapo .
Ndifunadi . Kopambana,
Kumtsata ’Ye..M’Galileya

title: 222 - M’manja A Yesu Wanga
content:
222 - M’manja A Yesu Wanga

SAFE IN THE ARMS OF JESUS

1. M’manja a Yesu wanga ndiri kugonamo,
Mommo aphimba ine naco cikondico.
Mvera! Mudzera mmwamba mau a Yesu wanga,
"Mwana ndisungira pano pa matima panga"

CHORUS:
M’manja a Yesu wanga ndiri kugonamo,
Mommo aphimmba ine naco cikondico.

2. M’manja a Yesu wanga nkhawa zonsezi zi!
Momwe zoipa zanga sizindibvuta bi.
Mommo mulibe nsoni, mommo mokoma monse.
Sindiliramo msozi, nkondwa ndi Mtima wonse.

3. Mtima umabisala m’manja mwa Yesumo,
Mbuye musunge ine, ndikhulupira ’Nu.
Mommo wa cete ine mpaka wocoka mdima,
Tsono ndiona komwe Yesu wokoma Mtima.

title: 223 - Niddzatsata Konseko
content:
223 - Niddzatsata Konseko

FOLLOW ALL THE WAY

1. Ndimva Mpulumutsi wanga, Mwa cifuno andi’tana
Ndimva mau ace ati, "Unditsate  tsate konseko

CHORUS:
Ndidzasenza mtanda wanga,
Kutsatira Mpulumutsi;
Komwe anditsogolera,
Ndinke naye, naye, konseko.

2. Njira ide mdilma bwanji, Mapazi atope bwanji;
Mtimawu ’dzalimbikira, Pakumtsata tsata konseko.

3. Yesu atsogolerabe, Wondiunikira m’Mwamba,
Kafoka andilimbitsa, Pakumtsata-tsata konseko.

4. Mobvuta antsogolera, Ndidya mana a kumwamba;
Ambuye ndkusowani, Pakumtsata-tsata konseko.

5. Mwandilera ndi cikondi, Mundifungate dzolimba,
M’cisomo canu mndisunge, Pakumtsata-tsata konseko.

title: 224 - Nyali Yanu Iwalire
content:
224 - Nyali Yanu Iwalire

LET THE LOWER LIGHTS BE BURNING

1. Tate wathu wa Kumwamba, ’Natipatsa nyali’Ce,
Koma atiuza ife, Tiwalitse enawo.

CHORUS:
Nyali yanu iwalire, Kusonyeza njirayo
Kwa ocimwa ndi ofo’ka, Njira yonka m’Mwambamo.

2. Kuli mdima m’dziko lino, Ndi namondwe wa bvuto,
Obvutika alindira Nyali yotsogozayo.

3. Konza nyali yako msanga, Pena wobvutikayo
Atayidwa mu mdima, Akapanda nyaliyo.

title: 225 - Uyang’ane Mdaniyo
content:
225 - Uyang’ane Mdaniyo

STAND LIKE THE BRAVE

1. Mkhristuwe dzuka! Alamula Mbuye;
Tenga cikopa, ndi lupanga m’dzanja,
Ukomane naye, usamuope
Ulimbe Mtima, Myang’ane mdaniyo.

Refrain:
Limba Mtima, Limba Mtima,
Limba Mtima, Pom’yang’ana mdani.

2. Zoopsa ziripo, ucenjeretu,
Usafulatire, ungapwekekwe;
Unyinji wa ’dani, udzagonjetsa,
Ulimbe Mtima, M’yang’ane mdaniyo.

3. Ntchito ya Mbuyako uiteteze;
Dzukatu mwa cangu nkhondoyo ithe;
Akakulamula, pita mwa cangu,
Ulimbe Mtima M’yang’ane mdaniyo.

4. Pita limbikira, suli wekhai,
Mwayi apatsa, cisangalatsonso;
Mwayi apatsa, cisangalatsonso;
Cikondi cace ngati mtsinje m’tengo;
Ulimbe Mtima M’yang’ane mdaniyo

title: 226 - Pafupi Kukopeka
content:
226 - Pafupi Kukopeka

ALMOST PERSUADED

1. Pang’onong’ono kukopedwa;
Pang’onong’ono kumlandira,
Wina akutero, "Pita, Mzimu, pita,
Ndikaona nthawi n’kuitana."

2. Pang’onong’ono, lero idza;
Pang’onong’ono usalubze,
Yesu akwitana, angelo mpafupi,
Anthu akupempha, Bweranitu.

3. Pangonong’ono mwayi wathaa;
Pang’onong’ono tsoka ladza!
Kucedwa simwayi, ndi tsoka loopsa.
Ha, adaliradi, "Ndacedwatu!"

title: 227 - Pa Mtanda
content:
227 - Pa Mtanda

AT THE CROSS

1. Ambuye mwazi nakhetsa, Mfumu yanga nifa,
Naperekera mutuwo Mbozi ngati ine!

CHORUS:
Pa mtanda, pa mtanda ndaona kuwala,
Colemetsa mtimanga cacoka;
Mwa cikhulupiriro ndiona,
Ndikondwera kosaleka.

2. Anabuula pa mtengo, Ndi zoipa zanga;
Kuya cisomo citere, Cikondi cakuya!

3. Nzosatheka kubwezera Cikondi cotere;
Ndingodzipereka Mbuye, Zokhazo ndicita.

title: 228 - Muyamikeni Yesu
content:
228 - Muyamikeni Yesu

PRAISE HIM! PRAISE HIM

1. Nyamikeni! Yesu wodala Mombolo!
Yimba cikondi cozizwitsadi!
Mkondwereni mkuru wa angelo m’Mwamba,
Dzina lace lilimekezedwe!
Monga mbusa asunga ana,
M’mikono mwace awanyamula.

CHORUS:
Myamikeni! Ali wamkuru koposa;
Myamikeni m’nyimbo zokondwera.

2. Myamikeni! Yesu wodala Mombolo!
Zathu zocimwa nathira mwazi;
Ndiye Thanthwe lathu la cipulumutso,
Myamikeni Yesu wopacikikwa;
Mbukitseni! Yesu wotithangata,
Cikondi cosamariza ncace.

3. Myamikeni! Yesu wodala mombolo!
Khomo m’mwamba mumveka hosanna!
Yesu Mbuye alera nthawi zosatha;
Mbveke krona Wansembe ndi mfumu!
Kristu adza wogonjetsa dzikoli,
Mphavu ndi ulemu ndi za Yesu.

title: 229 - Wa Yesuyo Ndani?
content:
229 - Wa Yesuyo Ndani?

WHO IS ON THE LORD’S SIDE

1. Wa Yesuyo ndani? Ngoona;
Mbali ndi ziwiri; Usankhe

CHORUS:
Sankha, sankha (Wa Yesuyo ndani? Wa Yesuyo ndani?)
Yabwino, yoipa? Usankhe
Sankha, sankha,
Yabwino, yoipa? Usankhe.

2. Ambiri asankha Yoipa;
Yosalimba ndi ya mabodza.

3. Gwirizana naye Ambuye,
Ndiyo mbali yokha yolimba.

title: 230 - Ndine Njira
content:
230 - Ndine Njira

I AM THE WAY

1. Monga nkhosa zotayika, Zomwazika konse;
Zasiya moyo, mtendere, Njira yandisowa?

CHORUS (Sop. & alto):
Ndine njira, co’nadi, moyo
Sungafike Atate koma mwa Ine,
Ndine njira, co’nadi, moyo,
Sungafike Atate komwa mwa Ine

(Bass and Tenor):
Ndine njira, ndine njira, ndine njira co’nadi, moo
Sungafike Atate koma mwa ine,
Ndine njira, ndine njira, ndine njira co’nadi, moyo
Sungafike Atate koma mwa ine.

2. Nkhawa zandisokoneza, Mulungu ndifuna;
Manena-nena ngambiri, Ndingagwire ziti?

3. Kwa Kristu, njira, co’nadi Ndi moyo ndibweranso;
Adzandifitsa kwa Tate, Kumalo kosatha.

title: 231 - Lowetsa Yesu Mu Mtima
content:
231 - Lowetsa Yesu Mu Mtima

LET JESUS COME INTO YOUR HEART

1. Kodi watopa nazo zoipa, Lowetsa Yesu mu Mtima;
Ngati ufuna kutembenuka, Lowetsa Yesu mu Mtima.

CHORUS:
Leka kukayikatu; Usamkanenso lero,
Tsegula Mtima wako; Lowetsa Yesu mu Mtima.

2. Ukafuna kukhala woyera, Lowetsa Yesu mu Mtima;
Madzi osamba ali pafupi, Lowetsa Yesu mu Mtima.

3. Ngati muli bvuto mtimamo, Lowetsa Yesu mu Mtima;
Ngati wapereweza za m’dziko, Lowetsa Yesu mu Mtima.

4. Abwenzi akakusandukira, Lowetsa Yesu mu Mtima;
Ndiye bwenzi losatekeseka, Lowetsa Yesu mu Mtima.

5. Ngati uyimba nao odala, Lowetsa Yesu mu Mtima;
Udzalowe m’nyumba za mpumulo, Lowetsa Yesu mu Mtima.

CHORUS (wotsiriza):
Leka kukayikaku; Usamkanenso lero,
Ndatsegula citseko, Kuti Yesu alowemo.

title: 232 - Sindidzakusiya
content:
232 - Sindidzakusiya

I WILL NEVER LEAVE THEE

1. Sindidzakusiya konse, Sindidzakukananso;
Ndzatsogola ndzakusunga, Mongwa mwa dzina langa;
Musaope coipaco, pomvera malangizo.

2. Mphepo zikaomba mkuntho, upemphere kwa Ine;
Ndidzakufungata iwe, Kukusamala bwino;
Poyesedwa konyazitsa, Ndidzakuyendetsa bwino.

3. Mlengalenga pong’azima pakakoma ponsepo,
Madyerero osasowa, Zokondweretsa zokha;
Ndidzakhala nawe ndithu, Ndi kuti usacimwe.

4. Ngati ndadodometsedwa, Ndi nkhawa ndi cisoni,
Ngakhaletu kuli nkhungu, Ndidzakuunikira,
Mbendera yokwezekayi, Ya cikondi canga njo.

title: 233 - Uzeni Nthano Yakale
content:
233 - Uzeni Nthano Yakale

TELL ME THE OLD, OLD STORY

1. Uze nthano yakale, Ya za kumwambako,
Za Yesu wacifundo, Za Yesu wokonda;
Pang’ono pang’onotu, monga kwa kamwana,
Poti ndiri wotopa, wopanda thandizo.

CHORUS:
Nthano yakale uze, Nthano yakale uze,
Nthano yakale uze, Ya Yesu wokonda.

2. Pang’ono ndi pang’ono, Motsimikizadi;
Pakuti ndaipadi, Yesu nandifera;
Nthano yonseyo uze, Musacite mphwayi,
M’nthawi yonse ya bvuto, Andisangalatsa.

3. Nenatu yomwe ija, Ukhala ndi mantha,
Kuti dziko loipa, Ndilikondetsetsa;
Ulemu wa dzikowu Uyamba m’moyomu,
Uze nthano yakale; Yesu akuciza.

title: 234 - Yesu Nyali Ya Dziko
content:
234 - Yesu Nyali Ya Dziko

JESUS THE LIGHT OF THE WORD

1. Ha! Nayimba angelo, Yesu nyali ya dziko;
Mwana wabadwa Mfumu, Yesu nyali ya dziko.

CHORUS:
Yenda m’kuunika kwabwiniko,
Idza kumene kuli cifuno,
Kuwala kwa msana ndi usiku;
Yesu, nyali ya dziko.

2. Mapfukonu kondwani, Yesu nyali ya dziko;
Kondwani ndi a m’mwamba, Yesu nyali ya dziko.

3. M’mwamba amlekeza, Yesu nyali ya dziko;
Yesu Mbuye wosatha, Yesu nyali ya dziko.

4. Mfumu ya mtenderedi, Yesu nyali ya dziko;
Dzuwa la cilungamo, Yesu nyali ya dziko.

title: 235 - Ladzanso Tsiku Lakupumula
content:
235 - Ladzanso Tsiku Lakupumula

AGAIN THE DAY RETURNS

1. Ladzanso tsiku lakupula,
Lodalitsidwa ndi Mlunguyo;
Iye napuma ntchito zacezo,
Ndipo afuna tipumulenso.

2. Tiyeni tonse pa Sabatali,
Timveretu Kufuna kwaceko;
Tsono poyimba ndi kupemphera,
Iye adzakondwera nafetu.

3. Mbuye, Muchere khutu lanulo;
Mumve pemphero la t iana ’fe;
Kumbukirani lonjezanolo,
Mupulumutse otaikawo.

4. Inu, Atate wakumwambako,
Ndinu wakuticinjiriza ’fe.
Ndinu wakutitsogoleranso,
Tikuongani nthawi zonsezo.

title: 236 - Cifundo Cace
content:
236 - Cifundo Cace

HIS LOVING KINDNESS

1. Dzuka moyo wanga kondwa, Yimbira cipulumutso;
Ndimyimbire nyimbo; Cifuno cace; Ncoposa!

CHORUS:
Wacifuno, wacifundo cace, ncoposa!

2. ’Nandiona wotayika, Anandikondabe ndithu;
’Nabweza potayikane; Cifundo cace, Ncoposa!

3. Acurukadi adani, Ngakhale acite nazo,
Moyo wanga asungabe; cifundo cace, Ncamphamvu!

4. Bvuto loda ngati mtambo, Lasonkhana ligundira,
Aima pafupi nane; Cifuno cace, Ncokoma!

5. Mwini Mfumu akadzadza, Kudzatenga anthu ace,
Ndikayimba pa tsikulo Cifundo cace, Kosatha!

title: 237 - Akristu Limbikani!
content:
237 - Akristu Limbikani!

STAND UP! STAND UP FOR JESUS!

1. Akristu limbikani, imani mtimanji!
Mbendera nyamulani, musanthenthemerebi.
Wotsogolera wathu ndi Mwana wa Mulungu;
Adzagonjetsa onse, adani athuwo.

2. Tigwire nkhondo yomwe ya Mbuye wathuyo;
Ticotse zakuipa zokhala mtimamo.
Sitikwanira tokha kuleka zinthu zomwe;
Koma Mbuyathu Yesu atithangatatu.

3. Tsopano timenyana ndi zakuipazo,
Pamene nkhondo yatha tidzanka kwathuko;
Yesu adzalandira ankhondo ace onse,
Adzakhalitsa naye Kumwamba komweko.

4. Limbikani anzathu! Msanga nkhondo itha
Lero kuli cinkhondo, mawa tigonjetsa
Kwa iye wolakika, adzakhala moyo;
Pamodzi ndi Mfumuyo ’dzakhala kosatha.

title: 238 - Akulowa M’zipata
content:
238 - Akulowa M’zipata

SWEEPING THROUGH THE GATES

1. Awa ndani pa tsidya la Nyanja, Omwe payola manda acetu,
Akondwera mwa Yesu? Asamba m’mwazi Wace.

CHORUS:
Akulowa mzinda wa Yerusalemu,
Asamba m’mazi (wace) wa nkhosa;
Alowa m’zipata za Yerusalemu,
Asamba m’mwazi Wace.

 2. Awa ndiwo anapeza Yesu, Pamene anali anyamata,
Nalandira cisomo, Asamba m’mwazi Wace.

3. Awa ndiwo mansautso yao, Anapeza kupuma mwa Yesu,
Mtendere mu mtimamo, Asamba m’mwazi Wace.

4. Iwo adapirira mabvuto, Anapyola pakati pa moto:
Yesu ati idzani, Asamba m’mwazi Wace.

title: 239 - Kodi Uli Kulemedwa?
content:
239 - Kodi Uli Kulemedwa?

ART THOUGH WEARY?

1. Kodi uli kulemedwa ndi zoipazo?
Idza kuno ati Yesu, Pumako.

2. Ndikamzindikira n’inji Mbuye wangayo?
Ali ndi mabala m’manja mwacemo.

3. Kodi ali ndi cilemba m’mphumi mwacemo?
E! Cilembaco ca minga cirimo.

4. Ndikampeza ndikamtsata ninji pansi?
Masauko ndi misozi ziripo.

5. Ndikamfunafuna Iye ndipezenjiko?
Kumariza kwa cisoni conse.

6. Ndikampempha anditenge ati bwanji ko?
Ati Yesu "Idza msanga, idzatu."

7. Kukamtsata, kukampeza ndisaukanji?
Oyera, atumwi, ati idzani.

Amen.

title: 240 - Pakhomo
content:
240 - Pakhomo

AT THE DOOR

1. Mpulumutsi Pakhomopo! Agogoda mofatsa tu,
Walindira, alindabe, Musamcitire cipongwe.

2. Akulangiza ugule Golide yo ndi Cobvala;
Dzoza maso, muonetu, Ucotse zonyasa zako.

3. Mvera mau a umboni Ati usanke wacedwa;
Uli wonyoza, wofunda! Khala cangu usanduke.

4. Ncito yayandika kutha, Kudandaulira kutha;
Wonynsa anyansebe tu, Woyera akhalebe conco.

5. Lonyowa tsitsi ndi mame, Cifukwa akukondadi,
Dzuka! Tsegula citseko; Muuze asacedwenso.

6. Alowe wokondedwayo; Upume pamaso pace.
Mwa ciyanjano cokoma Ndzadye naye, Iye nane.

title: 241 - Dziko Labwino
content:
241 - Dziko Labwino

BEULAH LAND

1. Ndapeza dziko lokoma, Ndi zinthu zonse ndi zanga;
Zokometsetsa konseko, Usiku wandicokera.

CHORUS:
O, dzikolo, lokomalo, Pa phiri lokometsalo,
Ndipenyetsetsa ku Nyanja, Manyumba andikonzera,
Ndiyang’anitsa dzikolo, Komwe ndidzakhalitsako.

2. Ndiyenda ndi Mpulumutsi, Andikondwera m’njiramo;
Anditsogolera bwino, Kumwamba ndikafikeko.

3. Mphepo zinunkhira bwino, Za mitengo ya dzikolo,
Maluwa nao safota, Mitsinje simaumako.

4. Mphepo za kumadzulozo, Ndi nyimbo kumwambako,
Angelo onyezimira Ayimba za mphamvu zace.

title: 242 - Codala Cikondi
content:
242 - Codala Cikondi

BLEST BE THE TIE

1. Codala cikondi, Cotiyanjanitsa!
Ciyanjano ca akristu, Cifana ca mwamba.

2. Pa mpando, wa Mlungu, Wathu tipemphera;
Tisowa cinthu cimodzi, Cotisangalatsa.

3. Timathandizana, Akatundu athu;
Timalirirana tonse, M’zobvuta zathuzo.

4. Tikalekanatu, Timanva cisoni;
Tiyembekezerebetu, Kudzakomananso.

title: 243 - Dzuwa Moyowe
content:
243 - Dzuwa Moyowe

ARISE MY SOUL, ARISE

1. Dzuka moyo wanga, Cotsa mantha ako;
Nsembe ya mwaziwo, Cifukwa ca ine;
Indiimira ku mpando, Indiimira ku mpando;
Dzina langa lalembedwa.

2. Kumwamba alipo, Kundipembedzera,
Cikondi caceco, Cinakhetsa mwazi;
Anatifera tonsefe, Anatiferea tonsefe,
Awaza mpando wansisi.

3. Mabala asanu, Anapwetekapo;
Mutu "khululukani" Atitu "khululukani,"
Msalole wolapa afe!

4. Tate amamumva, Wodzozedwa wace;
Sangacotse mwana, Wofika kwa Iye,
Mzimu ubvomera mwazi, Mzimu ubvomera mwazi,
Ndabadwira mwa mulungu.

title: 244 - Idza Kwa Yesu
content:
244 - Idza Kwa Yesu

COME TO THE SAVIOUR

1. ’Dza kwa YEsu, ’dza kwa Yesu
’Dza kwa Yesu lero, lero, ’dza kwa Yesu,
’Dza kwa Yesu lero.

2. Pulumuka, pulumuka,
Pulumuka lero, lero pulumuka,
Pulumuka lero.

3. Akhozadi, akhozadi,
Akhozadi lero, lero akhozadi,
Akhozadi lero.

4. Muitane, muitane,
Muitane lero, lero muitane,
Muitane lero.

5. Alindira, alindira
Alindira lero, lero alindira,
Alindira lero.

6. Mkhulupire, mkhulupire,
Mkhulupire lero, lero mkhulupire
Mkhulupire lero.

7. Adalitsa, adalitsa,
Adalitsa iwe, iwe adalitsa,
Adalitsa iwe.

title: 245 - Palibe Dzina Lina
content:
245 - Palibe Dzina Lina

NO OTHER NAME

1. Dzina lokhalo la Yesu, Ndilo dzina lokoma;
Likondwetsa ’ngelo m’mwamba, Ndi Akhristu tonsefe.

CHORUS:
Dzina, dzina, Palibe longa la Yesu,
Dzina, dzina, Palibe longa la Yesu.

2. Dzina lokha ndi la Yesu, Pamene ndibvutika;
Dzina lokha ndi la Yesu pamene ndikondwera.

3. Ndikufuna kudzamwona, Podza mu’lemerero,
Ndidzamve Wacita bwino, Ndidzakondwererako.

4. Ngat’ afuna ngwire ntchito, M’munda wace wa mpesa,
Kuli bwino Yesu yekha, ’Dalitse ntchito zanga.

5. Ngat’afuna kuti ndife, Akhudze thupi langa,
Kukhale bwino ndi Yesu, Ndikhulupira mwa’ye.

title: 246 - Mnenere Yesu Liu
content:
246 - Mnenere Yesu Liu

JUST A WORD FOR JESUS

1. Mnenere Yesu liu; Bwenzi la pamtima,
Utiuzetu zomwe; Anakucitira.

CHORUS:
Pomunenera Yesu Zidzatithandiza;
Mau pang’ono pokha, Nenga, yimba, pempha.

2. Mnenere Yesu liu; Wakhululukidwa,
Ndi kuyesayesako, Ufike kumwamba.

3. Mnenere Yesu liu, Kukana sinditha;
Ndikonda Mpulumutsi, Wondiombolayo.

4. Mnenere Yesu liu, Usataye nthawi;
Wozemba ntchito yace, Apeza cisoni.

5. Mnenere Yesu, liu, Pocepa nkhongono;
Dzuka ukafooka, Mlekere zinazo.

title: 247 - Angelo Ayimba Kumwamba
content:
247 - Angelo Ayimba Kumwamba

SING THE BELLS OF HEAVEN

1. Mabelo kumwamba! Kuli cimwemwe,
Akatembenuka wocimwa;
Tate amucingamira kunjira,
Mwana wotopa wosocera.

CHORUS:
Angelo ayimba kumwamba;
Ulemu, ulemu m’mingoli,
Opulumukawo abvekedwa mbu,
Ayimbira molemekeza.

2. Mabelo kumwamba! Kuli cimwe
Wotayika wabvomeredwa;
Wocimwayo wabwezedwa ku chimo,
Wabadwanso ngati walero.

title: 248 - Yesu Mnzarete Apita
content:
248 - Yesu Mnzarete Apita

JESUS OF NAZARETH PASSETH BY

1. Cikhamuci cifunanji Coyenda motanganidwa. Cosankhana tsiku ntsiku? Ndiuzenji acitanji?
Khala cete ndikuuze; "Yesu Mnazarete apita"
Khalal cete ndikuuze; "Yesu Mnazarete apita.’’

2. Yesuyo ndani? Wakuti agwedeza mudzi conci?
Mlendo cabe waluntha Kugwedeza anthu conci?
Modzidzimutsa nayankha; "Yesu Mnazarete apita,"
Modzidzimutsa nayankha; "Yesu Mnazarete apita,"

3 . Yesu! Pansi natsikira Ngati munthu nayendapo;
Opsinjika nawapeza, Odwalal opundukawo,
Akhungu nakondwa kumva; "Yesu Mnazarete apita,"
Akhungu nakondwa kumva; "Yesu Mnazarete apita,"

4. Lero ayenda ponsepo Tiona mapazi ace;
Ayenda m’nchito zathuzo, Adza kwathu kudzakhala;
Mokondwa tipfuulitse: "Yesu Mnazarete apita;
Mokondwa tipfuulitse; "Yesu Mnazarete apita,"

5. Idzani olemedwanu! Mupume mpeze mudziwo
Otayika a Atate, Bwerani mulandire;
Oyesedwanu thawani; "Yesu Mnazaretu apita,"
Oyesedwanu thawani; "Yesu Mnazaretu apita."

6. Ukanabe naitana, Nunyoza cikondi cace,
Cisoni adzakusiya Maomboledwe acewo;
Udzati mayo ndacedwa "Mnazarete wandisiyadi."
Udzati mayo ndacedwa "Mnazarete wandisiyadi."

title: 249 - Nkhosa Zambiri M’Kholamo
content:
249 - Nkhosa Zambiri M’Kholamo

THERE WERE NINETY AND NINE

1. Nkhosa zace zambiri m’kholamo
Anasunga mbusayo
Anasunga mbusayo
Imodzi inasocerera,
Yotaika ku thengo.
Kutari ku phiri loopsya
Kutari ndi mbusa waceyo
Kutari ndi mbusa waceyo.

2. Mbuye, muli zambiri m’kholamu
Kodi sizikwanira?
Nayankha mbusa, ndi yangayo
Imene yataika.
Ngakhale njoopsya njirayo,
Ndilinga ku phiri kupeza.
Ndilinga ku phiri kupeza.

3. Koma opulumuka sadziwa
M’khwawa mbusa napyola,
Ndi mdima wo’psya usikuwo
Polonda nkhosayo.
Anamva kulira kutari
Mapeza yofo’ka, ikufa.
Mapeza yofo’ka, ikufa.

4. Mbusa, ndiona mwazi m’njirayi;
Ndi cifukwa ciani ko?
Ndinaukhetsa potsata’we,
Kubwenza ku kholako.
Ndi m’manja mwalaswa bwanjimo?
Ndalaswa pofunafuna’we.
Ndalaswa pofunafuna’ we.

5. Ndipo ponse pa phiri ndi m’dambo,
Ndi m’makwawa ponsepo
Namveka liu lopfuula,
Kondwerani ndapezayo.
Angelo a Mlungu nayankha.
Ambuye napeza nkhosayo.
Ambuye napeza nkhosayo.

title: 250 - Chimo Musalole
content:
250 - Chimo Musalole

YIELD NOT TO TEMPTATION

1. Chimo musalole, Limacimwitsa,
Gonjetso limodzi Libweza wina;
Pitani m’tsogolo, Zoipa leka,
Yang’ana kwa Yesu, Adzakusunga.

CHORUS:
Funsa Mbuye thandizo
Aszakusunga iwe;
Ali wolola Iye;
Adzasunga iwe.

 2. Thawani oipa, Ndi otukwana,
Lemekeza Mlungu, Osamamnyoza;
Khala waulemu, Ndi wacifuno,
Yang’ana kwa Yesu, Adzakusunga.

3. Kwa wolakikayo, Korona ’patsa,
Mwa cigonjetsoco, Kwa opirira;
Mpulumutsi wathu, Adzalimbitsa,
Yang’ana kwa Yesu, Adzakusunga.

title: 251 - Kulira Sikanthu
content:
251 - Kulira Sikanthu

WEEPING WILL NOT SAVE US

1. Kulira sikanthu  Ngakhale nkhope igwe,
Singaletse matsoka, Singatsuke machismo 
Kulira sikanthu.

CHORUS:
Yesu nafa pa mtanda, Yesu nandiferatu,
Yesu andilindira Kundi pulumutsa.

2. Nchitonso sikanthu  Ngakhale ikometse
Maganizo oyera, Sangandikonzetsenso 
Nchitonso sikanthu.

3. Kudikira sikanthu  Ndigona wotayika
Ndimva kuitanantu; Kudika ndifa cabe 
Kudika sikanthu.

4. Yesu Mpulumutsi Amene nandifera,
Ndikhulupira Inu, Mundipulumutsenso 
Mundipulumutsa.

title: 252 - Wocimwa Iwe, Bwera
content:
252 - Wocimwa Iwe, Bwera

COME EVERY SOUL BY SIN OPPRESSED

1. Wocimwa iwe, bweratu, Kwa Yesu, Mbuyeyo;
Atero Iye, pumatu, Umvere mauwo.

CHORUS:
Khulupira mau ace onse a Mbuyathuyo,
Uli nawo pakumvera, Inde, moyowo.

2. Ambuye Yesu anatsira Mwazi wace pyu,
Timira m’mwazi womwewo, iyerayera mbu.

3. Wa moyo ndiye Yesudi, Zoona zacezo,
Akhalal iye njiratu yofika mmwambamo.

4. Tiyeni tonse, tinkeko, Ulendo wathuwo,
Ku dziko lace mmambamo, ’Dzakhale nayeko.

title: 253 - Mbusa wa Israyeli
content:
253 - Mbusa wa Israyeli

HE CALLS HIS LAMBS
1. Mbusa wa a Israyeli, Wocititsa cidwi;
Imva aitana nkhosa Adzatifukate!

2. Akaitana zimadza, Satonza maina;
Amazidalitsa zonse, Mwinu wa angelo.

3. Tibwera nazo kwa Inu, Tikupatsirani,
Ife tiri anu omwe, Ana’thu ndi anu.

title: 254 - Dzina La Yehova
content:
254 - Dzina La Yehova

PRAISE YE JOHAVAH’S NAME

1. Dzina la Yehova, Liyamikidwetu, tilopa;
Kumwamba-mwambako, Cikondi coposa,
Konseko kumveka Mphamvu yace.

2. Lipenga limveke Lacigonjetsoco, konse konse;
Mngoli ukhalepo; Alimba abwino;
Amveke ponsepo, omtamanda.

3. Poyimba mokweza, Kungani zingwezo, zotengana!
Atipatsa mpweya; Mpweya wodzazatu,
Ufulu wacewo, Tiyamike.

title: 255 - Ndikusowani Yesu
content:
255 - Ndikusowani Yesu

I NEED THEE PRECIOUS JESUS

1. Ndikusowani Yesu, Ndiri waumphawi;
Mlendo wopanda malo, Za dziko ndilibe.
A Yesu Mudnikonde, Mundicingamire,
Ndikunditsogolera, Mphamvu yanga ndinu.

2. Ndisowa Mtima wanu, Kudziwa nkhawazo,
Ndi mayesero anga, Ndi zacisonizo.
Nsowa Mzimu Woyera, Womandiphunzitsa,
Kundiuzane Yesu, Ndi Mwana wa nkhosa.

3. Ndikusowani Yesu, Ndionane nanu,
Mu uta-wa-lezamo, Pa cimpando canu.
Ndi ogulidwa m’mazi, Ndikakondwerere
Nyimbo zosadukiza, Ndikumpenyetsetsa.

Amen.

title: 256 - Mulungu Munathangata
content:
256 - Mulungu Munathangata

OUR HELP IN ACES PAST

1. Mulungu munathangata, Mudzathangathabe;
Woticinjiriza mz’opsa, Kwanu mutifitse!

2. Mwa mthunzi wa mpando wanu, Ndimo tibisala
Dzanja lanu liposadi, Tiri mosunguka.

3. Dziko linakhazikidwa Mapiri naima,
Mulungu wosamariza, Zako zosathera

4. Zaka ngati usiku, M’mawa kusanace.

title: 257 - Olimba Ngati Thanthwe
content:
257 - Olimba Ngati Thanthwe

FIRM AS A ROCK

1. Mapiri sagwedezeka, Ifenso comweco;
Olimba gwa ngati thanthwe; Ace a Yehova.

2. Phiri ndi khoma kulibe, Lofanana naye;
Langwiro mwa ilo lokha, Akunja sangalione.

3. Khulukirani anu, kwa zolakwa zao zonse,
Mutithandize kusunga Malamulowo angwiro.

title: 258 - Chikhulupiriro Cimodzi Ca Moyo
content:
258 - Chikhulupiriro Cimodzi Ca Moyo

ONE LIVING FAITH

1. Lamulo la Mulunguli, Sicinthu copanda pace;
Ndi lokhalitsa myayadi, Simau cabe, ndi moyo.

2. Lamulo lanu loyera, Mutikhulukirefe,
Langwiro mwa ilo lokha, Akunja sangalione.

3. Khululukirani anu, Kwa zolakwa zao zonse,
Mithithandize kusunga Malamulowo angwiro.

title: 259 - Tidzakomana Kodi?
content:
259 - Tidzakomana Kodi?

SHALL WE MEET?

1. Tidzakomana patsidya, Mafunde akadzatha?
Kowala kosalekeza, Kulibe cisoninso?

CHORUS:
Tidzakomanako? Tidzakomane patsidya?
Tikakomane patsidya, Mabvuto akadzatha?

2. Tikakomana padoko, Akadzatha mabvuto?
Tidzaiponya nangula Pagombe lokomalo?

3. Tikakomana m’mudzimo; Nyumba zonyezimira,
Makomanso nga yasipi, omangidwa ndi Mbuye?

4. Tikakomana ndi Yesu Potenga anthu ace;
Ubwino tidzaudziwa Ntakhala mu mpando’ce.

title: 260 - Dambo La Byula
content:
260 - Dambo La Byula

VALE OF BEULAH

1. Ndipitira kunsi kwa dambo la cipululu,
Liri dambo lokongola lochedwa la Byula
Koma ndapezanso monse momera maluwa,
Mpulumutsi mwini wace ayenda ndi ine.

2. Palibe mthunzi wotsiriza panjira panga,
Kuunika kwa ulemerero kuwalitsa;
Am’mwamba andiyimbira nyimbo zokongola,
Apokolezana bwino kundicingamira.

3. Ndiri kunka ndi nsangala ku mzinda wowala,
Nsangalazo ziwalitsa njira tsiku ntsiku;
Ndasendeza zipata za mzinda wakuwala
Khwalalalo lindifitsa mzinda wa cikondi.

title: 261 - Dambo Lokongola La Edene
content:
261 - Dambo Lokongola La Edene

BEAUTIFUL VALLEY OF EDEN

1. Dambo labwino Edene, Muli bata msana;
Mitima ya otopabe Ipuma nicira.

CHORUS:
Dambo labwino Edene, Kwao kwa odala,
Ndazunzikadi ndi mabvuto, Ndidzatu ndidzapume.

2. Mtima wosowa woliraa, Ndzapeza mwayi,
Nuimba nyimbo nda’ngelo, Akutaritari.

3. Ali kwao Mpulumutsi; Ndi oomboledwa
Dziko la ulemerero, Imvani nyimboyo.

title: 262 - Kristuu Kapena Barab
content:
262 - Kristuu Kapena Baraba

CHRIST OR BARABAS

1. Nditani naye Yesu? Waima panoyu
Wabvala cinyong’onyo, Ndi minga pamutu.

CHORUS:
Tsopano ndifunse, Muyankha cotani?
Ndimpacike Mfumu Yesu, Atsale Baraba?

2. Ndimasule mbalayi, Cimunthu ca dama?
Wocimwa, ngosacimwa? Mukanapo yani?

3. Funsotu loopsali! Litengeni bwino,
Nsisi zilindirabe, Koma mwa mabvuto.

4. Mpando waciweruzo sungakane dziko?
Anapfuula "Cotsa, Mumpacike Yesu!"

5. Si kwa ocimwa okha Funso linenetse;
Mvani Akristu nomwe, Ora loyesedwa

title: 263 - Mvani Mau A Ambuye
content:
263 - Mvani Mau A Ambuye

HEAR THE WORDS OF SCRIPTURE

1. ’Mvani mau a Ambuye wathuyo
Mudze nazo zacikhumi m’nkhokwe,
Perekani ndi mitima yanuyo,
Mulandire madalitso.

CHORUS:
Mudze nazo zacikhumi m’nkhokwe,
Mndidyese ’ne, eti Mbuyeyo.
Ndizakupatsa madalitso,
Ndipo mudzasowa nawotu malo.

2. Mukufuna kodi mphamvu yaceyo?
Mudze nazo zacikhuumi m’nkhokwe
’Dzanitu cifupi ndi Ambuyeyo,
Polandira madalitso.

3. Muli nako kanthu ndi Ambuye ko?
Mudze nazo zacikhumi m’nkhokwe,
Mudze nazo monga mwa lonjezo ’ce,
Ndipo mudzadalitsidwa.

4. Yamikani Mbuye pompemphera ’Ye,
Podza nazo zacikhumi m’nkhokwe,
Khulupirirani mau acewo,
Ndi kumuthokoza Iye.

5. Yimbirani ndi cimwemwe nyimbozo,
Mutabwera nazo zacikhumi,
Tipfuule mokondwera tonsefe,
Ka’mba tinadalitsidwa.

title: 264 - Paciyambi Mlunguyo
content:
264 - Paciyambi Mlunguyo

HOLY DAY, JEHOVAH’S REST

1. Paciyambi Mulunguyo Analenga dzikoli,
Tsono ’napumuladi Lacisanu nciwiri.

CHORUS:
Tikondwera, tikondwera
Tikondwera podza pa Tsiku la Sabatalo.

2. Mlungu ’napatulanso Tsiku lakupumalo.
’Nalipatsa kwa ife Ndi Sabata lacelo.

3. Anthu ace kalelo Anasunga tsikulo,
Ndi pobwera Yesuyo Iye anasunganso.

4. Osanthula m’bukumo, Akuona kutitu
Mlungu sanasinthei, Tsiku ndace lomweli.

5. Ndipo ati m’bukumo Podzabwera Yesuyo
Anthu adzasungabe Tsiku la Sabatalo.

title: 265 - Mtenderewo
content:
265 - Mtenderewo

PEACE, PERFECT PEACE

1. Mtenderewo, m’dziko la mdimali;
Mwazi wa Yesu unong’oneza.

2. Mtenderewo, m’ntchito zocuruka;
Ntchito ya Yesu ndiko kupuma.

3. Mtenderewo, m’bvuto lotizinga;
Mtendere uli mwa Yesu yekha.

4. Mtenderewo, anga ali m’tari
Yesu asunga ine ndi iwo.

5. Mtenderewo, uli m’tsogolomo;
Tidziwa Yesu ali pa mpando.

title: 266 - tNdidzakutsatani
content:
266 - tNdidzakutsatani

I WILL FOLLOW THEE

1. Yesu nditsata Inu, Ndamva mundiitana;
Nkonda Inu, ndidzadi, Munditsogolere.

CHORUS:
Ndikutsatani, ndikutsatani,
Ndikutsatani komwe muntsogoza.

2. Timaso tiphophonya, Mapazi asocera;
Ndifooka mwinamo, Mundilimbikitsa.

3. Zisoni zindipinga, Ndipusa ndi zoipa,
Ndidzalimbikitsidwa, Potsatira Inu.

title: 267 - Fesa Mbeuu Za Cikondi
content:
267 - Fesa Mbeuu Za Cikondi

SCATTER SEEDS OF KINDNESS

1. Tisonkhanitse zabwino, M’njira mwathu monsemo;
Tisunge tirigu yekha, Titaye zacabezo;
Tipeze zokondweretsa M’madalitso a lero,
Mwa cipiriro ticotse Minga yokhumudwitsa.

CHORUS:
Ufese zacifundo, Ufese zacifundo
Ufese zacifundo, Zomwe tidzakolola

2. Sitisamala maluwa Ndi mbalame poyimba,
Mpaka mbalame ndiponso maluwa zitacoka;
Dzuwa sitisamala Pa nthawi ya cilimwe,
Akafikanso mazizi Nthaawiyo tilifuna.

3. Mwana akacita ngozi Poswa cikho comwera
Kodi mukalipa ko’psa Poturutsa tsinyalo?
Mukudziwa kuti mawa Adzakhala wakufa,
Kodi pakukwiya naye Mupsa Mtima leroli?

4. Poganizira za m’mbuyo Za zomwe tinacita,
Za mauwo okalipa Okhumutsidwa ena,
Ndi nchito zosaganiza; Izi zitikumbutsa
Kufetsatu zacifundo zomwe tidzakolola.

title: 268 - Bata Ndu!
content:
268 - Bata Ndu!

PEACE STILL

1. Mbuye, Nyanja yakalipa, Mafunde akweretsa!
Mlengalenga nawonso wada; Kodi tifere m’madzi;
Kodi simukusamala, Mugoneranjiko?
Pamene ife tiri ndi mantha, Kodi tifere m’madzi?

CHORUS:
Namondweyo andimvera Ine, bata ndu! (Bata ndu!)
Ngakhale Nyanja zikalipe,
Ziwanda, anthu, ngakhale zinazo,
Madzi sangamize bwato Mwini
Nyanja ndi mtunda ali momwemo;
Zonse zingondimvera Ine; Batu ndu, bata ndu!
Zonse zingondimvera Ine; Batadi ndu!

2. Mbuye bvuto mu mtimamu Landibvuta leroli;
Kucirimika konse kwatha; Ndipulumutsenitu
Nkhwenkhwe ya chimo yozunza, Inditsirizitsa;
Ndamuka ine, ndamuka, Mbuye! Dzandipulumutseni.

3. Mbuye zobvutazo zatha, Kwagwa bata tsopano,
Kwawalal ngati kalirole, Ngati ndiri Kumwamba;
Msandisiyenso Ambuye, Tikhale Pamodzi;
Ndikafike ku gombe lodala, Mukandipumulitse.

title: 269 - Mpulumutsi Wozizwitsa ndi Yesu
content:
269 - Mpulumutsi Wozizwitsa ndi Yesu

A WONDERFUL SAVIOUR IS JESUS
1. Mpulumutsi wozizwitsa ndi Yesu,
Mpulumutsi wozizwitsa,
Andibisira moyo wanga m’thanthwe,
Ndiona zokondweretsa.

CHORUS:
Andibisira moyo wanga m’thanthwe,
Abisira moyo wanga louma;
Abisira aphimba dziko louma;
Moyo wanga aika pobisika,
An’phimba ndi dzanja lace.
An’phimba ndi dzanja lace.

2. Mpulumutsi wozizwitsa ndi Yesu
Anditulira Katundu,
Andicirikiza sindidzasowa,
Wondipatsa mphamvu ndiye.

3. Apatsa madalitso ocuruka,
An’dzanso umulungu,
Ndiyimba mokondwa ndilemekeza
Mpulumutsi ndi wangadi.

4. Ndikabvekedwa zowala ndiyera,
Kukomana naye m’mwamba,
Ndapulumukadi, m’cikondi cace
N’dzafuula ndi anzanga.

title: 270 - Nkhoswe Yathu
content:
270 - Nkhoswe Yathu

THE COMFORTER WITH US

1. Mpulumutsi potsazika, Ndi mau okonda,
Msangalatsi, adzakhala Nkhoswe yathu.

2. Anadza kudzatikonza, Wansisi, wolola
Kupeza mmodzi wodekha Apumemo.
3. Timva mau’ce odekha Ocokera m’mwamba,
Otsutsa chimo odekha aitana

4. Ukoma wonse ndi wace, Cigonjetso conce,
Ganizo laciyeronso, Zonse nzace.

5. Mzimu wanu waciyero, Mtimvere nsisitu;
Mukhale m’mtima mwathu, Ana ace.

title: 271 - Nkana Chimo Nlalikuru
content:
271 - Nkana Chimo Nlalikuru

THO’ YOUR SINS BE AS SCARLET

1. Nkana chimo nlikuru, lingakanganulidwe;
Nkana chino nlikuru, lingakanganulidwe;
Nkana chimo ngori’ra, ayeretsedwa;
Nkana chimo nlikuru, Nkana chimo nlikuru,
Lingakanganulidwe; Lingakanganulidwe.

2. Imva liu lipempha, "Bweranso kwa Mlunguyo;"
Imva liu lipempha, "Bweranso kwa Mlunguyo."
Ali ndi nsisi zambiri, ndi cikondico.
Imva liu lipempha, Imva liu lipempha,
"Bweranso kwa Mlunguyo: Bweranso kwa Mlunguyo."

3. Akukhululukira, sadzakumbukiranso;
Akukhululukira, sadzakumbukiranso;
"Ndiyang’aneni anthuni," ati Mbuyeyo
Akukhululukira, Akukhulukira,
Sadzakumbukiranso, Sadzakumbukiranso.

title: 272 - Ponya Cingwe Ca Moyo
content:
272 - Ponya Cingwe Ca Moyo

THROW OUT THE LIFE-LINE

1. Pabvuta pa Nyanja, ponya cingwe,
Pali mbale apulumutsidwe;
Mbale wa mnzathu, ndani angathe
Kuponya cingweco, kumpulumutsa.

CHORUS:
Ponya cingweco! Cingwe ca moyo!
Alikunka ndi madzi!
Ponya cingweco! Cingwe ca moyo!
Wina amira lero.

2. Ponya cingweco mofulumira;
Ucedweranji ndi kujejema?
Ana amira, fulumiratu,
Ukampumulutse msanga, msangatu.

3. Ponya anthuwo azunzikatu,
Atatha koopsa sungafike;
Mphepo zabvuto ndi za matsoka.
Msanga ziwatsitsa kwakuya kwa bi.

4. Nyengo yowapulumutsa itha,
Atifera posacedwea pano;
Kangaza mbale usacedwetse,
Ingoponya cingwe apulumuke.

title: 273 - Tsamira Pa Manja A Yesu
content:
273 - Tsamira Pa Manja A Yesu

LEAN ON HIS ARMS

1. Tsamira pa manja a Yesu, Akuthangate athagata;
Ukamkhulupira ndithu, Adzakusangalatsa.

CHORUS (Sop. & Tenor):
Tsamiratu m’cikondi cace; Tsamiratu, yesa cifundo;
Tsamiratu, yang’ana m’Mwamba, Tsamira Mpulumutsi.

(Bass & Alto):
Tsamiratu Iye, m’cikondi cace, Tsamira Iye, yesa cifuno;
Tsamiratu Iyel, yang’ana m’Mwamba, Tsamira Mpulumutsi.

2. Tsamira pa manja a Yesu, ’Dzauza njira adzauza;
Ingotsala mokondwera, pomvera mau ace.

3. Tsamira pa manja a Yesu, ’Dzakusamala, kusamala!
Katundu wolemeretsa Mpereke kwa Ambuye.

4. Tsamira pa manja a Yesu, Msiyire zonse, zonsezodi!
Mtima wace ngwacikondi, Maso ace sasinza.

title: 274 - Ndiri Ndi Mbuye
content:
274 - Ndiri Ndi Mbuye

I HAVE A SAVIOUR

1. Ndiri ndi Mbuye wodandaulira,
Akonda Iyeyu kuposa dziko;
Pano andiyang’anira mwacifundo,
Ndifunatu akhale wa inunso!

CHORUS:
Ndipempherera’nu, Ndipempherera’nu,
Ndipempherera’nu, Ndipempherera’nu,

2. Ndiri ndi Tate andipatsa ine
Ciyembekezo ca moyo wosatha;
Sacedwa kuitana tipite kwathu;
Ndifuna adzalandire inunso!

3. Ndiri n’zobvala, zopanda mabanga
Aindilindira mu ulemelero;
Wowalal monsemo konko ndizalandira,
Bwenzi ndifuna ukalandirenso!

4. Pamene Yesu wakupeza iwe,
Tauzatu ena za mtendererewo
Mwini ndiye Kristu yemweyo apatsa,
Mtendere ndifuna mulandirenso!

title: 275 - Kosatha! N’kuti?
content:
275 - Kosatha! N’kuti?

ETERNITY - WHERE

1. "Kosatha! - n’kuyi?" Ndilo funsolo;
Konse komwe uli liri komweko!
Udzakhala kuti nthawi zosatha!
Udzakhala kuti nthawi zosatha!

2. "Kosatha! N’kuti?" Kosatha n’kuti?
Ndi oomboledwa? Ndi otaika?
Mbali izi njiti - "Kosatha! N’kuti?"
Mbali izi njiti - "Kosatha! N’kuti?"

3. "Kosatha! N’kuti?" Uchitiranji
Zokondwa za dziko mosaganiza?
Popanda kusankha - "Kosatha! N’kuti?"
Popanda kusankha - "Kosatha n’kuti?

4. "Kosatha! N’kuti?" Bwenzi samala;
Adzaweruzatu Mulungu msanga
Lero linganene - "kosatha! N’kuti?"
Lero linganene - "Kosatha! N’kuti?

5. "Kosatha! N’kuti?" Kosatha! N’kuti?"
Bwenzi usagone, lekana m’dziko,
Mpaka utayankha - "Kosatha! N’kuti?"
Mpaka utayankha - "Kosatha! N ’kuti.

title: 276 - M’khola Mwa Ng’ombe
content:
276 - M’khola Mwa Ng’ombe

JESUS, MY SAVIOUR, TO BETHELEHEM CAME

1. M’kola mwa ng’ombe mu Betlemumo, anabadwa ambuyangawo
Etu, ndidziwa, natsikirako, Kufuna inetu
Afuna inetu, afuna inetu.
Etu, ndizizwa, natsikirako, Afuna inetu.

2. Popacikidwa pa Kalvarepo, Yesu anandiombolerako,
Inde, ndidziwa, nakondaneko, Nafera inetu.
Nafera inetu, Nafera inetu.
Inde ndizizwa nakondaneko, Nafera inetu.

3. Mbusa wokoma ndi Mbuyangayo, Nandiitana posocerapo,
Konse koipa nalondaneko, Kubweza inetu
Abweza inetu, abweza inetu
Konse koipa nalondaneko, Abwenza inetu.

4. Uko kumwamba, Mbuyangayo, Nandikonzera mokhaliramo,
Tsiku linalo adzabweranso, Kutenga inetu
Atenga inetu, atenga inetu.
Tsiku linalo adzabweranso, Kutenga inetu.

title: 277 - Tsogolere Muuni
content:
277 - Tsogolere Muuni

LEAD KINDLY LIGHT

1. Tsogolere muuni mu mdima, Tsogolere;
Kwada ndiri kutari ndi kwathu; Tsogolere
Sindipempha kuona za m’tari,
Phazi langa limodzi likwana

2. Sindinali wotere wokhoza kupemphera;
Ndisankha njira’nga; Tsogolere;
Ndinakonda zinthu zacibwana, Tsogolere;
Ndinanyada, musazikumbuke

3. Mphamvu yanu yandidalitsadi; Intsogoza
Mu malo monse moipa mpaka mdima watha;
M’mawa ’ngelo andisekerera;
Amenewo ndawakonda kale.

title: 278 - Sinjira Yanga
content:
278 - Sinjira Yanga

NOT MY WAY

1. Sinjira yanga bi, Ngakhale ide bi;
Tsogolerenitu, Mndisankhire njira,
Ndisasankhe ndekha; Msandilekerere;
Sankhireni Mbuye, Ndiyendemo bwino.

2. Ufumu ndifuna wanu, M’patse njira
Yofitsa ku moyo Yolunjika kwanu
Mndisungire cikho codzaza ndi moyo,
Sankhireni abwenzi, Cuma pena tsoka

3. Sankhireni abwenzi, Nthenda pena thanzi;
Musankhire ine condiyeneraco;
Ndisandzisankhire cokula  cocepa
Tsogolerenitu, Mndikwanire Mbuye

title: 279 - Idzani Kuno Kwa Ine
content:
279 - Idzani Kuno Kwa Ine

"COME UNTO ME"

1. Ha! Mtima wacisoni maso osaona,
Mungathebe kukondwera mwa Yesu, Mbuyathu

CHORUS:
Idzani kwa Ine nonsenu
Inu akutodwa ndipo mudzapume
Senza goli langa, phunzira
Ndiri wofatsa mumtimamo,
Mudzapumula m’myoyo yanu

Bass, Tenor & Alto
’Dzanitu, ’dzani kuno ’dzanitu, nonsenu otodwa

Alto
Inu akutodwa ndipo mudzapume.

Bass & Tenor
’Dzanitu akutodwanu, mudzapumula.

Alto, Tenor & Bass
’Dzanitu, senza gori, ’Dzanitu, phunziratu,

Tenor & Bass
Ndi wofatsa mtimamo, Mudzapumula m’moyo wanu.

2. Cimwemwe ca m’dzikoli sicikwanitsa’fe,
Cikondi cikondwetsa, cikondi ca Yesu.

3. Cisomo copambana ca Yesu Kristuyo
Cidzakhululukira olapa onsewo

4. Mtendere ngati mtsinje, cikondi ndi nyimbo
Ndi gori lakufewa tipeza mwa Yesu.

title: 280 - Mfumu Yathu
content:
280 - Mfumu Yathu

OUR KING

1. Nyimbo zathu zokoma, Tadza nazo lero,
Kudzayamika Mbuye, Njira ndi moyowo

CHORUS:
Tiyimbatu kutamanda Mfumu (Mfumu)
Tiyimbatu Ulemu kwa Mfumu.

2. Anakonda tiana pokhala pansiopo,
Ngakhale ali m’mwamba amatikondabe.

3. TIkonda kumyimbira, Ndi kumva za Iye
Pamene anakhala pa dziko kalelo

4. Mpulumutsi wodala, Tikugwadirani,
Kuti mutithandize kukhulupiranu.

title: 281 - Nyenyezi Yabwino
content:
281 - Nyenyezi Yabwino

A BEAUTIFUL STAR

1. Nyenyezi yabwino yowala ndi ulemerero wa m’mwamba
Kuwala kwace kotsogoza anzeru napeza mwana

CHORUS:
Yowalayo, yowalayo, Nyenyezi yabwino m’phiri,
Yowalayo, yowalayo, Cipulumutso ca Mlungu.

2. Mau anawadziwitsadi nthawi yafika ya nyenyezi,
Anaitsata yowalayo  Ndi "Kristu nthanda ya m’mawa"

3. Nafe titsate monga iwo, Muni wa dziko wonenedwa’
Titsate monga iwo, Muni wa dziko wonenedwa;
Titsate mpaka tikafike, Ku Mpumula wa kumwamba.

title: 282 - Mingoli Zikwi Khumi
content:
282 - Mingoli Zikwi Khumi

TEN THOUSAND HARPS

1. Ha! Mingoli ndi maunso Alemekeza m’mwamba;
Yesu m’mwambamo akondwa; Alamula ponsepo;
Ali pa mpando uko; Yesu alamulira
Aliluya! Aliluya! Aliluya! Amen

2. Krona wanu sabvulidwa, Mfumu yolemerera;
Cikondi canu cosatha, Kwa anthu onse;
Anthu anu okondwa Adzaona nkhopeyo
Aliluya! Aliluya! Aliluya! Amen.

3. Ambuye idzani msanga tsikulo tilisowa
Kudzamvetsera tsikulo, m’mwamba ndi dziko zatha’
Tidzaliza mingoli Ulemu kwa Mfumuyo.
Aliluya! Aliluya! Aliluya! Amen.

title: 283 - Kodi Ndiwe? Kodi Ndine?
content:
283 - Kodi Ndiwe? Kodi Ndine?

SHALL YOU? SHALL I?

1. Wina adzalowa pakhomo, Msanga posacedwa,
Adzadya za ulemelero, Kodi Ndiwe? Kodi ndine?
Podzakondwerera kosatha; Kodi ndiwe? Kodi Ndine?
Wina adzayenda m’miseu, Nadzakhalandi masomphenya.

2. Wina adzatula katundu, Msanga Posacedwa
Nadzalandiratu korona, Kodi ndiwe? Kondi ndine?
Wina adzaonatu Mfumu, Atamasuka ku zadziko,
Nadzakondwa naye k osatha; Kodi ndiwe? Kodi ndine?

3. Wina ’dzagogoda citseko, Msanga Posacedwa
Nadzamvatu, Sindikudziwa, Kodi Ndiwe? Kodi ndine?
Poitana sadzamu yankha, Citseko citatsekedwatu,
Ndipo sadzalandira mphotho; Kodi ndiwe? Kodi ndine?

4. Wina adzaimbatu nyimbo, Msanga posacedwa
Pamodzi ndi owomboledwa, Kodi ndiwe, kodi ndine?
Wina adzakakondwerera, Ndi okondedwa pa dookolo,
Ataomboledwa kosatha; kodi ndiwe? Kodi ndine?

title: 284 - Popita Masikuwa
content:
284 - Popita Masikuwa

WHILE THE DAYS ARE GOING BY

1. Kuli anthu obvutika, Popita masikuwa,
Kuli anthu akutopa, Popita masikuwa;
Ngati tiwakondwetsa, Poyenda ulendowu
Zabwino ticitetu, Popita masikuwa.

CHORUS:
Masiku apita, Masiku apita,
Zabwino ticitetu! Popita masikuwa.

2. Kulibe nthawi yotaya, Popita masikuwa;
Mukhale osangalala, Popita masikuwa;
Dziko liri m’cisoni, Misozi ndi maliro;
Thandiza obvutika, Popita masikuwa.

3. Zotimanga tizisiya, Popita masikuwa;
Modzi ndi mmodzi atsala, Popita masikuwa
Zabwino tidzakhala, ponse ponse zimera;
Tidzakhala okondwa, Popita masikuwa.

title: 285 - Alipo Malo Opuma
content:
285 - Alipo Malo Opuma

NEAR TO THE HEART OF GOD

1. Alipo malo opuma, Mfupi ndi Mulungu,
Kumene tchimo kulibe, Mfupi ndi Mulungu.

CHORUS:
O! Yesu Mpulumutsi, Mtima wa Mulungu,
Tisungeni pompano, Mfupi ndi Mulungu.

2. Alipo malo okoma, Mfupi ndi Mulungu,
Pakukomana ndi Mbuye Mfupi ndi Mulungu.

3. Alipo malo okwana, Mfupi ndi Mulungu;

title: 286 - Nditengeni
content:
286 - Nditengeni

1. Ndifuna kuona nthawi Yonkha ku Ziyoni,Komwe tidzakhala bwino, Ku mudzi wa Yesu.

CHORUS:
Nditengeni tengeni, Ku Ziyoni
Ku mudzi wachikondiwo. Ku mudzi wa Yesu.

2. Ndidzamva Aliluyayo Kwa khamu likuru;
Ndikayimba nao nyimbo, Ya oomboledwa.

Ndi mpando wa mfumu yanga Yemwe ’natilenga.
4. Ndifuna ku Yerusalemu, Ku mudzi wa Mfumu,
Ndifuna n’kadye zipatso Zotipatsa moyo.

title: 287 - M’Mayesoro Anga
content:
287 - M’Mayesoro Anga

IN THE HOUR OF TRIAL

1. M’mayesero anga, Tate mndisunge;
Ndisakukaneni, Kukusiyani,
Pondenguma ine, Kumbukireni,
Nsalekene nanu, Musanditaye.

2. Za dziko nzacabe, Ndisatengeke

Kusunga kwani sisi, Ndikubvomera

3. Matsoka si anu, Zolabadira;
Zowawa zikadza Kusokonzeza;
Zikumphanitu Ndisacimwe bi;
Nkhawa zanga zonse, Ndikupatsani.

title: 288 - Anadzatu Kwa Yesu
content:
288 - Anadzatu Kwa Yesu

THEY BROUGHT THEIR GIFTS TO JESUS

1. Anadzatu kwa Yesu ndi mphatso zaozo,
Ndi Mtima wa cikondi Natula zonsezo
Zokoma Mtima ntchito Zothandizanatu,
Ndi zopereka zao Ndizo za mtengotu.

CHORUS:
Tulani mphatso zanu kwa Yesu Mbuyeyo
Pereka Mtima wanu Pa guwa lacelo.

2. Pakati pa opatsa Naima mlendoyo

3. Nalira, Mbuye wanga, Wokoma Mtima ’Nu,
Tengani Mtima wanga Wodzadza chimolo
Ambuye namuyankha Usati yachepa;
Yakoyo, mwana wanga Yaposa zonsezo.

title: 289 - Mundilandiretu
content:
289 - Mundilandiretu

TAKE ME AS I AM

1. Kwa Inu YEsu ndilira; Wopanda Inu ndidzafa;
Mundipulumutse Mbuye Mundilandiretu.

CHORUS:
Mundilandire, mundilandire
Mundipulumutse Mbuye, mundilandiretu.

2. Ndine wocimwa kwambiri, Koma munafera ine;

3. Sinditha kudzikonzatu, Ndingodzipereka ndekha;

4. Ndigwadira nsisi zanu, Ndioneni Ambuyanga;
Yayambidwa ntchito yanu Mundilandiretu.

title: 290 - TIkondwera Pakugwira Ntchito
content:
290 - TIkondwera Pakugwira Ntchito

GLADLY, GLADLY, TOILING FOR THE MASTER

1. Tikondwera pakugwira ntchito ya Ambuye mofunitsatu

CHORUS:
Pogwira nchito, Timakondatu, timakondwatu
Pogwira ntchito, m’munda wa Ambuyeyo.

(Tenor and Bass):
Pakugwira ntchito yace, timakondwatu, E, timakondwatu,
Pakugwira ntchito yace m’munda wa Ambuyeyo

3. Pomtsatira Mbuye wathu Yesu, Pakuyenda naye m’njiramo,
Tidzatsogolera otaika, kuti anke kwa Ambuyeyo.

title: 291 - Ayenera Yesuyo
content:
291 - Ayenera Yesuyo

WORTHY IS THE LAME

1. Ayenera Yesuyo, Ayenera Yesuyo,
Ayenera Yesuyo, Wophedwa.

CHORUS:
Yimba Aliluya! Tama aliluya!
’Lenu aliluya! Wophedwa!

3. Timve conco m’mtimamu, Kumyamika, kumkonda,

content:
292 - Timanja Tiwiri

TWO LITTLE HANDS

1. Timanja tigwire ntchito yace, Lilime limlemekeze,

CHORUS:
Tidzatu, Ambuye, Tidzatu tikali ana,

 2. Timapazi tiyende m’njirayo, Yopita nayo kumwamba;

3. Kamtima ndipereke kwa Yesu, Apulumutse moyowu
Kuti ndigwire ntchitoyace, Ndikhaletu wace konse.

title: 293 - Agogoda Ndaniyo
content:
293 - Agogoda Ndaniyo

KNOCKING, KNOCKING

Alindira, Abwino!
Ndiye mlendo wacifundo,
Wina palibe mnzace,
Ine ndiri wozizwadi
Nditsegulire khomo;
Nditsegulire khomo.

2. Agogoda pompobe
Alindira, Abwino!
Citseko cilimbiranji
Zitsotso zomelera
Zomatirira zakuda,
Zomamatira zonse,
Zomamatira zonse,

3. Agogoda catani?
Alindira Abwino;
Indetu agogodabe
Ndi cisoti ca minga
Mpulumutsi alindabe,
Kodi sungamlowetse;
Kodi sungamlowetse?

title: 294 - Yang’ana Yesu
content:
294 - Yang’ana Yesu

COVER WITH HIS LIFE

1. Yang’ana Yesu wosacimwa; Tate wampatsa moyo wace,
Moyo wa imfa, ndi wa tsoka, Wandibveka ndi moyo wace,

CHORUS:
Moyo wacewu, Woyeretsa; Ine ndadziwa moyo wace;
Moyo wa tsoka ndi wa imfa Moyo wangwiro ndabvekedwa

2. Zocimwa zanga zinampweteka, Chimo nloopsa lofiira,

3. Ndilakalaka akhululuke Yesu ambveke zoyera;
Ndatembenuka zanga ntaya, Ndalandiridwa mokondwera.

4. Ndayanjanadi ndi Mulungu, Ndayesedwatu wolungama;
Ndayeretsedwa ndi mauwo Ndalemerera mwa Ambuye.

title: 295 - Mema Nkhondo
content:
295 - Mema Nkhondo

SOUND OF THE BATTLE CRY

1. Mema nkhondoyo, wadza mdaniyo,
Kweza mbendera ya Mbuye.
Konza zidazo, yimba nyimboyo,
Khazikikatu pa Mulungu.

CHORUS:
Haya! ’nzathu, itilinda nkhondo,
Limbatu, nkhondo nja Yesu
Musafoke, m’thyole linga lao,
Mbuye ndi kazembe wathuyo.

2. M’lake mdaniyo, m’yimbe m’njiramo,
Mpaka nkhondoyo ileka
Zida bvalani, mantha tayani,
Pitikitsani adaniwo.

3. Mlungu, muvefe, m’patse mphamvuyo,
M’tithandizetu, tipempha
Nkhondo itatha, titagonjetsa,
Mutipatse krona wa moyo.

title: 296 - Munditsogolere Mbuye
content:
296 - Munditsogolere Mbuye

LEAD ME, SAVIOUR

1. Mbuye, tsogolereni, Bwino, bwino panjira;
Ndipezemo mtendere, Ndidzakhala wokondwa
Mkatsogola ndiopa kuatika (Mbuye)

Mkatsogola, Ndiopa kutaika (Mbuye)
Poti moyo uzunza (zunza), Tsogolereni Mbuye (Ambuye)

title: 297 - Macimo Atsala Pa Mtanda
content:
297 - Macimo Atsala Pa Mtanda

1. Mmodzi nalola kufa m’malo mwa ine,

Njira yopita ku mtanda anayenda

CHORUS:

Anapirira koposadi! Nasauka nafa,
Pa mtandapo Yesu! Anasenza macimo anga.

2. Wondikonda inetu, wacifundoyo,
Potsuka Mtima wanga woda,
Ndiribenso mulandu ndamasulidwa,
Macimo atsala pa mtanda.

3. Mpulumutsi tsiku ndi tsiku,
Nyimbo iri pakamwa ndi mu mtimanso,
Kuti macimo acotsedwa.

title: 298 - Ndiribe Zanga, Zonse Nzanu
content:
298 - Ndiribe Zanga, Zonse Nzanu

NONE OF SELF AND ALL OF THEE

1. Ndinali nayotu nthawi Yowawa yacisoni,
Ndinauza Yesu "Zonse nzanga ndiribe zanu,"
Ine ndiribe canu Ine ndiribe canu,
Monyada ndinati "Zonse nzanga ndiribe canu."

2. Nandipeza, ndinamwona pa mtanda wopwetekwa
Mtimabe unati, "zina n’zangatu zina n’zanu".
Zina n’zanga ndi zanu, Zina n’zanga ndi zanu,
Mtimabe unati "Zina n’zanga zina ndi zanu."

3. Tsiku ndi tsiku cifundo cace cinanditsitsa,
Ndipo ndinati, "Ndicepe ndithu mukule Inu."
Ndicepe ine ndithu, mukule Inu Mbuye,
Ndipo ndinatu, "Ndicepe ndithu, mukule Inu."

4. Cokwera kuposa myamba, Kuya kuposa Nyanja
Cikondi canu caposa Tiribe kanthu n’zanu
Ndiribe zanga, Ndiribe zanga n’zanu.
Cikondi canu coposa, "Tiribe kanthu n’zanu"

title: 299 - Tikondwere Nthawi Zonse
content:
299 - Tikondwere Nthawi Zonse

ALWAYS CHEERFUL

1. Tikondwere nthawi zonse; Tidandauliranji
Kwina "Tate wathu Mlungu, Atisamalirafe?

CHORUS:
Tikondwere nthawi zonse Ponse dzuwa liwala
Njira ya ntchitoyi ndi yokoma
Tikondwere konseko.

2. Dzanja lace litsogoza, Ngati chimo lidzatu

3. Tikaleka ntchito yathu, Tidzacita macimo,

4. Abwinowo akondwere, Ndi mtendere wosatha
Timveretu mau ace, Tikonde zokomazo.

Mpumulo kwa otopa, Mpumulo kwa otopa,

3. Zowawa sizidzalowa, Cisoni kulibenso;
Koma m’kati mwa mtendere, Ndidzabvala korona

4. Imfa idzamarizidwa, Tsoka lidzacotsedwa;
Adzapfuula mokondwa Pa tsiku la mdzukiro

5. Yimbani olowa m’Mwamba, Yimbani cigonjetso,
Mukadzalowa m’ziyoni, Khoma mudzaliona.

title: 301 - Ambuye Ali Pafupi Kudza

CHORUS:
Ee! Tsopano ndi mbanda kucatu!
Ee! Tsopano ndi mbanda kuca ndithu!
Usiku wathadi! Usana wadzanso.
Ee! Tsopano ndi mbanda kucatu!

 2. Zizindikiro za mlengalenga Zilalikiradi;
Ndi za pa dziko zinena kuti Ambuye wayandikira

3. Ndi nthawi yoti kunyada kuthu Mu mpingo wonsewo;
Ukhale wofulumira ntchito, Ukhale woyang’aniratu

4. Pitani msanga kukalalika Kwa osaukawo;
Ndi kwa omveka a dziko lino; Onsewo afulumirenso.

Cifukwa ca zabwino mwacitazi
Titokuyamikirani leroli.

CHORUS:
Inde tikuyamikani, Atate, leroli,
Mwatimangira ’fe kuno kacisi wanuyu!
Ndi ulemerero wanu mudzadze m’mnyumbayi;
Muyeretse, mudalitse, munomu

2. Tikondwa tonse kukuthokozani ’Nu
Poyamba kupemphera ndi kuyimbiramu
Mom’muno nsiku zonse mukhale nafetu
Monga nd angelo anu m’mwambamo.

3. Ikhale ngati nyali, yowala m’nyumbayi,
Yakutsogoza onse opunthwa m’mdima bii,
Akunja ndi Akhristu mwapulumutse ndi kuunika koturuka munomu.

5. M’munda muna ndaniyo, Mwazi wace dotho do?

6. Iye ndani m’ndamo, Anafera ’daniwo?

7. Mkuca wace ndaniyo, Waturuka m’mandamo?

8. Ndani alikudzako, Mponda wakuyeramo?

2. Ambuye Yesu ndinutu, Munabadwira anthu ’fe

3. Mzimu woyera m’timamo, Tiyeretsedwe ndinunso,

4. Atate, Mwana, Mzimunso, Ndinu atatu mmodzitu,
Ocimwa tinipemphhako, Mutikhululukire ’fe.

title: 305 - Dzuwa Lapita

1. Dzuwa lapita, Dzuwa lapita,
Mlungu mutigonetswe phe!

2. Mdima wafika, mdima wafika,
Mutisunge tonse bwino.

3. Tibvomereze, tibvomereze,

6. Ndife ananu, Ndife ananu,

4. Ndi anthu onse pansipo Alemekeze Mfumuyo,
Ndipo angelo ayimba, Ayankhe onsewo, Amen.

title: 307 - Munthu Wa Zisoniyo

307 - Munthu Wa Zisoniyo

title: 308 - Polenga Dzikoli

308 - Polenga Dzikoli

1. Polenga dzikoli, Pakumva Inudi, Kwayeratu;

309 - Ndiyenda Naye Yesu Mbuye

1. Ndiyenda naye Yesu Mbuye, Ndikondwa nthawi zonsezo

CHORUS:

2. Ndiyenda naye Yesu Mbuye, Ndicite cifuniro ’ce.

title: 310 - Ndifuna Kukhala Ndi Yesu

310 - Ndifuna Kukhala Ndi Yesu

1. Ndifuna kukhala ndi Yesu, Kuyang’ana nkhope yace,

Khala pafupi, mfupi nd Yesu, Pa mbali ya Iyeyo;

2. Ndifuna kukhala ndi Yesu, Kumtsata pafupifupi

311 - E, Mzimuu Wa Mulungu ’Nu

1. E, Mzimu wa Mulungu, ’Nu, Mukhale m’mtimanga;

CHORUS:
Mdzaze, mdzaze ’ne, Mdzaze Mzimu Woyera ’Nu,

2. Ndifunatu kucitadi Kufuna kwanuko;

3. Ndilibe kanthu kabwino, Kopatsa Inuyo;

312 - Taitanidwa Kubatizidwa

2. Onsewa afa ndithu M’zoipa zawozo;

3. Muwalimbitse, Mbuye, Kuyenda m’njirayi,
Ndi kugonetsa mdani Masiku onsewo;
Muwathangate iwo Kukopa enawo,
